item.text: @#/ /rgyud dza pa bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba d+harma mahA sin+ti bo d+hi tsit+ta ku la ya rA dza/ bod skad du/
chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ 'og
min gyi gnas/ chos nyid kyi mkha'/ dbyings nyid kyi klong / sems nyid kyi gnas/ ye shes
@##/ /sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal yas khang na nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang /
nyid kyi thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i 'khor/ 'di lta ste/ nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i
'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor
longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chu zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku me zhes bya ba'i
'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rlung zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i
'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i
sprul pa'i 'khor/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs kyi khams
kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzhan
yang / nyid kyi rang bzhin la lta ba'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /
yongs su rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / sems dpa'i rnal 'byor
zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje rang bzhin 'byed pa mi mnga'
@#/ /bas thabs gcig go /gzhan yang / nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor/ 'di lta ste/ sngar
'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i 'khor dang /
slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las 'byung ba'i 'khor dang / 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis thabs gcig par
bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir
'khor thams cad nyid kyi sems nyid kyi thugs la thim par mdzad do/ /rang 'byung gi ye shes gsal bar mdzad do/ /de nas
thams cad chos nyid du ldan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad bsdus nas thig le chen po gcig bzhugs so/ /de nas sems
dpa' de nyid kyi rang bzhin thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs pa de las byung nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar dga' ba'i sems kyis dang ba'i
mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la smras pa/ sems dpa' rdo rje e ma ho/ /dga' ba'i sems skyes e ma
ho/ /dang ba'i mdangs phyung e ma ho/ /nga las byung ba e ma ho/ /zhes gsungs pas/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kye/ston pa'i ston pa kun
byed rgyal po lags/ /ston pa nyid kyang thig le spros med dam/ /'khor rnams kun kyang thig le spros med dam/ /bstan pa kun kyang thig le spros med dam/ /dus
dang gnas kyang thig le spros med dam/ /thams cad kun kyang thig le'i rang bzhin na/ /ston pa'i ston pas ci zhig ston par mdzad/ /'khor du 'khor ba'i don ni
ci la 'khor/ /'khor la bstan pa ci zhig ston par byed/ /dus dang gnas ni gcig pa ji lta bu/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
des sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ yid sgra la chug cig /nges don sgrar bshad kyi/ kye sems dpa' chen po/
@#/ /sems nyid kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/ /chos rnams thams cad kun gyi snying po ste/ /snying po ma spros ye nas thig le yin/ /thig
le ye nas spros pa med pa'i don/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor dus gnas/ /nga las byung bas ye nas thig le ste/ /nga yi rang bzhin thig le bstan pa yin/ /
zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas byang chub kyi
sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba la gnas par mdzad do/ /de nas 'khor gyi rang bzhin las sems
dpa' rdo rje langs nas ston pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod nas zhus pa/ kye/ ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po
lags/ /khyod kyi 'khor du bdag 'dus 'khod pa de/ /bdag ni 'tshal ba'i don ni ci zhig mchis/ /bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol/ /
zhes zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje las chos thams
cad bkod pa ni nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po gcig las rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po lnga byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang rang 'byung ye shes
chen po dang / 'dod chags rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / /gti mug rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / /phrag dog rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / /
nga rgyal rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / /rang 'byung gi ye shes lnga po zhes rgyan gyi rgyu chen po lnga ni phyung / 'jig cing brten pa'i khams chen po gsum
ni bkod de rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus lnga gcig tu blangs pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus sa zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus chu zhes bya ba'i
lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus me zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus rlung zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i lus la
gcig tu lus thams cad blangs/ ye shes lnga'i rigs so sor phye ste rang 'byung ye shes zhe sdang gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes 'dod chags kyi rigs
dang / rang 'byung ye shes gti mug gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes phrag dog gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes nga rgyal gyi rigs dang / rang
@#/ /'byung ye shes lnga'i rigs lus rgyan gyi lus can gyi chos nyid bkod do/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid
kyang nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid bkod pa de bzhin du bzhugs so/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar
yang 'dug nas/ kye/ ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las/ /rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga byung
nas/ /de las rgyan gyi rgyu lnga byung nas ni/ /ye shes lnga yi lus lnga blangs pa 'dis/ /kun byed rgyal po'i dgos pa ci zhig che/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des slar gsungs pa/ kye/ sems dpa' chen po dgos pa ni/ /kun byed rgyal po byed mkhan nga las ni/ /ma gtogs
pa yi byed mkhan gzhan na med/ /chos nyid byed pa yang ni nga las med/ /ston pa gsum yang 'god pa nga las med/ /'khor gyi tshogs kyang 'god pa nga las
med/ /de bzhin chos nyid 'god pa nga las med/ /sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la nga yis ni/ /nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya/ /nga la rang bzhin rnam pa
gsum yod de/ /nga yi rang bzhin byang chub sems yin no/ /byang ba dag gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa rnam gsum chos nyid byang / /chub pa dag
gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /dgos pa tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab par gnas/ /sems zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa
ni/ /mi 'gag ma lus kun byed rgyal po ste/ /kun byas byang chub sems su ma lus byas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ chos nyid
mngon du phyung nas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi sngon
rol tu byed pa po nga byung ba 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po/ yid rna dbang la zhugs shig /rna dbang sgra la rtogs shig /kye/ nga
ni kun byed rgyal po ste/ /nga ni kun byed byang chub sems/ /nga med pa yi sngon rol na/ /chos rnams 'byung ba'i snying po med/ /nga med pa yi sngon rol na/ /chos
kun byed pa'i rgyal po med/ /nga med pa yi sngon rol na/ /ston pa bya ba ye nas med/ /nga med pa yi sngon rol na/ /bstan pa bya ba ye nas med/ /nga med pa yi sngon rol
@#/ /nas/ /'khor zhes bya ba ye nas med/ /sems dpa' rdo rje rtog ma skye/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid kyang / /nga yi ngo bo sprul pa yin/ /zhes gsungs
so/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la zhus pa/ kye/ kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/ /khyod ni ye nas chen po yin/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang //
'khor la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun/ /byed mkhan khyod kyis byas pas na/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /byed mkhan khyod kyis byas par snang / /ston pa gcig gam rnam
pa du ru yod/ /bstan pa gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod/ /'khor rnams gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod/ ces zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos slar gsungs
pa/ kye/ rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi ston par gcig /nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum snang ba la/ /ston pa'i grangs ni rnam pa gsum du byung / /nga ni de bzhin nyid du gcig pa
las/ /chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid/ /nga nyid byang chub sems las gzhan med do/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /'khor la bstan pa rnam pa
gsum du bstan/ /nga yi ngo bo gcig tu phyung nas ni/ /nga yi rang bzhin gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir/ /kun byed nga yi 'khor du kun kyang gcig /nga las byung ba'i ston
pa sku gsum gyis/ /'khor gyi bye brag rnam pa gsum du yod/ /ces gsungs so/ /sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kye/ ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /khyod las byung
ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /khyod sar 'gro ba'i lam ni yod dam med/ /med na khyod kyis sa ru phyin mi phyin/ /yod na bgrod nas phyin nas ma bgrod phyin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po
nyon cig /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum la/ /nga yi sa ru bgrod pa'i lam med de/ /nga yi rang byung ye shes bstan pa yin/ /sku gsum ston pa de yi 'khor rnams la/ /rnam
par thar pa'i lam ni rnam lnga ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lam du bstan/ /rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi lam lnga ni/ /'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal dang
ni phrag dog rnam lnga ste/ /rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga kun gyi lam/ /zhes gsungs so/ /ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga bstan pa de/ /
rang 'byung zhes ni ji ltar byung ba lags/ /ye shes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ci la gdags/ /lam zhes bgyi ba'i don ni gang la bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal
dang / /phrag dog la sogs rnam pa lnga po de/ /lam lnga yin pa'i don ni bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga lam ni/ /
@#/ /rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med par byung ba yin/ /ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal ba yin/ /lam ni rgyu rkyen med pas bgrod mi dgos/ /mi bgrod rang 'byung lnga
la lam lngar bshad/ /'dod pa chos rnams bdag tu 'dod pa yin/ /chags pa bdag tu 'dod pa de la chags/ /zhe ba skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/ /sdang ba cho 'phrul sna tshogs
de la sdang / /gti mug mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la dbye bsal med/ /nga ni ma nor pa yi byang chub sems/ /de bzhin nyid du ye nas rgyal bar byed/ /
thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la/ /yin min sgro skur 'debs pa phrag dog byed/ /bgrod du med pa'i lam lnga bstan pa yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga 'di las byung / /'dod pa'i khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin/ /gzugs kyi khams kyang
rang 'byung ye shes yin/ /gzugs med khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis byas pa'i phyir/ /ngas byas thams cad ye shes ngo bor bshad/ /khams
gsum sems can rgyud drug thams cad kun/ /rang 'byung ye shes med par ngas ma bshad/ /de las ma gtogs pa yi byang chub sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ngas ma bshad/ /
kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin la/ /chos nyid rnam pa gsum du bstan pa ste/ /ma skyes pa yi chos nyid dngos mi snang / /de ni gzugs med khams su bstan pa yin/ /skye ba'i cho 'phrul
gzugs su snang ba ni/ /de ni gzugs kyi khams su bstan pa yin/ /thugs rje ye shes ngo bo sngon phyung nas/ /bde sdug las de thugs rjes zad bya'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i khams ni thugs
rjes phyung ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ chos thams cad kun byed rgyal pos byas pa las ji ltar byung ba'i khungs bstan pa'i le'u
ste gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin mtshan gyi chos bshad pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod
nyon cig /nga ni ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te/ /nga ni ye nas chos kun snying po yin/ /nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/ /nga yi mtshan 'di sems dpa' rtogs par gyis/ /
nga yi mtshan 'di sems dpas rtogs 'gyur na/ /chos rnams thams cad ma lus rtogs 'gyur gyi/ /nga zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin/ /rang
'byung zhes ni bya ba ni/ /rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po bas/ /rtsol sgrub kun las 'das pa yin/ /ye shes zhes ni bya ba ni/ /'gag pa med cing ma bsgribs pas/ /chos kun ma lus
@#/ /ston par byed/ /nga ni byang chub sems la bya/ /ye nas bya ba'i don 'di ni/ /thog ma nyid nas gnas pa'i don/ /chos kun zhes ni bya ba ni/ /ston pa
kun kyang chos nyid la/ /bstan pa kun kyang chos nyid yin/ /'khor gnas dus kyang chos nyid de/ /chos nyid ma yin gcig kyang med/ /snying po bya ba'i don 'di ni/ /thams cad
'byung ba'i snying po ste/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ /ston pa kun yang de las byung / /bstan pa gsum yang de las byung / /'khor gnas dus kyang de las byung / /
thams cad 'byung ba'i snying por bshad/ /nga ni snying po sems nyid kyis/ /chos rnams ma lus kun byed de/ /kun zhes bya ba'i chos rnams kun/ /chos kun gang dang gang zhe na/ /
ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang / /'khor gnas dus ni thams cad kun/ /byed ces bya ba mkhan po ste/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang / /'khor gnas dus ni kun byed pas/ /rang
'byung ye shes mkhan po yin/ /rgyal po zhes ni bya ba ni/ /snying po rang 'byung ye shes de/ /byed pa'i mkhan po kun las rgyal/ /chos rnams byed mkhan kun las rgyal/ /
byang ba'i don ni 'di lta ste/ /snying po byang chub sems de ni/ /rang 'byung ye nas rnam dag pas/ /kun byed rgyal pos byas pa kun/ /kun bzang nyid du rnam dag pas/ /byang
zhes bya bar bshad pa yin/ /chub ces bya ba 'di lta ste/ /snying po rang 'byung ye shes des/ /snang ba dang ni srid pa dang / /snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa dang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas
thams cad dang / /khams gsum rgyud drug sems can dang / /de bzhin nyid ni thams cad la/ /kun la chub ste khyab par gnas/ /des na chub ces bya bar bshad/ /sems kyi don ni
'di lta ste/ /snying po rang 'byung ye shes des/ /snang srid snod bcud thams cad la/ /'jug cing dbang sgyur gsal bar gcod/ /des na sems zhes bya bar bshad/ /rgyu rkyen med
pa'i snying po des/ /kun la dbang sgyur thams cad byed/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ nga yi rang bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /ston pa kun kyang rtogs 'gyur la/ /bstan pa kun kyang rtogs
par 'gyur/ /'khor gyi bsam pa rig 'gyur la/ /dus gnas kun kyang gcig 'gyur rig /chos rnams thams cad nga yin pas/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di rig na/ /chos rnams
thams cad rig 'gyur bas/ /bya byed rtsol sgrub kun las 'das/ /mi rtsol lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /nga nyid
kyi mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje nyid la rang bzhin bstan pa'i mdo 'dus pa'i
@#/ /don 'di bstan to/ /sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga yi rang bzhin 'di lta ste/ /yod ni gcig las med pa ste/ /bstan ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan/ /byung
ni theg pa dgu ru byung / /'dus ni rdzogs pa chen por 'dus/ /yin ni byang chub sems yin te/ /gnas ni chos nyid dbyings la gnas/ /gsal ni rig pa mkha' la gsal/ /
khyab ni snod bcud kun la khyab/ /byung ni snang srid kun tu byung / /bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po med/ /mthong du dmigs pa'i yul dang bral/ /shes su tshig tu brjod du
med/ /rgyu las ma byung snying po 'di/ /sgros kyis btags pa kun dang bral/ /don 'di nges par rtogs 'dod na/ /dpe ni nam mkha' lta bur brtag /don ni chos nyid skye ba med/ /
rtags ni sems nyid 'gag pa med/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid la/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon/ /dmigs su med pa'i chos nyid la/ /dmigs su med
par mtshon te bstan/ /tshig tu brjod du med pa la/ /brjod du med pa'i tshig brjod de/ /dmigs med don gyi ngo bor bstan/ /bsdus te bstan pa'i don 'di ni/ /don gyi ngo bo
'grel pa ste/ /'di yis nga don rtogs par gyis/ /'di yis nga don rtogs par byed/ /'di yis nga don ma rtogs na/ /don gyi sgra tshig ci bstan kyang / /nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur
'gyur te/ /nga las gol la nga bsgribs pas/ /chos kyi snying po mthong mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ don gyi 'grel pa'i le'u ste
lnga pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin la rdzogs pa chen po de bstan pa'i tshig gsungs so/ /kye sems
dpa' rdo rje tshig 'di nyon/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /nga yi chos rnams dang por bkod/ /nga yi chos rnams mngon du phyung / /nga yi ngo bo khyod la bstan/ /nga yi rang bzhin bstan nas
ni/ /tshig dang sgras kyang don mtshon nas/ /ngo bo bstan pas khyod kyis mthong / /rang bzhin bstan pas a de rig /tshig tu brjod pas don sgrar thos/ /zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung
bar chos thams cad kyi ngo bor bzhugs so/ /sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas kun byed
rgyal pos/ kye sems dpa' chen po/ khyod nga la mdangs kyis 'khod pa de khyod kyis don ci 'dod pa gsol cig ces gsungs so/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kye ston
pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /chos rnams thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin na/ /khyod kyis ston pa bstan pa 'khor bkod ci zhig lags/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa
@#/ /ci zhig lags/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos rnams
phun sum tshogs par bkod pa ni/ /nga nyid phun tshogs pa'i rang bzhin te/ /nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya/ /nga yi rang bzhin spros bral mi phyed pas/ /chos dbyings gnas
'di nga yis byas pa yin/ /byang chub nyid las de na gzhan mi bzhugs/ /nga yi rang bzhin ma bsgribs kun khyab pas/ /gsal ba'i nam mkha' ye shes gzhal yas khang / /
rang 'byung ye shes nyid las gzhan mi bzhugs/ /nga ni thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po pas/ /chen po lnga dang khams gsum rgyud drug rnams/ /nga yi sku gsung thugs las
gzhan med pas/ /nga yi rang bzhin nga yis bkod pa yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can yang / /nga yi rang bzhin khyed la bstan pa yin/ /nga yi
rang bzhin ma skyes spros bral phyir/ /mi gnas spyod yul yun las 'das pa yin/ /mi snang ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i yul las 'das/ /nga yi rang bzhin khyed la mi snang
yang / /nga yi ngo bo khyod la snang byas pas/ /khams gsum chen po lnga dang rgyud drug rnams/ /snang ba'i rang bzhin byang chub sems lnga las/ /rang 'byung snying po ye shes
lnga 'byung bas/ /ye shes lnga yi yul lnga gsal byung bas/ /'dod pa lnga byung chags pa lnga byung nas/ /chags lnga so sor smin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /'gro ba drug gi khyad par
so sor snang / /'di ltar snang ba nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin/ /sku gsum theg pa rnam pa drug bstan pa/ /nga yis bstan na khyed kyis ma mthong ste/ /de re nga yi ngo bo re re ste/ /sku re dang ni
gsung re thugs re dang / /kun gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo re re 'o/ /de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/ /yang dag kun gyi ngo bo byang chub ngas/ /spros med dbyings kyi ngo bo nga yin la/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi gnas chen nga yin pas/ /rol pa khams gsum rgyud drug nga las shar/ /bde dang sdug bsngal las kyi khyad par te/ /yang dag ma nor nga yi thugs rje bstan/ /rgyu dang 'bras
bu'i theg pa can rnams la/ /kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan mi bya/ /nga yi lung 'di nges par bstan byas na/ /dge sdig las la rgyu 'bras yod zer nas/ /yang dag nga la sgro dang skur
btab pas/ /yang dag nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur/ /nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems
kyis byas/ /khams gsum sems can byang chub sems kyis byas/ /snang srid snod bcud byang chub sems kyis byas/ /rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas/ /rgyu yi dus na
@#/ /'byung chen lnga byas la/ /'bras bu'i dus na khams gsum sems can byas/ /dpe yi dus na kun dpe nam mkha' byed/ /don gyi dus na kun don skye med
byed/ /rtags kyi dus na kun byed byang chub sems/ /gtan tshigs dus na rang 'byung ye shes ston/ /rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas/ /byang chub sems kyis kun
byas gcig ma byas/ /kun byas byang chub nyid kyi rang bzhin byas/ /gcig ma byas pa nyid la bya mi dgos/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma btags par/ /nga yis byas pa'i chos la
nges brtags pas/ /brkam zhing chags pa'i dbang gis snang ba 'grub/ /mi rtag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ /cha med dmus long lta bu'i rang bzhin no/ /kun byed rgyal
pos byas par mi cha bar/ /dbang po drug la yul drug snang ba la/ /sdug bsngal mthong nas dbang po 'gegs par byed/ /des ni kun byed byas pa mi cha bas/ /skye 'gag med pa'i
'bras bu de la med/ /nges pa cig la bden pa gnyis byung nas/ /kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos nyid la/ /don dam kun rdzob bden pa gnyis byung bas/ /bden pa gnyis kyi
rgyu 'bras yod mi mnga'/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med/ /med par tshol ba dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /mi 'byung cho 'phrul yan lag sgom mnga' bas/ /blang dor med
pa'i 'bras bu thob pa med/ /don gcig ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom byed pas/ /bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhir rim par bsgom byed pas/ /rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med/ /
lhun gyis grub pas bya byed kun dang bral/ /skye med mtshon med gdags med de brjod pas/ /sgro skur bral ba'i brjod med de rig byed/ /chos kun byang chub sems yin de dpe ni/ /
kun dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin du/ /byang chub sems kyi don yang de bzhin no/ /nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga/ /byang chub sems las rmad byung mngon sangs rgyas/ /srid gsum
lam lnga 'gro drug snang ba yang / /rnam smin las kyis mi bskyod mngon sangs rgyas/ /khams gsum ye nas byang chub sku gsung thugs/ /de bas snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/ /nam
mkha'i ngang na mi gnas med pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems kyi klong chen yul che bas/ /sangs rgyas sems can snod bcud kun kyang gnas/ /thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /
gnyis su med de sgros skur kun dang bral/ /gang gis med pa'i snying po sems ma mthong / /bskal pa du mar don dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig /sangs rgyas
sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub snying po la/ /gcig tu med las bgrangs na brjod mi lang / /sangs rgyas sku gsung sems can lus dag kyang / /byang
@#/ /chub sems yin ye nas gzung 'dzin bral/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba gang gis grub pa de/ /des ni kun grub chos kyi rtsa ba grub/ /byang chub sems kyi mdo rtsa gcig
pu la/ /sems shing rtog la dga' bas rnam par bgrangs/ /gnyis dang grangs la dga' la nga yis bstan/ /ji bzhin rang bzhin chos nyid sems gcig la/ /sems la rang bzhin rnam pa gsung
snang bas/ /rang bzhin gsum ni bkod pa'i mchog gsum ste/ /de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i chos nyid do/ /gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin kun 'brel bas/ /rnal ma gcig la
'byor pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi yi yul du bstan/ /sems nyid gcig la che ba lngar bstan pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin yon tan lnga ldan pas/ /rang bzhin lnga la
che lngar ming du btags/ /nges pa gcig la yin min sgros byung bas/ /gol sgrib the tshom rtog pa bsam yas ni/ /kun byed rtsol sgrub rtog 'das sel bar byed/ /yod med sgros skur
the tshom bsal ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub mi rtog pas/ /ma nor nges pa'i lung de gtan la 'bebs/ /de nyid yid ches mngon du bstan pa'i phyir/ /la dor yid ches pa yi
lung bcu yis/ /rtsol sgrub bya med don bstan de yid ches/ /med par bden pa'i tshig dgu smras pa ni/ /snying po gcig la mthong ba'i yul dgu byung / /rang res mthong ba'i bden pa'i tshig
dgu smras/ /kun byed nga la thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi don 'di che bar gyis/ /chos kun rtsa ba kun byed byang chub sems/ /ji ltar snang ba nga yi ngo bo yin/ /ji ltar byung
ba nga yi cho 'phrul yin/ /sgra tshig ji ltar byung ba thams cad kun/ /nga yi don nyid tshig sgrar phyung ba yin/ /sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes yon tan dang / /sems can lus dang bag chags la
sogs pa/ /snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ye nas yin/ /sems las ma gtogs pa yi chos rnams ni/ /nga las byung ba'i sangs rgyas lngar 'das
la/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung ma bstan/ /da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa la/ /kun byed rgyal po byang chub lung mi ston/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/
rtsa ba gcig pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis byas pa las byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po/ sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste/ /ji bzhin gnyis med bde ba chen po la/ /rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa yongs kyis med/ /spros bral nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas
la/ /dmigs pa'i yul 'das gcig ces bgrang du med/ /byang chub sems la bgrang zhing mtshon med na/ /sems kyis byas pa'i chos la rnam grangs byung / /sems kyis byas
@#/ /pa gang dang gang zhe na/ /snang srid snod bcud sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /sems kyi rang bzhin ngo bo de las byas/ /byas nas mngon du byung ste bstan pa ni/ /chen po
lnga dang rigs drug snang ba dang / /de yi don mdzad gzugs sku rnam gnyis ni/ /sems kyi rang bzhin dag tu phyung nas bgrangs/ zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/
kye/ kun byed rgyal po e ma ho/ /kun tu bzang po e ma ho/ /byang chub sems khyod e ma ho/ /dang por byang chub sems langs nas/ /rang dang chos rnams ma shes nas/ /kun mkhyen khyod kyi
'khor du 'dus/ /zhu ba'i dmigs ni mi cha bas/ /kun mkhyen khyed kyi bka' stsal pa/ /chos rnams gcig tu 'dus par ni/ /byang chub sems mdo bka' stsal na/ /gcig la gnyis su
bstan pa yi/ /rnam grangs don 'di ji ltar lags/ zhes zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ sems ni ye nas lhun gyis grub/ /nga ni sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i snying po yin/ /nga ni thugs rje'i ngo bo ste/ /gang la dga' ba'i dus su ni/ /gang dga' ba yi don bya'i phyir/ /nga yi byas pa'i don bstan gyis/ /sems
dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /gcig la dga' ba de la ni/ /chos rnams gcig tu 'dus pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo de/ /sems kyi ngo bo kun byed bstan/ /mtshan ma grangs la dga'
ba la/ /kun byed rgyal pos byas pa yi/ /sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lang bstan/ /de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan/ /gcig ni nga nyid snying po ste/ /gnyis byung nga yis byas pa ste/ /byas pa'i chos la
bgrangs pa yin/ /grangs kyi don ni gcig dang gnyis/ /grangs kyi mtha' ni brjod du med/ /brjod med chos kyi snying po yin/ /brjod med snying po gcig tu bstan/ /gcig ni kun byed byang
chub sems/ /byas pa'i chos ni rnam pa gnyis/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las/ /don dam kun rdzob rnam gnyis kyis/ /dpe don rtags dang gtan tshigs su/ /nges lung drang lung
gnyis su bshad/ /rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam lnga la/ /'bras bu khams gsum sems can yin/ /khams gsum sems can rgya byas nas/ /'bras bu sangs rgyas ming btags te/ /rgyu 'bras
dpe don de ru bstan/ /rgyu ni khams gsum sems can la/ /'bras bu sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/ /de ni drang ba'i lung du bshad/ /rnam pa gnyis su dbye bar bya/ /rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam lnga
yin/ /byas pa'i chos ni thams cad kun/ /sems nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/ /de bzhin nyid du ma gtogs par/ /ma rig log rtog gzung 'dzin gyis/ /yul drug chos la nges brtags
pas/ /'jig pa drug dang brten pa drug /'jig rten zhes su bshad pa yin/ /yul drug chags pa drug brten nas/ /chags drug sdug bsngal ya nga la/ /mya ngan mya ngan zhes su bshad/ /
@#/ /mya ngan mya ngan 'das zhes pa/ /yul drug chos la mi rtog pas/ /skye drug gnas su mi skye ste/ /sdug bsngal drug las 'das pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das
zhes de la bya/ /ji bzhin snying po byang chub las/ /ma btsal rang bzhin shar ba yi/ /'byung ba chen po lnga po yang / /rang gi mtshan nyid rang 'dzin la/ /thams cad snying po byang chub kyang //
dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo 'dzin/ /mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ces su bshad/ /rang bzhin shar ba'i chen po lngas/ /chos kun bskyed pa'i snying po yin/ /de yis bskyed pa'i sems
can rnams/ /rang 'byung yin par mi rtog par/ /spyod pa'i lam de rgyur bltas nas/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pas/ /rgyu zhes ming du brtags pa yin/ /'bras bu gang thob
theg par bshad/ /spong 'gegs sbyong ba rnams su bstan/ /'bras bu zhes su btags pa ni/ /snying po rgyu las 'bras bur bshad/ /snying po'i rang bzhin de la ni/ /skye 'jig med pa'i
rang bzhin la/ /rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje de sgrub phyi ba gnyis/ /sku dang gsung thugs ye shes ni/ /blang dor byas pa'i sgo nas ni/ /chu zla bzhin du grub par 'dod/ /blang
dor med pa'i nang ba ni/ /rim pa gsum dang snying po yis/ /bdag nyid dbyings dang ye shes ste/ /gang la'ang mi brten bya med 'di/ /kun gyi snying por gyur pas na/ /bya ba med pa'i
phrin las 'das/ /bya med bde ba spong byed pa/ /mi rtsol bde ba'i lung bstan bkod/ /bskal pa gsum dang mi tshe bdun/ /zla drug lo gcig zla bcu drug /rtsol bar byed pa'i theg
pa can/ /bya med ngo bo 'di bstan pas/ /mi rtsol lhun grub bde la gnas/ /'di la ma rdzogs gang yang med/ /gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs kun rdzogs pas/ /bya ba phun sum
tshogs par bde/ /gcig rdzogs byang chub sems su rdzogs/ /gnyis rdzogs sems kyis byas par rdzogs/ /kun rdzogs phun sum tshogs par rdzogs/ /gcig la rdzogs
pa'i lung 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di la gnas/ /kun rdzogs pa yi don 'di yis/ /thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed/ /bya med 'di la gang gnas pa/ /lus 'di
gang zag lha mi yang / /dgongs pa chos nyid sangs rgyas yin/ /'di yis sems can don byas na/ /rtsol sgrub mi byed bde bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun
byed rgyal po las/ rnam grangs bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos byas pa'i chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du
gcig pa las de bzhin nyid la rang bzhin gsum snang bar 'gyur ba de so sor snang ba 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /nga yi de bzhin nyid gcig ni/ /phun sum
@#/ /tshogs pa gsum du snang / /de bzhin ma skyes rang bzhin ni/ /de bzhin nyid de yul du snang / /yul de kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /de la kun kyang brtags byas nas/ /
de bzhin nyid la lta byed pa/ /ma bsgribs rang 'byung ye shes ni/ /rgyu 'bras ston pa sku gsum snang / /la la rgyu yi ston par snang / /la la 'brel ba'i ston par snang / /la la 'bras bu'i
ston par snang / /thugs rje mngon du phyung ba yi/ /rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga las/ /byung ba'i sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /bstan pa'i yul dang 'khor du snang / /de lta ba yi 'khor
tshogs la/ /rgyu 'bras ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /de bzhin nyid kyi yul gcig la/ /'khor gyi lta ba so so bas/ /la la spong bgegs yul du bstan/ /la la sbyong zhing bgrod par bstan/ /
la lar byin rlabs dag par bstan/ /la lar blang dor gyis grub bstan/ /la lar rang rgyud dag pa ste/ /btsal zhing bsgrub tu yod par bstan/ /de ltar ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /rgyu dang
'bras la dgongs nas bstan/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis kyang / /de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/ /kun byed nga yis lung bstan to/ /de bzhin nyid ni 'di lta ste/ /kun byed nga yang
de bzhin nyid/ /ngas byas kun kyang de bzhin nyid/ /yul drug nga yis byas pa yin/ /dbang drug nga yi rig pa yin/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /nga yi rab byung ye shes
yin/ /'byung chen lnga yang rgyu lnga ste/ /kun gyi rgyu lnga de bzhin nyid/ /thugs rje rang 'byung ye shes lnga/ /khams gsum rgyud drug phyung ba yang / /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bor bshad/ /de
bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin de/ /ngo bo gnyis su med pa ste/ /rang bzhin gcig tu gnas pa la/ /rnal 'byor bzhag pa bzhi phyung ba/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi las byung / /kye sems dpa'
chen po nyon cig /kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rnal ma'i ngo bo ste/ /ji bzhin de bzhin nyid tu ye nas gnas/ /shin tu rnal 'byor yongs su rnal 'byor dang / /
rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bzhis/ /snying po don gyi rnal ma bya med la/ /bltas pas mthong ba'i yul ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sems dpa' rnal 'byor yul dang dbang por mthong
byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis/ /byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa'i lha gnyis lta/ /snying po don gyi rnal ma mthong ba med/ /ma bcos de bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog /
don gyi snying po rnal ma bya med la/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis mthong ba ni/ /ye nas rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rgyu las 'bras bu lha yi dkyil 'khor ste/ /bsnyen
bsgrub bzhi yi yan lag rdzogs byas nas/ /'phro 'du bdag nyid lhun gyis grub par lta/ /don gyi snying po rnal ma mthong ba med/ /ma bcos de bzhin nyid du chen po zhog /don gyi snying po
@#/ /rnal ma bya med la/ /yongs su rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong ba ni/ /dbyings ni snying po rnal ma'i rgyur mthong la/ /ye shes chen po rnal ma'i 'bras bur
mthong / /snying po gcig la rgyu 'bras gnyis mthong bas/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba med/ /ma bcos de bzhin yongs su rnal 'byor zhog /don gyi snying po rnal ma bya med la//
shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen lta mthong ba/ /byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying por mthong / /de nyid ma bcos don gyi snying por mthong / /lta ba ye nas bsgom du med par gzhag /dam
tshig ye nas bsrung du med par gzhag /'phrin las ye nas btsal du med par bzhag /bzhag pas de bzhin nyid la rnal du 'byor/ /rnal 'byor rnam bzhi lta ba'i bye brag ni/ /
yul gcig re re la yang bzhir dbye ba/ /sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bye brag bzhir dbye ba/ /yul dang dbang po rnam par mi rtog sems/ /des na sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid du
bshad/ /byang chub byin rlabs cho 'phrul 'byin pa ni/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad/ /phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan pa ni/ /yongs su rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin//
ye shes dam tshig rang bzhin med lta ba/ /shin tu rnal 'byor dgongs par sems dpa' bzhed/ /blang dor med pa'i rnal 'byor de ma mthong / /rnal 'byor chen po bye brag bzhir
dbye ba/ /dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum sems pa ni/ /sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rang rgyud dag pas ye shes lnga byed pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad
pa yin/ /bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /yongs su rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen por blta ba ni/ /shin tu rnal 'byor zhes su bshad
pa yin/ /rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba min/ /yongs su rnal 'byor bye brag bzhi blta ba/ /ting 'dzin rim pas bdag skur mi bskyed par/ /chos nyid rang rgyud dag par sems
pa'i phyir/ /sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /yab yum thabs dang shes rab mi ltos par/ /snying po tsam gyis dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor chen
po'i dgongs par bshad pa yin/ /snang ba rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid du/ /spyod pas yongs su rnal 'byor nyid du bshad/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /
rgyu dbyings 'bras bu ye shes lta ba'i phyir/ /shin tu rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba min/ /shin tu rnal 'byor bye brag rnam bzhi ni/ /
blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems de ni/ /sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems de ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad
@#/ /ba yin/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems de ni/ /yongs su rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/ /yin min sgro dang skur ba 'das pa'i phyir/ /shin
tu rnal 'byor zhes su nga yis bshad/ /yongs su rnal 'byor la sogs gsum po las/ /rang 'byung ye shes che dang mi ldan pas/ /lam la bgrod cing sa la sbyong bar byed/ /
dam tshig tshul bsrung lta ba sgom byed pas/ /gom pa drag dal lta spyod yod ma yin/ /de bas shin tu rnal 'byor lta spyod ni/ /ye nas kun byed nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir/ /lam la
mi bgrod sa la sbyong mi byed/ /dam tshig mi srung lta ba sgom mi byed/ /byang chub chen po'i lam nas kun 'byung phyir/ /byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi bgrod/ /bgrod sa byang chub
nyid las med pa'i phyir/ /byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi spyod/ /dam tshig rang bzhin byang chub nyid yin pas/ /byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi srung / /sgom pa'i rang bzhin
byang chub nyid yin pas/ /byang chub nyid kyis nyid la sgom du med/ /lta ba'i yul ni byang chub nyid yin pas/ /byang chub nyid kyis nyid la bltar med phyir/ /shin tu rnal 'byor
lta spyod bya med 'di/ /rang 'byung ye shes gom pa drag dal can/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yi gom pa yin/ /rgyu 'bras theg pa can gyi spyod yul min/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang
chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin las chos nyid kyi yul kun la bkod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
des rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa bgrod lam nor bas rdzogs pa chen po las grol sa dang / sgrib par gyur pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid
ni/ /chos kun ma lus pa yi snying po ste/ /ma skyes rnam par dag pas sgrib pa med/ /bgrod pa'i lam dang bral bas gol sa med/ /ye nas lhun gyis grub pas btsal du med/ /chos kun snying
po byang chub sems su gcig /gcig la rnam par bgrangs pas grol sgrib byung / /bgrod tu med la bgrod pas gol sa byung / /dmigs med bltas pas ma mthong sgrib pa byung / /de
bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig pa la/ /rgyu spyad 'bras bu phyi mar 'dod pa ni/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa bcu thob 'dod pa/ /bskal pa gsum gyi bar du gol nas bsgribs/ /phyi nang rtog pa
dag pa rnam gsum gyis/ /byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul yan lag gis/ /dam tshig sdom pa tshul bzhin dag na yang / /mi tshe bdun gyi bar du gol zhing bsgribs/ /rgyu la spyod
cing 'bras bu lta ba ni/ /lta spyod so so gnyis su bltas pa yis/ /gnyis su med la mi tshe gsum bsgribs gol/ /snying po gcig la blang dor byed pa de/ /gcig tu ma mthong
@#/ /gnyis su mthong bas na/ /blang dor ma bral bar du gol zhing bsgribs/ /rang 'byung gcig la yin pa gsum bsgoms pas/ /rtsol bral lung las gol zhes
lung ston cig /ji ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams la/ /snying po de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par/ /dbyings dang ye shes rgyu 'bras bltas pa'i phyir/ /rgyu yi sgros dang 'bras bu'i
skur yin pas/ /sgro skur gnyis bral yid ches bar du sgrib/ /med pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnam drug ni/ /rgyu la bden pa gnyis kyis thob byed dang / /dag gsum spyad pas 'bras bu
thob byed dang / /lta spyad so sos thob par 'dod pa dang / /blang dor spyad pas thob par 'dod pa dang / /rig pa gsum bsgoms thob par 'dod pa dang / /rgyu 'bras dbyings nyid
ye shes bltas pa yis/ /thob par 'dod pa'i nges thob rnam pa drug /gol sa drug dang sgrib pa drug drug ste/ /byang chub sems las gol sgrib skyon yin pas/ /nges thob drug
gi skyon yon gsal bar gsung / /rtog dpyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib pa la/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib par bshad/ /lta spyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib par
bshad/ /lta spyod blang dor rtso la sgrub rgyu 'bras 'dis/ /mi rtsol bde ba che la kun gol sgribs/ /byang chub sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /nam mkha' lta bu sems nyid
chos nyid la/ /lta bas bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med/ /phrin las btsal med ye shes sgrib pa med/ /sa la sbyangs med bgrod pa'i lam yang med/ /phra ba chos med gnyis med
'brel pa med/ /sems las nges lung gtan la 'bebs pa med/ /sgro skur 'das pas man ngag la bzlar med/ /rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyi lta ba'o/ /ltar med gcig la sgom byed
drug byung bas/ /la gol la sgribs lta ba'i gol sgrib byung / /bsrung med gcig la sdom pa drug bsrungs pas/ /la gol la sgribs dam tshig gol sgrib byung / /btsal med gcig la
phrin las drug rtsol bas/ /la gol la sgribs phrin las gol sgrib byung / /bsgribs med gcig la ye shes drug byung bas/ /la gol la bsgribs ye shes gol sgrib byung / /sbyangs med
gcig la sbyang thob drug byung bas/ /la gol la sgribs sa yi gol sgrib byung / /bgrod med gcig la lam bgrod drug byung bas/ /la gol la sgribs lam gyi gol sgrib byung / /gzung
med gcig la 'dzin byed drug byung bas/ /la gol la bsgribs chos kyi gol sgrib byung / /gnyis med gcig la 'brel ba drug byung bas/ /la gol la bsgribs 'brel pa'i gol sgrib
byung / /bden pa gcig la nges pa drug byung bas/ /la gol la bsgribs lung gi gol sgribs byung / /brjod med gcig la brjod byed drug byung bas/ /la gol la bsgribs man
@#/ /ngag gol sgrib byung / /kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di ni/ /ye nas rang gi rang bzhin lhun grub pas/ /rang bzhin bcu yis btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos//
nga yi rang bzhin kun dpe nam mkha' 'dra/ /nam mkha' dag la kun kyang rtsol mi byed/ /nam mkha' dag la kun gyi rtsol bya ru/ /nam mkha' kun byas rtsol sgrub
kun las 'das/ /de bzhin kun byed snying po byang chub sems/ /nga nyid spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir/ /nga la ltar med bsgom du ye nas med/ /de bzhin rang
bzhin bcu po des kyang ni/ /'das pa nga la bya ru yod ma yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams kyis/ /rang bzhin bcu yis nga la btsal byas nas/ /nga dang nga yi rang bzhin
mthong 'dod pas/ /mkha' la gom bor sa la ltung ba bzhin/ /rang bzhin bcu pos bgrod pas ltung bar 'gyur/ /nga yi rang bzhin nges par khungs bstan pa/ /nga ni spyod
yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir/ /lta ba bsgom du med pa de bzhin du/ /rang bzhin bcu la de bzhin don med kyis/ /rang bzhin bcu la don yod ma rtogs shig /nga
ni bltas pas mthong ba'i yul med pas/ /blta bar ma byed de bzhin nyid du zhog /spros bral ma skyes bral ba'i rgyu med pas/ /sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung mi
dgos/ /snying por ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/ /rtsol ba dang ni bsgrub pa bya mi dgos/ /rang 'byung ye shes sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i ye shes gsal bar
bskyed du med/ /thams cad nga yi sa ru gnas pa'i phyir/ /sbyangs nas bgrod pa'i sa ni yod ma yin/ /nga yis kun la khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/ /nga la bgrod par bya ba'i lam
yod min/ /nga ni ye nas gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/ /phra ba zhes ni ming du gdags su med/ /nga yi gzugs kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir/ /gnyis zhes bya ba ye nas yod ma
yin/ /nga ni ye nas rang 'byung ye shes la/ /nga la gzhan gyis gtan la dbab tu med/ /nga ni kun gyi byang chub snying po bas/ /gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan na yod ma yin/ /sgro dang
skur pa kun las 'das pa'i phyir/ /chos rnams kun gyi la ni nga yin bzlas/ /nga med pa yi yul ni gzhan med pas/ /lta ba bsgom du med par la yang bzlas/ /nga las
gzhan du bsrung du med pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig bsrung du med par la yang bzlas/ /nga las gzhan du btsal du med pa'i phyir/ /phrin las btsal du med par la yang bzlas/ /nga
las gzhan du gnas pa med pa'i phyir/ /sa lam sbyang du med par la yang bzlas/ /nga la sgrib pa ye nas med pa'i phyir/ /rang 'byung ye shes yin par la yang bzlas/ /nga ni ma skyes
@#/ /chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /phra ba chos nyid yin par la yang bzlas/ /nga las gzhan du bgrod tu med pa'i phyir/ /lam la bgrod du med par la
yang bzlas/ /sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/ /snying po byang chub nga las byung ba'i phyir/ /ye nas gnyis su med par la yang bzlas/ /rang 'byung ye shes
gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/ /lung chen thog 'bebs yin par la yang bzlas/ /chos rnams thams cad nga las med pa'i phyir/ /kun byed nga ni kun gyi la bzla'o/ /nga ma
shes pas sgrib pa'i ngo bor bshad/ /nga las gzhan btsal gol sa byung ba yin/ /las dang shes bya rnam pa gnyis su bstan/ /ma mthong ba ni las kyi sgrib pa yin/ /
ma shes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /snying po byang chub sems kyi ngo bo bas/ /ma rig ma shes sgrib gnyis ngo bor bshad/ /
btsal zhing bsgrub pa gol sar ngas bshad do/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni/ /rang yin gzhan min de la rang rtog na/ /
de ni rang la rang gis bsgribs pa ste/ /rang gi rang bzhin de yis shes pa min/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /sems dpa' nyid yin nyid las gzhan med
gyis/ /mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du bde bar mnos/ /de la bde ba'i don ni 'di lta ste/ /rang bzhin chen po bcu la rtsol mi dgos/ /rang bzhin chen po bcu la ma btsal bas/ /gol sa
sgrib pa drug drug bcu po yis/ /sum brgya drug cu gol sgrib mtha' yas med/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang gi snying po
byang chub mngon byung gis/ /'di ma yin gyi chos ni gzhan ma bshad/ /'di la ma rtog cig par nga lung ston/ /sems dpa' khyod kyis 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/ /ngas
bstan bzhin du tshogs la lung ston cig /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ gol sgrib skyon sel gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kun byed nga la thams cad tshogs
pa'i phyir/ /de phyir phun sum tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/ /ston pa bstan pa 'khor rnams byung ba'i phyir/ /kun byed ces ni
de la btags pa yin/ /dang por ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /kun byed nga yi rang 'byung ye shes las/ /rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du byung ba de/ /sku gsum ston pa
@#/ /gsum du bstan pa yin/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /sku gsum de yi rang bzhin bstan
pa ni/ /chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin bzhugs/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi rang bzhin ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i
longs spyod rdzogs par bzhugs/ /sprul pa'i sku yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i sku ru sprul nas bzhugs/ /sku gsum ston pa de yi bstan pa ni/ /phyi
nang gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /ston pa chos sku'i bstan pa 'di lta ste/ /gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin bstan pa ste/ /gzhi ma chos nyid dag gi rang bzhin las/ /
gsang ba bskyed dang gsang ba rdzogs pa dang / /gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin gsum/ /kun gyi spyod yul ma yin gsang bar bshad/ /med pa'i rim pa gsum
skyed gsang ston pa/ /de ni gsang ba bskyed pa zhes su bshad/ /gsang ba rdzogs pa zhes su bstan pa ni/ /nang gi shes rab ting 'dzin gsum mi rtogs/ /ji ltar snang ba'i
chos rnams thams cad la/ /nang gi ting 'dzin shes rab snying po brjod/ /rang rgyud dag pa ye nas lhar byas nas/ /rang gi lus kyi rdo rje skye mched rnams/ /lta spyod blang dor gnyis
med bdag nyid 'dod/ /de ni nang gi gsang ba rdzogs par bshad/ /gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po bstan pa ni/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni/ /ting 'dzin gsum
gyis byang chub sems ma bskyed/ /snying po yig 'bru brjod nas rdzogs ma byas/ /kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste/ /nga la ma rdzogs pa ni gang yang med/ /nga yi rang bzhin
rnam gsum bstan pa ni/ /rdzogs chen byang chub sems gsum bstan pa yin/ /de ni gsang ba rdzogs pa chen por bshad/ /de ni ston pa chos sku'i bstan par bshad/ /
ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa ni/ /bya ba byed pa'i phyi pa sde gsum ste/ /bya ba byed pa'i rtog can sde pa ni/ /dang por rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang rtog pa dag
pa gsum bsgoms pas/ /rtog pa'i gza' skar dus tshod sgo nas 'jug /byang chub dang ni cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag dang ye shes lha ni rje khol tshul/ /dag pa gsum
gyi mchod pa de byas nas/ /med par sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dong / /don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka sgyu mar bshad/ /lta ba spyod pa gnyis su 'byed pa yi/ /gnyis
la brten nas don gcig sgrub byed pa/ /yod pa'i spyod pas med pa'i don sgrub pas/ /rten med mkha' la 'phyang mo nyug pa 'dra/ /blang dor med pa'i phyi pa'i gsang ba ni/ /mi
@#/ /rtog ting 'dzin byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyis/ /thams cad byin rlabs ye shes sems par byas/ /mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum mchod nas/ /sku
gsung thugs dang phyag rgya bzhi ldan pa'i/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob re ba/ /chags med re ba 'jog pa'i ting 'dzin 'di/ /lta spyod blang dor byed pas grub pa med/ /longs
spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi bstan par bshad/ /ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi bstan pa ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde gsum/ /phyi zhes mtshan nyid phyi kha zhes su bshad/ /
kun byed nga yi ngo bo 'dod yon lnga/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bor phyung ba la/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum byung ste/ /de 'dul ba yi gnyen por gsungs pa ni/ /
chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga byung ba/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro reg las/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnam gsum
byung / /de dag 'dul ba'i gnyen por sde snod gsum/ /'dod chags 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsung pa ni/ /'dul pa nyi khri chig stong gsungs pa yin/ /gti mug
'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni/ /mdo sde'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs/ /zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni/ /mngon pa'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong
gsungs/ /dug gsum cha mnyam 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru/ /sde snod gsum las nyi khri chig stong gsungs/ /spyi ru brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yang / /dug gsum gnyen pos
'dul phyir gsungs pa yin/ /mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa rnam gsum ste/ /sgo ni mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/ /de ni bsdus pa'i don zhes bstan pa yin/ /mdo sde la yang
bshad lugs bcu dang gnyis/ /so sor dbye ba'i don du bstan pa yin/ /dug gsum rgyu las 'bras bu ngan song gsum/ /sems can rgyu la las spyod dge sdig gnyis/ /
'bras bu mtho ris ngan song rnam gnyis so/ /mtshan nyid rgyu las rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /'di ni sngar gsungs da gsung phyis gsung 'gyur/ /'di don brjod du med pa'i don
'di ni/ /snga ma ma gsungs da ltar mi gsung ste/ /sprul pa'i sku yis phyis kyang gsung mi 'gyur/ /de dag sprul pa'i sku yis bstan par bshad/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ kun
byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum la/ /'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum shar/ /sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi 'khor bstan pa/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /ston pa
chos kyi sku yi 'khor bstan pa/ /nga yis byas pa'i 'khor ni thams cad kun/ /nga yi rang bzhin chos kyi sku 'khor yin/ /sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/ /
@#/ /chos kyi sku yi 'khor du ma 'dus med/ /ces gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor bstan
ba/ /mos spyod bzhi yi sa la 'das pa yi/ /dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa mnan nas/ /sa bcu chos kyi sbrin gyi sa pa rnams/ /de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor du
bstan/ /ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi 'khor bstan pa/ /mu stegs mur thug rgyang pan phyal ba bzhi/ /bla med byang chub lam la gtan gol bas/ /dbang po sems bsgyur
thugs rje byin brlabs nas/ /dge slong pho mo dge bsnyen pho mo bzhi/ /ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi 'khor du bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyi/ /sku gsum so so rang re gnas bstan pa/ /ston pa chos sku'i gnas ni 'di lta ste/ /'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste/ /yang
dag don gyi 'og min de ru bshad/ /ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas bstan pa/ /'jig rten mtshan ma kun gyi steng gyur pa/ /gnas kyi 'og min khang bu brtsegs pa
yi/ /gzhal yas khang de gnas kyi 'og min bshad/ /ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi gnas bstan pa/ /sprul pa'i sku ni rabs bdun shAkya thub/ /gnas ni bya rgod phung po'i
gnas bstan te/ /yang dag thugs rje sprul pa nges med gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa yi/ /'dul ba'i zhing
khams khyad par bstan pa ni/ /chos sku ston pa'i 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' yis klas pa dang / /nam mkha'i khams kyis ji ltar khyab pa de/ /chos kyi sku
yis 'dul pa'i zhing khams yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/ /nga las byung ba'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg /ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pas
'dul/ /sprul pa'i sku yis 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/ /dzam+bu'i gling ni bye ba phrag brgya las/ /rang 'byung ye shes thugs rjes rgyud drug 'dul/ /de ni mthun pa'i bye brag bstan
pa yin/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum de/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu mthun la rang bzhin gcig /rgyu ni byang chub sems su kun mthun la/ /'bras bu sangs rgyas yin par kun kyang
mthun/ /rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo gcig par bstan/ /'dul ba'i dus la snga phyi phye ba med/ /ces gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po yang nyon cig /kun byed rgyal po nga las byung
ba yi/ /sku gsum ston pa de yi bshad lugs ni/ /ston pa chos skus byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bos bshad/ /sprul pa'i sku ni tshig dang don
@#/ /bsdebs nas/ /gang zag rna ba'i dbang por tshig don ston/ /chos sku byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa ni/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ste/ /skye ba
med las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du/ /ji ltar snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/ /ngo bo thugs rje cho 'phrul phyung ba ste/ /rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad ces bya/ /longs
spyod rdzogs sku rang gi ngo bo ston/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs pa yi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad rdzogs par
ston/ /rang gi ngo bos bshad ces nga yis bstan/ /sprul skus tshig dang yi ges bsdebs bshad pa/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /ston pa'i ngo bor
ston pas ma rig ste/ /bstan pa zhes pa'i khyad par 'dod sprul pas/ /don rnams tshig dang yi ger sgra brjod pas/ /tshig gi sgra des don de go byas nas/ /don de tshig sgra de
yis bshad pa yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kun byed pa ni sku gsum ngo bo ste/ /mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa ste/ /spros bral chos kyi sku yi ngo bo yin/ /rang
bzhin 'byung ba'i skye ba'i cho 'phrul de/ /'dod pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs sku yin/ /thugs rjes ji ltar 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa/ /nga ni sprul pa'i sku yi ngo bo
yin/ /kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin rnam gsum gyis/ /gang la gang gis 'dul ba'i skur ston mdzad/ /bstan pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa'i don/ /gang la gang 'tsham de yis
don mdzad pa/ /de ni bstan pa phun sum tshogs par gsungs/ /'khor gyi rang bzhin gang la gang 'dus nas/ /de la 'dus nas de yi gdung 'tsho ba 'dzin/ /de la phun sum tshogs pa'i
'khor zhes bya/ /nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/ /kun byed gcig la rnam pa gsum bgrangs pa/ /kun byed nga dang nga yi rang bzhin dang / /nga yis byas pa'i chos dang rnam pa gsum//
nga ni ston pa kun byed kun gyi mes/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa bcur bstan pa/ /de ni bstan pa kun gyi snying por bshad/ /kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams ni/ /dus gsum
gcig na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /khams gsum gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kun/ /dbye ba med par 'khor gyi dam par byas/ /kun byed gcig gis phun sum tshogs byas
pas/ /sems kyi dgos pa kun byas phun sum tshogs/ /gang la gang dgos dgos pa tshogs pa la/ /kun byed nga yis phun sum tshogs par bshad/ /ston pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum bstan pa/ /
'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum shar/ /ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin de/ /'khor gyi dang po ston pa chos skur shar/ /skye ba'i cho 'phrul kun bzang rol pa de/ /'dod spyod
@#/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru shar/ /sna tshogs ji ltar 'dod pa byung nas ni/ /de dang mthun par kun kyang tshim byed pa/ /de ni sna tshogs sprul sku zhes su
bshad/ /sku gsum ston pa grags phyogs mthong ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bzod thob gsum/ /gang 'thad ston pa'i sku la de 'dus nas/ /de dang mthun pa'i
gnas su don ston bzhugs/ /bstan pa'i rang bzhin yang ni de 'dra ste/ /sku gsum gang gis 'khor la gang ston pa/ /gang la gang gis 'dul ba'i don rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas
lha mi 'jig rten las dag la/ /bstan pas 'dul phyir phun sum tshogs zhes bshad/ /mi gnas chos sku dbyings na bzhugs pa yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum
sems can la/ /spros med byang chub sems ni chos skus bstan/ /ye shes longs spyod 'og min bzhugs pa yis/ /sa bcu pa yi byang chub sems dpa' la/ /byang chub sems de
sku dang ye shes bshad/ /thugs rje sna tshogs des med sprul pa yis/ /bzod thob gang na 'dus pa'i 'khor de la/ /ma nges gang gis 'dul ba'i don yang bstan/ /smon lam las
bzang rkyen gyis bar ma chod/ /nga yi thugs rje sems dpa'i dus la bab/ /ngas bstan 'khor gyi nang nas khyod sdud dang / /gnyis med don nyid nga yis bstan pa gsum/ /tshogs pas
dus gnas rang bzhin de la tshang / /phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po de/ /ye nas dkon pa'i dkon mchog gsum du bstan/ /kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs su bshad/ /ston
pa dkon pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni/ /chos sku longs spyod sku dang sprul sku ste/ /bstan pa dam chos dkon pa'i gsung mchog ni/ /brjod du med pa'i kun byed gsung mchog
gsum/ /'khor gyi dge 'dun thugs mchog de la ni/ /gang la gang dgos gang 'tsham ston par byed/ /nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/ /sku gsum byed pa'i ston pa ngas
byas nas/ /bstan pa dam chos gsum du bkod pa ni/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum du bkod/ /de la rnam pa gsum gsum dgur grags pa/ /sprul sku thugs rjes ji ltar
'dul gsum bsgrags/ /longs spyod bya byed phyi nang gsum du sgrogs/ /chos sku gsang ba'i mngon pa gsum sgrogs pa/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum po de/ /lus dang
ngag dang yid dang sku gsung thugs/ /de las 'phros pas rnam pa dgur byung ba/ /la dgu lung dgu lam dgu bgrod pa yis/ /theg gcig kun byed byang chub sa la bgrod/ /kun
byed bya byed med par rtsol sgrub 'das/ /bgrod pa med par byang chub sa la phyin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ phun sum tshogs pa shin tu
@#/ /dkon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsdus pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / rtsa ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ nga ni chos kun rang bzhin yin pa ste/ /nga yi rang bzhin las ni chos gzhan med/ /ston
pa sku gsum nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /rnal 'byor rnam bzhi nga yi rang bzhin
yin/ /'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum yang / /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/ /'byung chen lnga yang nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /
rgyud drug sems can nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /snang ba thams cad nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /srid pa thams cad nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud bsdus pa nga yi rang bzhin
yin/ /nga yi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med pas/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba nga la 'dus/ /nga las ma 'dus pa ni gcig kyang med/ /ma skyes pa dang skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang / /thugs
rje'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum byung ba/ /de ni ston pa gsum gyi rang bzhin yin/ /snga pa da lta phyi pa dus gsum yang / /nga nyid gcig tu gnas pa'i rang bzhin las/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir/ /de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/ /nga nyid gzung 'dzin bral bas byang ba dang / /nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab pa dang / /chos rnams kun gyi
snying po byed pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyang nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /kun byed nga ni gcig tu gnas pa la/ /nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin rnal ma la/ /rnam bzhi 'byor pa rnal ma gcig tu 'byor/ /
des na nga yi rang bzhin yin par bshad/ /kun byed nga yi lus ngag yid gsum las/ /'byung yang nga yi rang bzhin de las 'byung / /'dus kyang nga yi rang bzhin de la 'dus/ /yin yang nga yi ngo bo
de yin pas/ /khams gsum nga yi rang bzhin yin par bshad/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam lnga ni/ /nga yi ngo bo rnam lnga phyung ba ste/ /nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga/ /kun byed
nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/ /kun byed nga yi thugs rjes mngon phyung nas/ /rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga bstan pa ni/ /'gro ba rigs drug sems can snang ba yang / /kun byed nga
yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin las/ /snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/ /thams cad ngas byas nga las byung ba'i phyir/ /ngar ma
'dus pa'i chos ni gcig kyang med/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum yang / /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ston/ /snga pa da lta phyi pa dus gsum gyi/ /rnam gsum gcig
@#/ /tu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /snga phyi med par kun byed rang bzhin gnas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / /kun byed nga yi rang
bzhin sems dpar byed/ /rnal 'byor rnam bzhi rnal mar 'jog pa yang / /kun byed nga la rnal du 'jog par byed/ /kun byed rgyal pos thams cad byas pa bzhin/ /thams cad
kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'dus/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nyid kho nar
'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de yis chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi mdo 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po/ nga ni kun gyi lung khungs yin pa ste/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /thams cad nga las byung bar shes par gyis/ /chos kyi spyi khungs chen
po 'di nyon la/ /chos rnams thams cad 'di ltar lung ston cig /kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/ /lung chen kun gyi rgyal po nga yin pas/ /ston pa gsum yang dang
po nga las byung / /lung zhes bya ba ston pa'i bka' la gdags/ /man ngag kun gyi rtsa ba nga yin pas/ /sems las ma rtogs pa yi chos nyid ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas
khams gsum sems can la/ /kun byed nga yis yang dag bstan pa med/ /rgyud dang mdo sde kun gyi spyi 'grel yin/ /rgyud dang mdo sde ston pa'i ston pa yang / /kun byed nga yi rang
bzhin phyung ba yin/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa gnyis ka 'grel/ /kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/ /bstan pa kun gyi yang rtse yin par bshad/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku
gsum gyis/ /bstan pa'i 'dul ba mdo sde mngon pa dang / /tan tra so so'i sde ni 'bum sde dang / /bskyed rdzogs gsang ba la sogs rtsol sgrub can/ /kun kyang rtsol sgrub 'das pa
nga la bgrod/ /rtsol sgrub nyid kyis 'das pa nga yi mthong / /des na bstan pa kun gyi yang rtse yin par bshad/ /kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/ /theg pa kun gyi nying khu yin par
bshad/ /ston pa gsum gyi gnas pa'i theg pa gsum/ /nges par gsum pa theg pa gcig las med/ /gcig ni kun theg byang chub sems kyis/ /de ni theg pa kun gyi nying khur bshad/ /
kye/ nga ni ma rig pa yi mun bsal nas/ /ye shes chen po'i snang ba mched par byed/ /de yang ji lta bu zhes bstan zhe na/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /byang chub de
bzhin nyid du ma rig ste/ /ma rig rtog pa'i mun par 'thibs pa la/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa'i phyir/ /kun byed
@#/ /byang chub sems su rig byas nas/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /so sor rtog pa'i mun pa bsal nas kyang / /rang 'byung ye shes
chen po snang ba mched/ /des na ma rig mun sel snang ba mched ces bya/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba dral nas ni/ /nyon mongs pa yi phreng thag
gcod par byed/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos 'di thams cad la/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams kyis/ /la las dug mthong spong ba'i rtog pa byed/ /la las sems
chags pa yi yul mthong nas/ /bden gnyis ma chags pa yi rtog pa byed/ /la las rnam dag bya ba'i yul mthong nas/ /dag pa gsum dang byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyis//
rje dang khol gyi tshul du rtog par byed/ /la las rang dag pa yi rang bzhin la/ /bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhis bsgrub 'dod rtog byed pa/ /thams cad kun byed byang chub sems
nga yi/ /sems las gzhan ma yin rtog dral nas ni/ /so sor rtog pa'i nyon mongs phreng thag gcod/ /ces gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ kun byed rgyal po
byang chub sems nga ni/ /khyod kyis nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs la/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /nga las gzhan med pa ru lung ston cig /khyod kyis nga yi lung
'di bstan 'gyur na/ /khyod la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur nas/ /kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /kun kyang nga
yi rang bzhin gyur pa na/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/ /kun kyang spong bgegs bden gnyis sbyong mi byed/ /gtsang sbras dag gsum byin gyis rlob mi byed/ /ting
'dzin sems bskyed rtsol dang sgrub mi byed/ /thams cad kun byed nga ru byas zin pas/ /kun byed nga ru thams cad mnyam pa nyid/ /mnyam nyid nga yis mnyam nyid bya mi dgos/ /
mnyam nyid bya mi dgos par sngar lung bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ nges par lung khungs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //
de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des lung thams cad kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi spyi lung bshad pa'i bshad lugs 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga ni chos kyi spyi lung yin pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam lnga ni/ /spyi don rnam pa lnga yis bshad pa ste/ /lo rgyus don gyi bshad
lugs bstan pa dang / /rtsa ba don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang / /yo ga don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang / /dgos pa don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang / /tshig gi
@#/ /don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o/ /dang po yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir/ /lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan par bya/ /chos kun rtsa
ba sems su 'dus pa'i phyir/ /des na rtsa ba'i don de bstan par bya/ /theg pa'i khyad par so sor dbye ba'i phyir/ /yo ga don gyi rtsa ba bstan par bya/ /rtsol sgrub bya mi
dgos par bstan pa'i phyir/ /dgos byed don gyi dgos pa de ru bstan/ /mi rtogs don de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /tshig gi don de sgra ru brjod par bya/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po/ lo rgyus don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/ /dang por yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir/ /lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa ni/ /rang bzhin byin
gyis brlabs kyis bshad lugs dang / /rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i bshad lugs dang / /don gyi sgra tshig bsdebs pa'i bshad lugs so/ /kun byed nga yi rang
bzhin rnam gsum las/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo sgra tshig gis/ /ji ltar byung ba'i khungs des yid kyang ches/ /kye
sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /rtsa ba don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/ /snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas sems can bsdus pa
thams cad kun/ /kun byed byang chub nga yis byas pa'i phyir/ /thams cad byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan zhes bya ba ye nas med pa'i phyir/ /kun kyang byang chub sems su
bstan pa'i phyir/ /rtsa ba don gyi dgos ched bstan pa yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /yo ga don gyi dgos ched bstan pa ni/ /kun byed nga las byung ba'i sku gsum gyis/ /
longs spyod sku dang chos sku'i bstan pa yi/ /tan tra la sogs yo ga sde rnams la/ /so so'i khyad par bye brag yod kyis kyang / /rgyu 'bras 'das pa nga yi bstan pa ni/ /rdzogs chen
a ti yo ga'i don 'di ni/ /theg pa shan 'byed rdzogs pa'i lung zhes bshad/ /des na yo ga'i don gyi dgos pa stan pa yin zhes bya/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon
cig /dgos ched don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/ /bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas/ /kun byed byang chub nga la dad pa yi/ /las dang skal ldan shin tu rnal
'byor pa/ /lta ba bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med/ /phrin las btsal med lam la bgrod du med/ /sa la sbyang med rgyu dang 'bras bu med/ /don dam dang ni kun
rdzob rnam gnyis med/ /bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med par mthong ba dang / /sems bskyed med cing gnyen po med mthong ba/ /kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba yi/ /
@#/ /de lta bu yi dgos ched bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /tshig gi don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/ /kun byed byang chub
sems nga de bzhin nyid/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams bstan pa ni/ /kun byed de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ /tshig dang yi ge sgra ru ma bsgrags na/ /gang zag yid kyi dbang po
rig pa yis/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gang mi snang / /des na tshig dang yi ge sgra ru bsgrags/ /des na tshig gi don gyi dgos par bshad/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/
gang dang gang gi lo rgyus bshad pa ni/ /ston pa bstan pa 'khor gyi lo rgyus te/ /ston pa kun byed rang bzhin rnam gsum las/ /'khor gyi rang bzhin sku gsum ston pa byung / /
sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ni/ /ston pa bstan pa gsum gyi lo rgyus yin/ /gang dang gang gi rtsa ba bshad pa ni/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /
ji skad bstan pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems su bstan pa'i phyir/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams kyi/ /rtsa ba don gyi gtan tshigs
bstan pa yin/ /nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la/ /rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yo ga'i bye brag ni/ /lta ba spyod pa dam tshig sgrub pa dang / /mi mthun khyad par so so'i
bye brag de/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol bsgrub 'das pas 'byed/ /des na yo ga'i don gyi gtan tshigs bstan/ /dgos ched don gyi nges tshig bstan pa ni/ /dgos ni khams gsum
sems can thams cad kun/ /rang sems de bzhin nyid de mthong 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas tshig gi sa la mi gnas te/ /da lta nyid nas shin tu rnal 'byor thob/ /las med skal ba chung ba
rnams la ni/ /ma gab mngon tu phyung yang mi rtogs te/ /gang zhig nor bu rin chen 'dod pa de/ /shing la byi dor byas pas mi 'gyur bzhin/ /las bzang skal ldan shin tu rnal 'byor
la/ /lta ba dam tshig 'phrin las sa lam dang / /sems bskyed rgyu 'bras bsgom bsgrub gnyen po med/ /don dam kun rdzob rnam gnyis med mthong ba/ /des na sems kyi de bzhin
nyid mthong bas/ /de lta bu la dgos pa'i dgos ched yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /tshig gi don gyi dgos pa'i nges tshig ni/ /med pa'i don bcu med pa'i sgra dang tshig /tshig
tu brjod pas bya med don mthong nas/ /bya mi dgos pa'i kun byed de thob pas/ /tshig gi don gyi dgos pa bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed
rgyal po las/ sems kyi bshad lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi gsang ba dam pa'i gdams
@#/ /ngag 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ kun byed nga ni kun tu gsang ba 'o/ /nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa la/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam
gsum mi bstan gsang / /nga la gnas pa'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya/ /nga la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la/ /nga yi rang
bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya/ /nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la/ /nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya/ /nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan byas nas//
sku gsum ston pa nga las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sku gsum ston pa nga las ma byung na/ /bstan gsum theg gsum 'khor gsum tshogs mi 'gyur/ /bstan gsum theg gsum
'khor gsum ma tshogs na/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum/ /bla med byang chub kun gyi rig pa med/ /nga las byung ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /nga yi rang
bzhin ma gsang bstan gyur na/ /sku gsum ston gsum med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/ /nga la 'dus pa 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/ /nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan gyur na/ /
ston gsum theg pa khyad par phyed mi 'gyur/ /nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la/ /nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjes bstan gyur na/ /ston pa gsum gyis bstan
pa'i gnas med 'gyur/ /ston pa gsum gyis bstan pa'i gnas med na/ /kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams la/ /phun sum tshogs pa zhes su su zhig 'dogs/ /des
na kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /nga yi rang bzhin nga yis phyung nas ni/ /nga la nga yi rang bzhin nga yis bstan/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa 'khor rnams la/ /bstan pa'i lung
ni kun byed ngas ma phog /shin tu rnal 'byor kun byed nga yin pas/ /de la kun byed rang bzhin bstan par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /
skal med la gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi lung chen po mngon tu phyung ba'i lung 'di bstan to//
kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /mngon du phyung ba gsum bstan te/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ngas bstan pa/ /don rnams ston pa'i ston pa dang //
don rig 'dod pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /ma nor nges pa'i don dang gsum/ /kun byed nga yis mngon tu phyung / /don ston mngon du phyung ba ni/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /
sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum/ /'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum ste/ /don ston pa yi ston pa de/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin dang / /nga yi ngo bo ston pa dang / /thugs rje'i
@#/ /rang bzhin don mdzad gsum/ /rang bzhin gsum las mngon du phyung / /ston pa gsum yang mngon phyung ba'o/ /don rig 'dod pa mngon phyung ba/ /
ston pa gsum gyi 'khor gsum ste/ /de bstan pa yi bye brag ni/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun/ /mi rtog
mnyam nyid gnas pa de/ /kun byed nga yis mngon phyung 'khor/ /dbang po yul gyi rnam pa la/ /nyon mongs mi skye rnam mi rtog /rang gi byang chub sems nyid la/ /chos
dang chos nyid rtog byed pa/ /dang po sa nas bcu par bsgribs/ /sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /longs spyod 'dod yon rnam pa lngar/ /mthong ba'i ston 'khor
rnam gnyis kyang / /nga yi ngo bor mngon phyung yin/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin la/ /rig pa yid kyi dbang po des/ /brtags pas mthong ba'i shes pa de/ /la las rtag pa
nyid du mthong / /la las stong pa chad par mthong / /rgyu 'bras log par mthong ba yi/ /mu stegs rnam bzhis byin brlabs nas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu lung bstan pa'i/ /sdig
spong sems dge rnam bzhi ni/ /bskal pa chen po gsum bar du/ /gnas pa'i 'khor dang ston pa yang / /nga yis mngon du phyung ba yin/ /ye shes rig pa'i yul can la/ /
yang dag nges par mngon du phyung / /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba/ /gang gis gang mngon phyung ba ni/ /gang gis nga yis mngon du phyung / /gang zhig mngon
du phyung ba ni/ /sems de nyid de mngon du phyung / /gang gi don du mngon phyung na/ /yul la so sor lta ba yi/ /'khor gyi don du mngon phyung yin/ /la la spong ba'i don du phyung / /
la la 'gegs pa'i don du phyung / /la la spyod pa'i don du phyung / /la la dag byed don du phyung / /la lar blang dor don du phyung / /la lar bdag nyid don du phyung / /la
las spang pa'i yul du mthong / /la las dgag pa'i yul du mthong / /la las sbyangs pa'i yul du mthong / /la las dag bya'i yul du mthong / /la las blang dor yul
du mthong / /la las dbang bsdu'i yul du mthong / /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston pa yi/ /'khor tshogs rnams kyis de ltar mthong / /sems dpa' chen po/ nga yi rang
bzhin mngon phyung ba/ /'di ni nges par lung ston cig /nga ni khyed kyi ngo bo ste/ /nga yi rang bzhin phyung ba ste/ /khyed kyi rang bzhin phyung ba yin/ /khyed kyi rang bzhin phyung ba
des/ /rang gi rang bzhin shes par gyis/ /rang gi ngo bo shes par gyis/ /rgyu 'bras 'khor la lung ston cig /ces gsungs so/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des rgyu 'bras
@#/ /kye 'khor la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston 'khor rnams/ /ston pa'i ston pa kun byed kyis/ /kun byas phun sum tshogs
par byas/ /phun sum tshogs pa mngon phyung pa/ /rang gi rang bzhin mngon phyung bas/ /rang gi rang bzhin yin par rtogs/ /rang gi ngo bo yin par rtogs/ /de la gzhan yin
ma rtogs par/ /rang nyid yin par kun gyis rtogs/ /rang nyid yin par ma rtogs te/ /yul der rang du ma rtogs par/ /yul de dgra dang tsher brtags nas/ /rang gi
rang bzhin de spangs nas/ /bskal pa brgya phrag yun ring du/ /chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong / /rang sems chos nyid ma mthong na/ /bskal pa brgya phrag yun ring
du/ /rang gi byang chub de spong 'gyur/ /bya med bde chen de mi 'thob/ /yul de rang du ma rtogs par/ /yul de rkyen gyis dgrar brtags nas/ /rang gi rang bzhin de bkag na//
bskal pa brgya phrag yun ring du/ /chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong / /rang sems chos nyid ma mthong na/ /bskal pa brgya phrag yun ring du/ /rang gi byang chub de 'gags
pas/ /bya med bde chen de mi thog /yul de rang du ma rtogs par/ /yul de sbyangs pa'i yul mthong nas/ /rang gi rang bzhin sbyong byed na/ /bskal pa chen po gsum bar du/ /
chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong / /rang sems chos nyid ma mthong ste/ /rang sems sbyang med gdeng dang bral/ /yul de byang chub rang dag la/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma yod mthong nas/ /phyi nang
rtog pa dag gsum gyis/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dag byed ba/ /dag pa'i rang sems ma mthong ba/ /rang sems dag pa de dang bral/ /mi yi skye ba tshe bdun du/ /rang sems chos nyid de mi mthong / /
blang dor med pa'i byang chub la/ /blang dang dor ba'i yul mthong nas/ /rang 'byung nyid la blang dor byas/ /rang gis rang la blang dor byas/ /bar mchod kyis tshe gsum du/ /rang sems gnyis
med de mi mthong / /lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub la/ /btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i yul mthong nas/ /sems bskyed ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis/ /thams cad dbang sdud bdag tu
byed/ /rang gi byang chub btsal med la/ /btsal bas grub par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /bcu drug zla bas tshes bsgrubs nas/ /stong dang brgya drug lo yis ni/ /cha lugs longs sku bzung nas
ni/ /rang sems lhun grub bzod rtog byed/ /rang sems chos nyid mngon phyung 'di/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rtog byed pa'i/ /rtsol sgrub can la phan med kyang / /las dang skal bar ldan pa yi/ /
dgos ched don tu phyung ba yin/ /zhes sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis lung bstan pa/ kye sems dpa' chen po/ chos nyid mngon tu phyung ba rang sems
@#/ /yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu theg pa can rnams kyis/ /rang sems mngon tu phyung ba ma gtogs te/ /spong zhing 'gegs pas bskal pa yun rings gnas//
sbyongs shing bgrod la bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /dag byed khrus dang gtsang sbras mi tshe bdun/ /byin rlobs blang dor can gyi mi tshe gsum/ /dbang sdud bdag 'dod lo
stong brgya drug tu/ /longs sku cha lugs de yi rang sems rtogs/ /rnam rtog dus na mi rtsol bde chen thob/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /rgyu 'bras theg chen bzhin
du ma yin gyi/ /kun byed nga yi lung 'di nges par zungs/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad dang / /rang sems chos nyid ye nas gcig yin pas/ /rgyu 'bras lugs
bzhin 'di la rtog ma byed/ /rang sems de bzhin nyid la rtog ma byed/ /rang sems de bzhin nyid la brtag bya ru/ /rang gi byang chub ngo bo snang ba yin/ /'di las ma rtogs so sos ming
btags pa/ /kun rdzob snang la don dam mi snang 'dogs/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bden pa cig /bden pa yang dag nges par yod ma yin/ /yang dag 'dogs pa nga
yang 'khrul pa yin/ /bde ba 'dod pa chags pa'i nad yin bas/ /'dod pa med pas bde ba len par byed/ /sangs rgyas bsgrubs pas grub pa ma yin te/ /ma btsal rang bzhin
gnas pas lhun gyis grub/ /ma btsal rang bzhin gnas la mi rtog zhog /sangs rgyas don gyi bla dwags ming 'di la/ /sangs rgyas yang dag yod par nga mi ston/ /gang zhig sangs
rgyas yod par mthong ba ni/ /chos nyid dbyings las sangs rgyas mi rnyed de/ /sangs rgyas ma lta rang sems bya med rtogs/ /brtags na med de rang sems ye nas gsal/ /dngos su mi
snang rang sems kun la khyab/ /yin pa'i ngo bo snang ba 'di yin te/ /'di min mnyam pa'i rgyu 'bras theg chen la/ /spong 'gegs sbyong ba byin rlabs sna tshogs kyis/ /rang sems
chos nyid bya med de las gol/ /rang gam bzhag nas gzhan ma rgyang du tshol/ /bya med bde bor rtsol ba dang du len/ /tshi chad pa yi nad du de las med/ /ma yengs ting 'dzin
'dzin pa'i rtod phur yin/ /ye nas yin la yengs pa'i shor ba med/ /ma yengs ting 'dzin re ba'i slu mkhan des/ /rgyu 'bras theg chen drang ba'i lung bstan yin/ /ye nas
yin la yengs med shor med de/ /rtsol sgrub kun gyi gnyen po 'joms byed de/ /rgyu 'bras ston pa'i ston pa 'khor rnams la/ /kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan gyur na/ /
rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung zhes sgro skur 'debs/ /sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin can/ /ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i ma bcos rnal 'byor spangs/ /ma bcos rnal ma
@#/ /kun gyi chos nyid yin/ /chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med/ /sangs rgyas ming du brtags pa bla dwags yin/ /chos nyid bya ba gzhan med
rang sems te/ /rang sems ma bcos chos kyi sku ru bshad/ /ma bcos pa la ye nas skye med pas/ /skye med don la btsal zhing bsgrub tu med/ /btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med
'grub mi 'gyur/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs sku dang / /sprul pa'i sku dang ston pa rnam pa gsum/ /theg gcig theg gnyis theg pa rnam
gsum gyi/ /ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yis phyung / /nga ni ston pa kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las phyung / /spros bral skye med dga' ba'i 'khor
rnams la/ /nga yi rang bzhin gzung 'dzin bral ba las/ /mi rtog mnyam pa nyid kyi chos sku byung / /chos sku'i 'khor ni phye ba med pa ste/ /ma skyes mnyam pa nyid kyi don
bstan pa/ /de ni lhag ma med pa'i theg par bshad/ /nga yi rang bzhin kun tu snang ba la/ /'dod spyod dag pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/ /nga yi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs
par phyung / /ngo bo de la lta spyod rdzogs byed ston/ /de ni thun mong min pa'i theg pa ste/ /nga yi rol pa'i ngo bo phyung ba yin/ /nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjer 'byung ba las/ /ji
ltar 'dul bar sprul nas don mdzad pa'i/ /sprul pa'i sku dang 'khor tshogs rnam bzhi la/ /rgyu 'bras 'tsham pa'i thugs rjes phyung ba yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /
mdor na mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes pa/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar bstan pa la/ /mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes bstan pa yin/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin gcig pu
la/ /snang ba'i yul ni rnam pa gsum snang la/ /de las byung ba'i chos ni 'di lta ste/ /sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mngon phyung
yin/ /'di las gzhan yin pa ru rtog byed pa/ /kun byed nga dang phrad pa'i skal med pas/ /'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyi/ /rim pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu 'bras theg 'khor
yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /nga yis mngon du phyung pa 'di/ /gzhan ma mngon du phyung ba min/ /nga nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/ /chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/ /rang sems
mngon du phyung ba yin/ /ma nor mngon du phyung ba yin/ /nges pa mngon du phyung ba yin/ /de bzhin mngon du phyung ba yin/ kye sems dpa' chen po/ /nga yi rang bzhin mngon
du phyung ba 'dis/ /che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas mngon du phyung ba yin/ /che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas 'di lta ste/ /nga yi ngo bo mngon du phyung ba ni/ /snang srid snod bcud nga yi chos nyid
@#/ /'di/ /kun la snang bas mngon par phyung ba yin/ /bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin/ /rtsol grub med pas ye nas che bar bshad/ /
mngon par sangs rgyas zhes su bshad pa yin/ /nga yi rang sems mngon du phyung ba 'di/ /snying por gyur pas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs
rgyas yin/ /rtsol sgrub med pas ye nas che bar bshad/ /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas che bar bshad/ /ma skyes spros bral mngon du phyung ba 'di/ /ye nas gzung 'dzin bral
bas chos kyi dbyings/ /bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin/ /rtsol sgrub mi dgos ye nas che bar bshad/ /chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba yin par bshad/ /nga yis
nges par mngon du phyung ba 'di/ /dpe don rtags ni rnam pa gsum bstan te/ /chos nyid don la nam mkha'i dpe bstan te/ /byang chub sems kyi rtags kyis nges pa ru/ /the tshom za ba
rnams la mngon pa ru/ /dpe don rtags kyis de yin sangs rgyas bstan/ /nga yi rang bzhin ma nor nyid 'di ni/ /su la mngon du phyung yang mi snang bas/ /de ni ma nor ba yi rang bzhin
