la/ /bzhin ni bcos pa med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /nyid ni ngo bo nyid la btags pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin de nyid la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas yod pa'i sgros mi 'dogs//
khams gsum sems can med pa'i skur mi 'debs/ /rtog dpyod bsam pa cir yang dgongs med pas/ /sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar nga yis bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub
kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /rang bzhin rnam pa gsum mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des
sems dpa' rdo rje la gdam ngag phog pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' rdo rje chen po 'di nyon cig /nga ni ye nas kun byed rgyal po yin/ /ston pa bstan pa 'khor dus
ngas byas nas/ /ston pa'i bstan pa yang ni nga yis byed/ /bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin de ston la/ /'khor yang nga yi ngo bo de phyung nas/ /dus gnas nga yi rang bzhin de ru ni/ /kun
byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa las/ /nga min chos ni gcig kyang bstan pa med/ /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang / /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir/ /khyod
kyang nga las nga yis phyung ba yin/ /kun byed nga ni ye nas byas zin gyi/ /da gdod bya dgos kun la lung ma ston/ /da gdod bya dgos 'khor la lung bstan na/ /'khor rnams rtsol
ba'i nad kyis zin par 'gyur/ /rang 'byung ye shes med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/ /byang chub sems la 'chos pa'i skyon du 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid la 'chos pa'i skyon du
@#/ /'gyur/ /skyon gyis yon tan khyad du gsod par 'gyur/ /brdzun gyis bden pa bslus pas bslad pas na/ /min pa'i rtsol bas bya med yin ma
sgrub/ /sems dpa' khyod kyis kun byed nga rig gis/ /nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /ye nas rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin nyid/ /ston gsum nga yi
rang 'byung ye shes yin/ /bstan pa gsum yang nga yi de bzhin nyid/ /'khor rnams kun kyang sems dpa' rdo rje'i tshul/ /dus gsum phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
kun/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yi byang chub sems/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /sems dpa' rdo rje la gdams ngag phog pa'i le'u
ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi sku gdung 'di zungs shig par gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po 'di
zungs shig /sku gdung ring srel rtag 'chang na/ /rgyal ba'i yab mes kun byed nga dang mnyam/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/ kye dus gsum
sangs rgyas gyi yang mes po/ /ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /sku gdung ring srel rtag tu zungs shig pa/ /sku ni rgyal ba gang dang gang gi sku/ /gdung ni sangs rgyas
gang dang gang gi gdung / /ring bsrel zhes ni ji lta bu la bgyi/ /zhes zhus so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sku ni nga sras rgyal ba gsum gyi sku/ /gdung ni dus gsum
rgyal ba nga yi sems/ /dus med rtag tu sems dpa' 'di 'chang na/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchod pa'i rten/ /sku gdung ring bsrel zhes ni de la bya/ /
kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /sku gdung ring bsrel de ltar lags na yang / /de la dus gsum sangs rgyas ji ltar mchod/ /mchod pa la ni yon
tan ci zhig mchis/ /zhes zhus so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /nga yi sku gdung ring bsrel de la ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rtag tu sems ltas
mchod/ /de yi yon tan mi 'bral de thob nas/ /chos rnams kun byed rgyal po nus par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /
sku gdung gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi chos nyid nga nyid yin pa'i lung
'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/ /snang ni nga yi ngo bor snang / /dag ni chos nyid dbyings su dag /'dul ba rnam pa
@#/ /sna tshogs ston/ /sku gsum sna tshogs byung nas ni/ /theg pa gsum ni ngo yang ston/ /rgyu 'bras can ni des tshim byed/ /'das pa yul la mi
ltos pas/ /rgyu la mi bsgrub 'bras mi 'dod/ /'dod pa med pa'i dgongs pa dang / /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /ye nas yin la bya mi dgos/ /don rnams
ji bzhin bskyod med pas/ /ji bzhin pa la bsgrub mi dgos/ /chos kun rang bzhin lhun grub phyir/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas grub pas kyang / /rtsol zhing sgrub pa'i lung
mi 'bogs/ /btsal na gang bcal ting 'dzin des/ /mi grub ting 'dzin nang du che/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ nga min ston pa thams cad kyis/ /bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs
dang / /bsam pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa dang / /'phro ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dang / /lta ba'i yul ni ci dmigs kyang / /ji bzhin pa la g.yos pa med/ /bya ba'i las kyis
grub pa med/ /bsam pa'i ting 'dzin yal bar 'gyur/ /'phro ba'i 'od zer zhi 'gyur na/ /blta yul gang yang mthong ba med/ /des na btsal ba'i las ma byed/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po/ /yul las btsal bas grub pa'i lung de ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg can ston par byed/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg can chos nyid dang / /chos dang chos nyid
rnam pa gnyis phye nas/ /chos kyis chos nyid tshol ba rnyed lung med/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /btsal bas mi 'grub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //
de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des ma btsal bas grub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /bstan pa'i theg
pa rnam gsum bstan pa na/ /ston pa gsum gyis mi stsol lung ma bstan/ /kun byed nga yis theg gcig bstan pa ni/ /btsal bas grub pa'i lung du ngas ma bstan/ /kye sems dpa'
chen po nyon cig /kun byed byang chub nga yi rang bzhin las/ /ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi snying po sku gsum te/ /nga yis rang bzhin ma bcos
chos skur grub/ /nga yi ngo bo ma bcos longs spyod rdzogs/ /nga yi thugs rje mngon byung sprul sku gsum/ /btsal nas grub pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa med ces gsungs so/ /
kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sku gsum kun byed nga ru 'dus pa ste/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rjes ma bcos gsum//
sku gsum nga yi de bzhin nyid du bstan/ /nga dang nga yi de bzhin nyid las ni/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i yon tan spros kyang med/ /sems can zhes bya'i skyon gyi rnam pa med//
@#/ /mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du de bzhin gnas/ /'di las ma gtogs pa ni gzhan med pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di las lhag pa yi/ /kun
byed nga la nges lung mnos pa med/ /byed mkhan kun byed rgyal po nga yis kyang / /mi rtog mnyam nyid de bzhin de nyid las/ /nyid la nyid kyis bstan pa rdul tsam med/ /ces
gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems
kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byung khungs nyid las byung ba 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ chos kun sdud pa'i rdo rje nyon/ /kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/ /nga
ni chos kun sa bon yin/ /nga ni chos kun rgyu yang yin/ /nga ni chos kun sdong po ste/ /nga ni chos kyi gzhi ma yin/ /nga ni chos kyi rtsa ba yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams
kun/ /'dus pa'i phyir na snying por bshad/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /skye ba'i phyir na sa bon yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /'byung ba'i phyir
na rgyu yang yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kyi/ /yan lag 'byung bas sdong po yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /nga la gnas pas gzhi ma yin/ /ji ltar snang
ba'i chos rnams kun/ /nga yin pas na rtsa bar bshad/ /kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyon cig /kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/ /rang bzhin ma bcos rnam gsum las/ /ming tsam sku
gsum byung tshul bstan/ /nges par sku gsum ston pa yang / /de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/ /kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/ /ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba las/ /chos sku skye med
ming tsam byung / /nges par chos sku ming tsam ste/ /de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/ /kun byed byang chub sems nga yi/ /ngo bo ming tsam mngon phyung ba/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku ming
tsam tshul/ /nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku de/ /de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/ /kun byed byang chub sems nga yi/ /thugs rje sprul sku mngon phyung ba/ /thugs rje ma bcos rang
bzhin las/ /ming tsam sprul sku tshul phyung ba/ /nges par sprul pa'i sku de yang / /de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las/ /sku gsum g.yos pa
med pa bzhin/ /sku gsum bstan pa'i chos rnams dang / /sku gsum 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /chos rnams kun la'ang g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos pa yi chos nyid
la/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur btags byas nas/ /rtsol dang bsgrub pa byas nas ni/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pa/ /kun byed nga las byas pa yi/ /rgyu 'bras 'das las gol ba
@#/ /yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po khyed nyon cig /nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa dang / /nga las byung ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas dang //
nga las byung ba'i 'khor gnas dus la sogs/ /kun kyang nga yi byang chub sems yin na/ /sems dpa' rdo rje de la rtog mi rtog /sems dpa' rdo rje de la ma rtog cig /nga ni ye nas kun
byed byang chub sems/ /nga yis byas pa kun kyang byang chub sems/ /nga yi rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag byang / /nga yis kun la khyab pa ye nas chub/ /nga yis rang bzhin gsal ba ye
nas sems/ /nga ni nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ye nas yin pa'i byang chub sems kyis ni/ /'jig rten sgyu mar snang ba'i chos bzhin du/ /sku gsum ston pa dus
gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ /bu dang tsha bo 'khor gyi tshul byung nas/ /ma nor bden pa'i gdam ngag 'bogs pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems ni nam mkha' bzhin bstan
nas/ /kun byed byung tshul nam mkha' bzhin du bstan/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las/ /chos thams cad byang chub sems kun byed
las byung ba'i khungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir nyid
las byung ba'i tshig 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig /nga ni chos rnams kun byed rgyal po ste/ /sku gsum ston pa'i pha ma nga yin la/ /dus gsum
sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin/ /'khor gnas dus kyi ston pa'i sgron ma byed/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/ /sku gsum ston pa nga las byung bas ni/ /sku gsum
de yi bshad lugs rnam gsum gyis/ /chos kyi bshad lugs rnam pa gsum yang bstan/ /de yang kun byed nga yis bstan pa yin/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis rang bzhin 'di//
ston pa kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam pa lngas/ /ma nor nges pa'i gtan tshigs khungs bstan to/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/
kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni ye nas rdzogs pa che/ /rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras 'das/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i bshad lugs bstan pa dang / /
kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ /sku gsum ston pa byung ba'i bshad lugs dang / /rnam pa gnyis kyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o/ /kun byed byang chub sems kyi
bshad lugs ni/ /byang chub sems ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lnga yis bshad/ /sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi bshad lugs ni/
@#/ /phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga nang du/ /chos kyi sku ni byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bo ston/ /sprul pa'i sku ni don
rnams tshig tu sdeb/ /sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ste/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bshad lugs yin/ /kun byed nga ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa ste/ /rgyu 'bras
'das pas spyod yul kun las 'das/ /kun las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po yin/ /snying po yin pas yid ches khungs kyang
bstan/ /byang chub sems ni chos kun rtsa ba ste/ /rtsa ba yin pas thams cad don yang 'dus/ /byang chub sems ni khyad par kun las 'phags/ /khyad par 'phags
pas theg pa'i shan yang 'byed/ /byang chub sems rtogs chos nyid kun sangs rgyas/ /des na skal ldan dgos ched bstan pa yin/ /sems kyi rang bzhin tshig tu brjod med
ste/ /ma brjod sems kyi rang bzhin mi snang bas/ /mi snang mtshon du med ces ma brjod na/ /kun kyang rang sems ma mthong rtsol sgrub byed/ /des na brjod med tshig
gi don yang bshad/ /des na gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lngas/ /kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems kyi don/ /ma nor nges par gtan la 'bebs par byed/ /rgyu
'bras med par gtan la phab pa yin/ /thams cad byang chub sems yin yid kyang ches/ /byang chub sems yin ye nas yid ches pas/ /sems la btsal ba med par yid
kyang ches/ /btsal du ye nas med par yid ches pas/ /mi rtsol bde ba chen po ngang la gnas/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin de ltar gnas/ /kun byed nga la sangs rgyas gzhan
med do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ gtan tshigs bshad lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas byang
chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du gzhag pa'i phyir bya med rdzogs pa'i lung khungs chen po 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /kye/ bya
med yul ni mi gnas nam mkha' 'dra/ /mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam/ /bsngo ba'i cha shas phra mo'i yul la byung ba ste/ /rtog sgom chos
kyi sku ni khyad par don med pas/ /rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas/ /bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med/ /yan lag chos kyi dbang
gis snying po'i yul tshol zhing / /rnam pa cir yang mi rtog thabs kyis de la rol/ /snying po rang bzhin 'byung bas chos sku gzhan na med/ /rdul phran gcig la gtses
@#/ /shing phyogs bcu kun dang bral/ /mi gnas don nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang 'byung ste/ /mngon sum kun la mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la//
rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob/ /mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pas chags pa'i gnas med de/ /de bzhin bzung ba'i yul med sems kyi
gnas kyang med/ /mngon sum thob par 'dod nas rgyu la rtag tu sgom/ /sgom chags bde ba de la mnyam pa'i don mi 'byung / /sku gcig kun la khyab pas bsnan
pa'i chos med de/ /mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med/ /chos kyi rol pas nyams phag lhag pa'i gnas med de/ /rang 'byung che ba'i yul la kun tu ji
bzhin gnas/ /ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i mig /gang la thos par mi rigs snyad pa kun dang bral/ /chos dang chos min rtag tu 'dres shing
mtshungs/ /don dam chos shes lhag pa'i gnas shes bshad pa'ang med/ /'khrul dang byang chub lam de rtog pas thob pa'ang med/ /rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha'
dang bral/ /ye nas rgyal ba'i bdag nyid mngon sum gnas pa la/ /grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung / /med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po
'byung / /stong de stong pa ma yin stong pa'i yul la gnas/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin de la 'byung ba'i dran pa skye/ /bya bral zin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len/ /bza' ba'i yul med
de la ye shes 'byung ba rtsom/ /sngon gyi drang srong rjes su chags pa'i yid kyang 'jog/ rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung bas kun tu zin ta re/ /rang bzhin lam der zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yi//
ji bzhin pa zhes rnam rtog de phyir rtog bsgom pa/ /bde ba chen po 'dod pas chags pa'i nad yin te/ /mi g.yo mnyam par gnas pas sman chen ma byas na/ /mtho ris bgrod pa'i rgyu des nyon mongs
zin par 'gyur/ /lam med lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi nad che ba/ /phyin par 'dod pas ri dwags smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/ /rnyed pa'i yul med 'jig rten gsum du mi 'byung zhing / /sa
bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub sgrib pa yin/ /shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral/ /bshes gnyen kun las 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /dmigs pa med cing
'gyur pa'i gnas la mi ltos par/ /rang gi rang bzhin legs par re ba thams cad skong / /brtags na med la bzhag na legs pa 'byung ba che/ /dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha lugs
kun la stan/ /bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod/ /thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan/ /nang nas ma g.yos nang du btsal ba'i gnas
@#/ /med de/ /yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med/ /mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje de yis ni/ /gzhan gyi nong min mi 'ong ye nas
gnas pa yin/ /bde ba 'dod na bde la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /bde bas zin te bde bas bde ba tshol/ /byang chub 'khrul pa ye rnga ma chos la za/ /'di lta'i yul can sangs rgyas
mthong ba med/ /sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med/ /sangs rgyas ston pas ming du brtags pa nor/ /sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byed nor pa'i lam/ /gzugs med chos
kun bshad pa rdul tsam med/ /zin dang chags dang bral dang zhi/ /dngos po med dang rnam par spong / /bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la/ /bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med/ /yangs so che'o
chos chen po/ /chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin/ /che la dmigs pa'i cha bsnyams nas/ /chung che de rnams dmigs dang bral/ /gsung dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang / /sgyu mkhan ri
mo'i rnam pa bzhin/ /'byung 'jug ye shes rmugs pa yis/ /de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni theg pa kun gyi rgyal/ /btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin te/ /'dod pa med cing
len pa med/ /brod pa rdul tsam mi bskyed do/ /khyung chen nam mkha' lding ba bzhin/ /spro ba med cing bsdu ba med/ /stor bar mi dogs bza' ba med/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du ye gnas la/ /chos
rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar byed/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med/ /byang chub snying por de ma thag /ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung / /
snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/ /mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la/ /skye zhing 'pho ba'i chos med de/ /rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po/ /skur pas brtags
pas bshad pa yin/ /'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du/ /mkhas pas de bzhin shes par gyis/ /'gro ba rgyud drug snang ba yang / /dang po'i lam du shes par bya/ /'dod spyod snying rjes
brlan pas na/ /gang du dga' bar byang chub spyod/ /shan pa smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga/ /kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong / /yongs su rdzogs pa chos kyi rtsis/ /bde ba che las gzhan
med do/ /yang chos thams cad de bas na/ /chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin pas/ /chos kyis chos nyid btsal ba dang / /nam mkha' nam mkhas btsal ba dang / /gzhan la ltos pa'i
chos nyid ni/ /me yis me gsod pa 'dra ste/ /shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa'o/ /rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di/ /yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med/ /mi len byang chub spyod rnams la/ /
rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu las/ /mi gnas yul med kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
@#/ /byed rgyal po des lta ba yul med kyi lung 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ni/ /rang gi byang chub sems yin
pas/ /de la blta ba'i yul ma mchis/ /mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid/ /de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs pa ste/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni de la bya/ /dbang po lnga la snang ba rnams/ /rang
gsal de la mi rtog pas/ /de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas/ /rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid du gnas/ /tshig dang yi ge don brtags pas/ /tshig yig don la brtag med pas//
rtog med mnyam pa de bzhin nyid/ /de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas/ /bsam du med pa'i don 'di ni/ /nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bya med rdzogs
pa las/ lta ba yul med kyi nam mkha'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des bya med rdzogs pa'i lung
phyag rgya bzhugs tshul kyi le'u 'di bstan to/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sems nyid kun tu bzang po yi/ /bzhugs tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste/ /byang chub sems su bzhugs
tsam na/ /chos rnams kun gyi snying por bzhugs/ /de rtogs kun byed rgyal po yin/ /kun byed rgyal po 'gyur ba med/ /des na 'gyur ba med par bstan/ /chos kyi sku ru
bzhugs tsam na/ /bzung 'dzin spros dang bral nas bzhugs/ /gzung 'dzin bral la 'gyur ba med/ /longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs tsam na/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
ldan pas/ /'dod pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs/ /sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs tsam na/ /gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam na/ /gang la gang dgos sku sprul nas/ /dgos pa phun
sum tshogs par bzhugs/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/ /chos kun phyag rgya nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid/ /sku gsum mtshan
nyid de bzhin gnas/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid du gnas/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos kun ni/ /ji bzhin pa la bcos su med/ /btsal zhing bsgrub pa thams cad kyis/ /snga ba bgrod pas
phyin pa gcig kyang med/ /snga pa byas pas zin pa gcig kyang med/ /bsgrubs shing btsal bas snga ba grub pa med/ /thams cad ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub
kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /bya med rdzogs pa phyag rgya 'gyur med kyi lung gi le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des khams
gsum gyi sems can la rang gi sems ston pa yin par bstan pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/ /rang gi byang chub sems de ni/ /ston pa yin
@#/ /par mngon bstan na/ /bskal pa brgya phrag stong du ni/ /rang sems ston par ma mthong bas/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /rang sems ston pa mngon
phyung bas/ /rang sems ston pa'i chos nyon cig /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /kun rgyu byang chub sems las ni/ /sems kyi ngo bo 'byung chen lnga/ /ston pa byang chub sems lnga
phyung / /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /chos ni rang gi ngo bos 'chad/ /ston ni rang gi rang bzhin ston/ /ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de/ /dgongs pa nyid la nyid mi rtog/
yul chos gzhan la'ang rtog mi byed/ /byang chub sems kyi ston pa lngas/ /kun kyang chos nyid de bzhin ston/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/ /ston pa sa yi skur byung nas//
tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/ /rang gi rang bzhin ston byed pa/ /bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog /mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston/ /khams gsum sems can thams
cad kyis/ /de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rtsol ba'i chos nyid ma btsal 'grub/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/ /ston pa chu yi skur byung nas/ /tshig dang yi ges mi
ston te/ /rang gi ngo bos ston byed pa/ /bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog /mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/ /de rtogs sangs
rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rtsol ba'i chos ni ma btsal 'grub/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/ /ston pa me yi skur byung nas/ /tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/ /rang gi ngo bos chos
ston pa/ /bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog /mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/ /de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rtsol
ba'i chos nyid ma btsal grub/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/ /ston pa rlung gi skur byung nas/ /tshig dang yi ges mi ston par/ /rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa/ /bdag
gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par/ /mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa'i ston/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/ /de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rtsol ba'i chos
ni ma btsal grub/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/ /ston pa nam mkha'i skur byung nas/ /tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/ /rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa/ /bdag gzhan gnyis su
mi rtog par/ /mi 'byed pa yi dgongs pa ston/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/ /sngon phyung ston pa de rnams kyis/ /rang gi ngo bos chos 'chad pa/ /'di yis kun
kyang rig par gyis/ /kye/ khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/ /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /khyed rnams nga yis byas pa'i phyir/ /nga yi sras yin nga dang mnyam/ /nga dang mi
@#/ /gnyis nga yin phyir/ /nga yis khyed la mngon phyung ba/ /nga yi ngo bo ston pa lngas/ /rang bzhin rnam lnga gcig tu bstan/ /gcig ni kun byed pa yin
gyi/ /de bzhin khyed kyang yid ches kyis/ /kye/ khams gsum sems can ma lus kun/ /nga med tsam na khyed kyang med/ /khyed med tsam gyi dus tsam na/ /ston pa lnga yang 'byung mi
'gyur/ /mi rtog chos kyang ston mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ rang sems ston par phyung ba'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o// //
de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems las byung ba'i chos chen po lnga ston par byung ba'i rtags su ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di
gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems/ /ston pa'i sgron mar gyur pas yon tan rab bsngags pa/ /chos kyi
snying por gyur pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid/ /bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas/ /tshul khrims la sogs spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i/ /ji snyed rnam par
grol ba'i lam bstan pa/ /bde gshegs yum 'gyur kun gyi mtshungs lam de/ /de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam/ /phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam
ste mi rtog rtog las 'das/ /mi gnas mi dmigs spros med bsam pa kun dang bral/ /tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang kha dog spyod yul med/ /bstan cing brtag par dka' la brjod
du rdul tsam med/ /sngon gyi drang srong lam du gang zhugs pa/ /bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin ta re/ /ston pa'i lung bzhin tshig gi mtha' spyod lam du de mthong na/ /de ni
rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/ /yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med/ /yang dag nyid du bstan pa nga yis 'khrul/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis med 'dres
shing mtshungs/ /rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed ye shes gti mug dang / /thogs med gsal ba'i mar me bsam pa kun dang bral/ /ngang gis mi g.yo rmugs shing ting 'dzin rgyal
por gnas/ /mngon sum mthong bas mthong med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig /de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya/ /mtha' dang dbus med yongs pa'i snying po
la/ /mi len mi 'dor mnyam pa'i rgyal por gnas/ /sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs/ /'dzin pas brtags shing snang ba'i chos rnams ni/ /
rang gi rgyan du snang bas mi 'dor spong mi byed/ /cir yang mi dgongs thabs kyis de la rol/ /kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos/ /nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams
@#/ /med lnga po yi/ /rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob/ /bud med la sogs kun kyang spong mi byed/ /lo rgyus don gnyis tshad//
ma'i blor bzhag nas/ /ting 'dzin gsum po brten nas grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa/ /rtsod bral lung las gol zhes 'khrul pa yin/ /bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la
gnas/ /ye shes rang 'byung che ba'i snying po nyid/ /mi g.yo mi 'gyur bsnyad pa kun dang bral/ /zin pa'i bdud rtsis rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms/ /bya bral zin pa'i yul
la ji bzhin gnas/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos rnams thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na/ /spros pa med cing bsdus pa med/ /skye ba med cing
'gag pa med/ /'gog pa med par de bzhin gnas/ /rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di/ /nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas/ /rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ zhes
gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ bya med rdzogs pa sgom du med pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
po des nyid kyi gdams ngag phog pa dang mthun pa'i lung chen po rim gyis bstan te/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos rnams thams cad nga las byung ba na/ /ji ltar snang
ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /ye nas rnam dag dbyings kyi lung du bstan/ /phyi dang nang kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings/ /ye nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul la/ /sangs rgyas
dang ni sems can gnyis su med/ /lam dang gnyen pos bcos su ga la yod/ /bsgrub med rtsal sprugs smon pa med pas na/ /bya med lhun rdzogs snga ma de nyid don/ /rtog
spyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la/ /log rtog byis pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bslus/ /gnyis med bde chen sems can kun spyod la/ /'khrul pas nor pa'i lam du bstan
pa yang / /gong du bstan pa'i lam chen de la mi gnyis pas/ /mnyam par shes pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ /nga dang bdag tu rtog pa mu stegs 'khrul pa'i lam/ /byis pas
bslus pas chos spyod rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ni/ /phyin pa'i dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pas/ /chos nyid chos tshol rnyed par ga la 'gyur/ /tshad mar ma gyur slob dpon
spre 'dra'i lung / /bstan dang lam nor rtog pas zin ta re/ /de bas gser la nag tshur gtong ba yi/ /slob dpon yang dag ston pa'i rin chen mdzod/ /rin thang dpag tu med
pas blu bar 'os/ zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ bya med rdzogs pa rnam dag dbyings kyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o// //
@#/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin 'gyur med 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga yi rang bzhin
dbyings la 'gyur ba med/ /nga yi ye shes nam mkha' 'gyur ba med/ /nga yi chos nyid rang bzhin 'gyur ba med/ /nga sems chos kyi snying po 'gyur ba med/ /de bzhin thams cad
'gyur ba med pa la/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur chos la ming brtags nas/ /sprul pas lung bstan dbang po yul spong 'gyur/ /rang rkyen
chos lnga 'chang ba'i sems can la/ /rang 'byung chos nyid yin par lung ma bstan/ /ngan 'gro sdig sgrib che zhes lung bstan nas/ /lus ngag yid gsum sdig spong dge bcu
spyod/ /rang 'byung chos la blang dor spyad pa'i phyir/ /rang 'byung ye shes bskal mang phrad mi 'gyur/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sprul pa rang las 'dus pa'i 'khor
tshogs la/ /rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi chos spangs la/ /ye shes lnga spong dgra lnga choms lung bstan/ /dgra lnga rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs te/ /rang sems spong 'gyur nga
yis lung ma bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /rang gi sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la/ /don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis/ /sbyangs nas rgyu las
'bras bu 'byung zer nas/ /bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sbyong byed pa/ /sdom dang pha rol phyin bcus rang mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid 'gyur ba rang yis lung ma bstan/ /kye sems
dpa' chen po nyon cig /rang sems chos nyid ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas/ /dag pas chu zla bzhin du gsal byas nas/ /rjer ltas de la mnyes pa'i mchod phul bas/ /de
la re 'dod grub pa thob re ba/ /chu zla med de rang sems ma rtogs pas/ /skye ba bdun gyi bar du rang 'byung gi /ye shes yod ces nga yis lung ma bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen
po nyon cig /rang sems byin brlabs cho 'phrul bsgoms pa yi/ /ting 'dzin ye shes sems dpa' grogs mnyam des/ /bdag 'dod pa yi dngos grub ster re ba/ /rang
'byung chos nyid de la 'dod len med/ /rang sems bya med mi tshe gsum mi phrad/ /kun byed nga yis lung bstan ma yin no/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /rang las byung ba'i
chos nyid lhar byas nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang snying po 'phro 'du yis/ /mi 'gyur ba yi chos nyid rgyur sgrub byed/ /sems kyi ting 'dzin dbang gis thob sems pa/ /des kyang thob
par nga yis lung ma bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /gzhi ma dbyings la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir/ /dbyings de 'gyur par nga yis lung ma bstan/ /dbyings la dbang
@#/ /bsgyur byed pa'i sku gsum gyis/ /rang 'khor zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin bstan/ /des na 'dren pa'i lung du bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin nam
mkha' 'gyur ba med pa de/ /rang nyid nam mkhas nam mkha' 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa de/ /rang nyid chos kyis chos nyid 'grub mi 'gyur//
de bzhin sems nyid 'gyur ba med pa de/ /sems nyid rang gi sems nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/ /mi 'gyur sgyur bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ /dus dang smon lam re ba 'jog
pa yi/ /dus la ltos pas ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur/ /kun byed nga yis nges lung bstan pa med/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ bya
med rdzogs pa 'gyur med btsal mi rnyed pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nges sems rnal du bzhag pa 'di
gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga ni kun byed byang chub sems/ /chos rnams thams cad nga yin te/ /nga yi rang bzhin thams cad ni/ /ye nas rnal du
bzhag pa yin/ /nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /ston pa bstan pa 'khor gnas dus/ /rnam lnga rang bzhin rnal du bzhag /ston pa'i rang
bzhin 'di ltar bzhag /chos sku ma bcos rnal du bzhag /rang nga'i rang bzhin de bzhag yin/ /longs spyod ma bcos ngo bo bzhag /nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa yin/ /sprul
pa ma bcos thugs rje bzhag /nga yi rang bzhin gzhag pa ste/ /rang 'byung ye shes bzhag pa yin/ /gnas ni gang na gnas pa'i gnas/ /de yang rnal du bzhag pa yin/ /
dus ni snga phyi gang tshogs dus/ /rnal bzhag dus su tshogs pa yin/ /kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig /phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga/ /ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa las//
chos zhes bya ba gzhan yod med/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ phun sum tshogs par ma 'dus pa'i/ /chos ni gcig kyang yod ma gsungs/ /kye/nga ni rnal du bzhag pa yis/ /
thams cad chos nyid grol ba yin/ /ston pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/ /bstan pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/ /'khor yang ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/ /kye/
thams cad grol bar bshad pas na/ /rang lus ma bcos lha ma bsgom/ /smra ba'i tshig dang ngag ma 'chos/ /ting 'dzin ma byed sems ma 'chos/ /bcos pas rnal du 'byor
med pas/ /rnal du ma 'byor grol mi 'gyur/ /ma grol chos nyid mnyam mi thob/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ /byang chub sems kyi kun byed rgyal po ni/ /ye nas
@#/ /'das pa'i rnal du bzhag pa la/ /lta ba rnams kyis rnal du 'jog mi shes/ /rdzogs chen kun byed ye nas rnal bzhag la/ /nyan thos rang rgyal
rnams kyis thos mthong na/ /dug skye zer nas rang sems spong 'gegs 'gyur/ /des kyang lta ba rnal du 'jog ma shes/ /bskal pa grangs med 'jog mi shes la gnas//
theg chen mdo sdes rdzogs chen thos 'gyur na/ /rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te/ /ji bzhin nyid du 'jog pa ma shes te/ /bgrod cing spyod la bskal pa gsum du
gnas/ /rjes su rnal 'byor sems dpas thos 'gyur na/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams de bzhin la/ /rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par/ /ji bzhin rnal du
'jog pa ma shes pas/ /byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/ /byin rlobs sems la mi tshe bdun par gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis thos 'gyur na/ /
rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin pas na/ /ye nas yin la gdod rtsol sgrub par byed/ /stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag drug tu ni/ /ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa mi shes te/ /
ting 'dzin gsum gyi sa la gnas par byed/ /yongs su rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na/ /ye nas yin la rgyu 'bras ming brtags nas/ /ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma
shes te/ /rgyu ni dag pa chos kyi dbyings su grub/ /'bras bu dag pa ye shes dkyil 'khor grub/ /bar mchod kyis mi tshe gcig tu gnas/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rnams kyis
thos 'gyur na/ /ye nas sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur/ /bya med bde ba chen po 'di yis thob/ /bsgrub pa med par ye nas sangs rgyas thob/ /lha mi sems can dbang po
mi mthun te/ /la la dbang po sbyangs pa'i 'phro can yod/ /la la dbang po ye nas chig chod yod/ /des na dgos ched don zhes bstan pa yin/ /a ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po zhes
bya ba/ /a ti zhes ni sgra yi tshig tu bstan/ /a ni ma skyes chos nyid rnal du bzhag /ti ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub par bsten/ /yo ga shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la/ /rgyu dang
'bras bu yod zer smra byed pa/ /de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed na/ /sgro dang skur ba 'debs pa'i tshig yin te/ /de yis gnyis su
med pa rtogs pa med/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yang / /gnyis su ma mthong rnal bzhag nyid du 'dod/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
po las/ dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi snying po sems dpa' rdo rje la/ sems
@#/ /dpa' rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa'i lung mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig /sems
dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid la/ /nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan par bya/ /nyid ni kun byed nga yin te/ /nga ni ye nas byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems ni 'di lta'o/ /des na byang chub
gyi sems kun byed rgyal po des mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan nam mkha' che 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che/ /kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings/ /
rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir/ /mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs/ /byams pas don nyid rnam sbyangs phyir/ /snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ /che bas che ba'i zab mo
yis/ /yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med/ /don rnams ji bzhin mi bskyod de/ /bya ba med pas grol bas grol/ /nges 'byung ye shes btsal med pas/ /grol na grol
ba'i lam yang ston/ /'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /grol ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang / /grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las
min/ /che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba/ /shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub/ /ming tsam gzhan la brten 'dra yang / /mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung / /cho 'phrul
chen po dka' ba min/ /yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams/ /ji bzhin rtog pa phra ba yis/ /de ma thag tu rang las 'byung / /snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /ma btsal bzhag
pas bsgoms pa yin/ /de dang der ni rnam btsal na/ /de las de bzhin de mi 'byung / /mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni/ /rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin
lce yi dbang pos kyang / /de la brjod du rdul tsam med/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems/ /kun tu chub pas rnam par grol/ /de la bskyod pa med bzhin du/ /nam mkha'i
mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas/ /khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa la/ /las so zhes ni rnam par brtags/ /ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na/ /rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin/ /rgyu
nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra/ /ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med/ /gdod nas snying po byang chub la/ /btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod/ /yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan
ni/ /bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med/ /ma bsam ma sbyangs chos bzhin du/ /rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skyes/ /phra ba'i sgo mor ming brtags te/ /sems kyi dben
pa lam tshol zhing / /dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin cing / /brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags te/ /dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par
@#/ /sel/ /'jig rten 'di las 'byung ngo zhes/ /blang dor phrod pa mchog tu bskyed/ /chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam/ /dbu ma bzhin te brag cha
'dra/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes/ /'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang / /byang chub chen po'i lam las byung / /
kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang / /chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs/ /nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing / /rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra/ /mi chags nam mkha'i
sngo ba las/ /rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung / /rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku/ /gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra/ /kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis/ /A li kA li zab tu
bstan/ /'di ni a dang mdzes pa'i ta/ /pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin/ /'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung / /e ma'o sangs
rgyas spyod yul 'di/ /btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de/ /drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas/ /mdongs pas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin/ /gong nas gong du tshangs
pa'i lam/ /bya bral chos dang mthun pa min/ /ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na/ /nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med/ /de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir/ /de la de bstan de yang
thob/ /de ni snying po de bas na/ /de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che/ /sngon gyi de dang da ltar de/ /de bzhin de yi gnas su che/ /de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba/ /de ni de yi rang bzhin no/ /de
dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam/ /zla ba las byung rten dang bcas/ /kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la/ /phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med/ /da ltar bde dang phyi mar bde/ /mngon sum pa
dang rgyab nas 'byung / /de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas/ /de la brten par mi bya'o/ /dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med/ /sngon med phyis med gdod nas 'byung / /chos skus
khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir/ /che ba'i chen po rang bzhin gnas/ /srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang / /ming tsam sgyu mar snang ba ste/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas chen yang / /sgyu
ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin/ /rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams/ /dus de 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /ma bral smon pa spyod pas na/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin/ /
gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas/ /ma byung ma skyes snying po la/ /sgros btags chos kun ga la yod/ /phyi nang gnyis ka phyi nyid
nang / /zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med/ /srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs/ /de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral/ /de la tha tshig phyi dang nang / /rang bzhin phung po khams
@#/ /bzhin gnas/ /dus gsum 'di dang mi 'bral bas/ /tha tshig ming du btags pa med/ /mi g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya/ /mi bskyod pas ni ye shes te/ /mi
len pa ni bdag med cing / /mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do/ /gang dang gang gi gang du yang / /kun 'khol kun spyod bdag las byung / /'di la skyes pa bud med ces/ /
mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs/ /'di la brtul zhugs drag shul gyis/ /gnas su bya ba'i ming med de/ /a dang par ni rnam ldan na/ /sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung
bar 'dod/ /rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas/ /ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang / /snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang / /de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin/ /byang chub yan
lag kun gyi sgo/ /cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin/ /ma gos ma chags 'byung 'gyur yang / /bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor khro gnyer
cha lugs kyis/ /khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas/ /yi ge mngon du byung na yang / /zhi bde nyid mthong ba min/ /nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na/ /ta la'i mgo bo bcad
pa dang / /sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang / /de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston/ /rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa/ /gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye/ /mtshan ma med pa'i dbang
gis ni/ /bsti gnas de las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni/ /rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang / /bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas/ /sgyu ma lhun grub yul
la rol/ /lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs/ /'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas/ /nam mkha' bzhin te mtha' mnyam zhing / /gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin/ /lhun gyis
grub pa'i bde chen de/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rang gi mthu yi rig pa las/ /chos ni gzhan las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'/ /mngon sum
mi gnas kun tu khyab/ /ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di/ /bya bral nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ /cir
yang mi dmigs gti mug las/ /de ma thag tu rang las byung / /'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam/ /'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/ /bus pas bslad pas 'khrul
pa'i phyir/ /sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin/ /go ba'i yul na bde ba che/ /'di ni rnam dag 'jig rten yin/ /de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla
'og 'grub/ /ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las/ /rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang / /de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba/ /'byung ba lnga bas gtso chen yin/ /'das dang ma 'ongs
@#/ /da ltar gyi/ /tha snyad ming la mi gnas te/ /skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing / /de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor/ /mnyam pas rim par
bkod pa med/ /gcig pas phyogs bcu bsod dang bral/ /tshogs kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang / /rang bzhin gnas pas 'grim pa med/ /lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo
zhing / /gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin/ /'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med/ /yid kyis bsam pas yon gdags te/ /bltas
pas tshogs ni bkram pa'o/ /mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la/ /de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o/ /yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin/ /dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig
ste/ /thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yis/ /gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin/ /mi bzung gtong bas gtong ma yin/ /bya ba med pa'i las rnams te/ /mi rtog ye shes bgegs
bsal nas/ /ma gsungs mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go /bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang / /de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang / /ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med
na/ /byas na 'ching ba chen por 'gyur/ /de bas de lung de nyid la/ /de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur/ /de ltar de la de rtog na/ /de la de nyid grub pa med/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang
chub kyis sems kun byed rgyal po las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
byed rgyal po des kun byed kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa 'di gsungs/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang / /cha shas
nyid du spros dang bral/ /ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang / /rnam par snang mdzad kun tu bzang / /zin pas rtsol ba'i nad spangs te/ /lhun gyis gnas pas bzhag pa yin/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des
sems dpa' rdo rje la ma byas don grub kyi lung nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis/ /ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid
du gcig /'di la su yang 'chos par ma byed cig /ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de la ni/ /mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi
sems kun byed rgyal po las/ nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid las byung ba'i chos
@#/ /nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba/ chos thams cad rig par byed pa'i rgyal po rang 'byung gi ye shes de la nyid kyi rang
bzhin rtogs par dka' ba 'di bstan to/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig /sgra yis don de rtogs rigs byos/ /kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi
dbyings yin na/ /dbyings kyi sgra don ji ltar rig par byed/ /kun gyi lung yul nam mkha'i khams 'di la/ /nam mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig par byed/ /mngon du gsal
ba 'byung ba lnga yin na/ /mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig /de las byung ba'i khams gsum sems can ni/ /de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir
nga la nyon/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye/ ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /rnam bzhi bstan pa'i sgra yis bdag gis
rtogs/ /dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs/ /nam mkha'i sgra yis ma bsgribs gsal bar rtogs/ /'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs/ /sems
can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed/ /de rig kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig /kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas kun byed rgyal
pos rig pa'i rgyal po la slar gsungs pa/ nga yi rang bzhin rtogs dka' 'di rig na/ /chos kyi mdo rtsa yan lag kun rig gis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su mtshan yang
btags/ /kye/ byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub sems/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di lta chos nyid 'di/ /sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste/ /de yi rang bzhin bdag gis
'di ltar mthong / /sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra/ /sems nyid ma bsgribs sgra ni nam mkha'i khams/ /sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra/ /rig pa so sor rtog
pa sems can sems/ /sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de/ /kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med do/ /ces gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ nga yi rang
bzhin de rig na/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rig pa yin/ /nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming
btags so/ /kye/ rig pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rig gyur na/ /nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/ /bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod
pa gsum gyis ni/ /bya ba'i las ni lta spyod sna tshogs kyis/ /'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig /ces gsungs so/ /rig
@#/ /pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/ /kye/ kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi/ /sku gsum ston pa khyod kyi ngo bo gsum/ /de gsum bstan pa rnam gsum
khyod kyi ldem dgongs te/ /rig pa so so'i sems la ldem dgongs bstan/ /de dag gang la dgongs nas ldem po bsten/ /mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol la dgongs pa'i phyir/ /rang
re gang 'thad yul la ldem du gzhug /sku gsum ston pa drang lung ston pa des/ /la las sa dang lam gyi 'bras bu bstan/ /la las dngos min chu zla'i 'bras bu bstan/ /la las
nyid kyis nyid bsgrub 'bras bu bstan/ /sku gsum bstan pa ldem dgongs lung bstan te/ /nges par ma bstan drang ba'i lung bstan te/ /mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting
'dzin yin/ /rgyu 'bras theg chen drang ba'i lung du bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye/ rig pa'i rgyal po sems dpa' rdo rje nyon/ /don dam nges pa'i lung zhes bstan pa ni/ /rig
pa'i rgyal pos rig gam bstan du med/ /mi gnas dmigs par bya ba'i yul ma yin/ /mi rtog rtog las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ /ting 'dzin mi bsgom bsam pa'i
yul dang bral/ /'dod pa'i sems med blang ba'i 'bras bu med/ /mi rtog ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des/ /lam la ma bgrod sangs rgyas sa ru phyin/ /rig pa ma sbyangs rang
'byung ye shes rnyed/ /phrin las ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub/ /dam tshig mi sdom rang bzhin rnam par dag /yul dang dbang po de bzhin nyid du gsal/ /sangs rgyas
sems can gnyis su ma mthong ste/ /de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig par mthong / /de bzhin nyid la gcig dang du ma med/ /ma byung ma skyes pa yi snying po la/ /sgros kyis
btags pa'i tha snyad ga la yod/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal/ /sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sgros skur bral/ /nga yi
rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la/ /sku gsum ston pas so sor bstan pa yang / /de bzhin nyid la drang ba'i lung bstan yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed
rgyal po las/ nges pa'i lung dang / drang ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi dgongs pa nyid la 'dus pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so/ /kye/ rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgra nyon cig /kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi/ /dgongs pa'i don ni nga la 'dus/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di la ni/ /sku 'dus gsung 'dus dgongs pa 'dus/ /nga yi sgra nyon dgongs 'dus gyis/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye/
@#/ /ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rnam gzigs gtsug tor la sogs te//
rabs bdun shAkya thub pa dang / /stong rtsa gnyis kyi sangs rgyas dang / /lhun gyis grub dang rdul snyed kyi/ /dgongs pa khyod la 'dus lags sam/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas kun
byed rgyal po sa yin pa'i sgra brjod pa/ /kye/ rtogs pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /ho ho yin pa'i sgra brjod de/ /dpe dang don dang rtog gsum gyis/ /dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don
bstan pa/ /nga yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/ /nga yi don ni chos nyid yin/ /nga yi ngo bo byang chub sems/ /kye/ nga ni ma bsgribs rtog pa med/ /rtog med nam mkha' chos kyi
sku/ /nga ni mi rtog blang dor med/ /blang dor med de nam mkha' 'dra/ /nam mkha' blang dor med pa bzhin/ /kun tu bzang la blang dor med/ /blang dor med pa nga las 'dus/ /
kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kye/ nga ni ma skyes nam mkha' 'dra/ /ma skyes pa yin nam mkha' bzhin/ /rdo rje sems la skye ba med/ /skye med dgongs pa nga la 'dus/ /
rnam gzigs rabs bdun shAkya thub/ /stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang / /lhun grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /dgongs pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /skye med mi
rtog blang dor med/ /dpe yis nga la 'das par bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kye/ gong shad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dgongs pa don gyis 'dus pa ni/ /kun
byed rgyal po 'i rang bzhin ni/ /skye ba med par bstan pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kun la skye med pas/ /skye med chos nyid 'dus par bstan/ /kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin la/ /
chos nyid 'gag pa med pa bzhin/ /gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos nyid la ni 'gag pa med/ /des na chos nyid 'dus par bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen po
nyon cig /rtags kyis 'dus par bstan pa ni/ /rtags ni kun rtags byang chub sems/ /kun byed rgyal po sems kyis ni/ /chos kyi sku dang kun tu bzang / /rdo rje sems la
sogs pa yi/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/ /snying po rtags ni sems su 'dus/ /des nad dpe don gsum du 'dus/ /kye/ kun byed rgyal po nga la ni/ /spyi 'dus
sgo 'dus dgongs pa 'dus/ /spyi 'dus dpe don rtogs 'dus la/ /sgo 'dul rnam pa lnga 'dus te/ /chos sku dgongs pa 'dus pa ni/ /mi rtog mnyam pa nyid 'dus la/ /
mi g.yo cho 'phrul 'byin par nus/ /longs spyod sku yi dgongs 'dus pa/ /mngon sum rang bzhin snang ba dang / /'dod pa tshogs pas 'byin par 'dus/ /kun bzang
@#/ /dgongs pa 'dus pa ni/ /ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru/ /kun byed mngon du phyung bar 'dus/ /rdo rje sems
dgongs 'dus pa ni/ /ma skye mi 'gag dgongs pa 'dus/ /rabs bdun shAkya thub pa dang / /stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang / /sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad pa'i/ /
byung yang sku gsung thugs las byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi chos nyid la/ /sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad tshul/ /de yang kun byed nyid du 'dus/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
pho brang na/ /nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas na/ /nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med/ /ces gsungs pas der sems dpa' rdo rje
sdangs te brgyal lo/ /der brgyal sangs nas zhus pa/ /kye/ 'dus pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig /byas pa'i chos dang kun 'dus na/ /ma byas pa yang kun 'dus sam/ /ma
byung ba yang kun 'dus sam/ /chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams/ /mu stegs phyin ci log lta ba/ /rtag chad gnyis su lta ba yang / /khyod kyi ma nor dgongs yin na/ /
sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdags/ /mu stegs sangs rgyas ci la rgya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyal
po des bka' stsal pa/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na/ /kun kyang 'dus par yid ches na/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni/ /nga yi rang
bzhin rtogs mi 'dra/ /rtogs mi 'dra bas yid mi ches/ /kun byed byang chub sems rtogs shig /kun byed byang chub sems rtogs na/ /rang 'byung byang chub sems de yis/ /rtag
chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te/ /ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba yis/ /rtag pa'i dngos po mtha' bsal la/ /rang 'byung ye shes 'gyur med pas/ /med pa chad pa'i mtha'
yang bsal/ /mu zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings/ /stegs zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis mthong ba/ /kun byed byang chub sems mthong / /
zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
byed rgyal pos nyid kyi bstan pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung rgya 'bras rtsol sgrub las 'das pa 'di bstan te/ kye sems dpa' chen po/ nga yi spyod
yul 'di ni dka' ba ste/ /sgo dang lta ba dang ni dam tshig dang / /phrin las dang ni bgrod lam gnas pa dang / /ye shes chos nyid rnam pa brgyad po 'di/ /sku gsum theg pa rnam
@#/ /pa lnga po yi/ /theg pa gzhan dang lta spyod mi mthun te/ /sgo ni btsal du med pa'i sgo nas 'jug /lta ba bsgom du med par bstan pa yin/ /dam tshig
bsrung du med par bstan pa yin/ /phrin las btsal du med par bstan pa yin/ /lam la bgrod du med par bstan pa yin/ /gnas sa sbyang du med par bstan pa yin/ /
ye shes mi rtog bskyod pa med pa yin/ /chos nyid ji bzhin bcos su med pa yin/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po don 'di ni/ /rgyu 'bras theg pa can la bstan 'gyur na/ /
'jig rten rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos bzhin du/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bas mi rigs zer/ /rgyu ni khams gsum sems can las bsgrubs nas/ /'bras bu dus gsum
sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod/ /rgyu ni lta ba bsgom pa byas pa yis/ /gang bsgoms 'bras bu de thob 'dod na/ /bsgom pa de yis 'bras bu thob pa med/ /thams cad
ji bzhin pa yi chos yin pas/ /ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed pa ni/ /brdzun gyis bden pa bslus pa sdig re che/ /lta bsgom dam tshig la sogs rtsol bsgrub kyis/ /
dbang po yul la yengs pa phral nas ni/ /dben pa'i yul la thabs kyis khrid nas ni/ /rtog med mnyam pa'i thibs kyis bstan pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub
kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos
thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du 'dus pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs shig /nga ni byang chub
sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po yin/ /kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyis ma byas gcig kyang med/ /
dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyis byas/ /khams gsum sems can lus ngag yid gsum yang / /kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas/ /snang srid
snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kyang / /ji bzhin ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du/ /kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / sems dpa' rdo
rjes slar zhus pa/ /kye/ kun byed rgyal po byed pa'i bdag po lags/ /ma rig ma rtogs don dI bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar byas pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /zhes
zhus pas/ kye/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin/ /sku ni chos nyid mngon du phyung ba des/ /kun bzang rol pa rmad du byung ba byas
@#/ /gsung gi sgra tshig mngon du bsgrags nas ni/ /don gyi chos nyid tshig gis go bar bstan/ /thugs ni rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med kyis/ /ston
pa ye shes sgron ma byas nas ni/ /chos nyid don gyi ngo bo ma nor ston/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen pos don 'di rtogs par gyis/ /snang srid snod bcud de ltar snang ba las/ /nga
la sku yi ngo bo gzhan med pas/ /rang gi ngo bos 'chad cing ston pa yin/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang / /ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /kye/ sems
dpa' chen po nyon cig /sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i sgra grag dang / /rgyud drug sems can rnams kyi sgra tshig 'di/ /kun byed nga yi gsung las gzhan med pas/ /tshig sgra don
gyis bsdebs bshad de la bya/ /kye/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang / /ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /khams gsum
rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang / /'byung chen lnga yi mi rtog mnyam nyid dang / /chos nyid mi skye yi rtog mi 'gag ste/ /kun byed nga yi thugs su de las med/ /sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod kyis ni/ /ma rtog gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig /sems dpa' chen pos 'di lung ma bstan na/ /nga yi rang bzhin shin tu mi rtogs te/ /ma
rtogs nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur na/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / /la dgu lung dgu rgal
ba'i sa bcu dang / /tshe la dbang sgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa dang / /rig 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i gdung 'tshob kyis/ /kun byed nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur/ /kun byed nga
dang yun du ma phrad na/ /khams gsum rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can gyis/ /rang gi gang bzhin rang gis ngo mi shes/ /sa bcu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /
grangs med pa yi bskal pa gsum bgrangs kyang / /kun byed nga dang phrad par yong mi 'gyur/ /des kyang rang gi rang bzhin shes mi 'gyur/ /lus la dbang sgyu rig 'dzin
gsum gyis kyang / /lus kyis sangs rgyas longs sbyod sku bzung nas/ /yid kyi dbang po rang sems mthong med lta/ /des kyang kun byed rgyal po nga dang ni/ /rang gi rang
bzhin gnyis med de mi mthong / /ma mthong bar du tshi chad nad kyis zin/ /de bas nga yi rang bzhin lung ston cig /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal
po las/ sku gsung thugs su 'dus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid
@#/ /bsgom du med pa 'di bstan to/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la sogs te/ /rig 'dzin gyi ni sa la gnas pa dang / /sa la gnas pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' dang / /khams gsum sems can dus la bab pa yi/ /kun gyi don chen kun byed nga yin gyi/ /nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid byang chub sems/ /chos nyid
sems la bsgom med rtogs par gyis/ /rgyu 'bras ston pa'i sku gsum ston pas ni/ /nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid bsgom med la/ /'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos dang don
mthun par/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar lung bstan nas/ /bsgom pa'i lung ni 'di ltar so sor bstan/ /chos nyid byang chub sems gcig ngo bo la/ /sdug bsngal
kun 'byung bden pa rnam pa bzhis/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngan song rgyu zer na/ /chos nyid byang chub sems de spong bar byed/ /de yis chos nyid mi mthong spangs pa yin/ /
chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/ /don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnams gnyis kyis/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bcus/ /sa bcu lam la sbyangs te bgrod pa
yis/ /chos nyid ma mthong sbyong ba'i sa la gnas/ /chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs bzang sgo nas/ /byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul chen
po bzhis/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/ /byin gyis brlabs nas lha yi skur bsgom pa/ /de yis rang sems bsgom med mthong ba min/ /chos gcig byang
chub sems kyi ngo bo la/ /ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga rnam pa lngas/ /rang rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje phung po la/ /bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yi lha bsgoms nas/ /snang la rang bzhin med
pa byed pa ni/ /btsal zhing bsgrubs nas rang sems lhar bcos pas/ /des kyang rang sems bya med mthong ba min/ /rang gi chos nyid byang chub sems la ni/ /kun byed rgyal po
ston pa'i ston pas kyang / /rang sems ye nas chos nyid grol ba la/ /ston pa gsum la bsgom pa'i lung ma bstan/ /sgom sgrub btsal na rang sems spangs pa yin/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po rang sems grub 'dod na/ /'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir/ /rtog med mnyam pa nyid la gnas mi byed/ /blang dang dor med
yul la rang bzhin gnas/ /g.yos pa med pa'i ngang la ngang gis gnas/ /sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo de/ /chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub/ /ji bzhin pa la
'chos par ma byed cig /ngo bo nyid las gzhan du ma sgrub cig /rang nyid yin gyis gzhan du ma tshol cig /btsal na rgyal bas dbyings nas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sngar byas zin pas
@#/ /da ni byed mi bdog /sngar grub zin pas da grub mi byed par/ /mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par zhog /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /snga rabs
'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /rang gi sems las gzhan du chos btsal med/ /ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong / /ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa bsgom ma
myong / /rang sems mi rtog pa yis grub pa yin/ /da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa yang / /rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang
chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ bsgom du med pa'i mdo lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des
'khor gyi ston pa'i bstan pa gol sa dang / sgrib par gyur pa 'di bstan to/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi/ /bstan pa gsum ni
gol sgrib ste/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ /nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug /rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde ni/ /kun tu
'od kyi sa 'dod pa/ /bden pa gnyis kyi rtogs dpyod kyis/ /chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod/ /a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/ /rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems/ /rtog
dpyod 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs/ /rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni/ /mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad/ /kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa/ /dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas/ /
gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas/ /a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/ /gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems/ /gzung 'dzin 'das la kri yas bsgribs/ /rdzogs chen
gzung dang 'dzin byed pa/ /kri ya dag tu gol bar bshad/ /u pa ya yi lta spyod ni/ /kri ya spyod cing yo ga sgrub/ /lta spyod 'brel pa'i don med pas/ /gnyis su med pa'i don
ma rtogs/ /a ti yo ges bde chen ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis su med pa'i las u pas bsgrigs/ /rjogs chen gnyis su 'byed pa ni/ /u pa ya ru gol/
bar bshad/ /yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa/ /mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas/ /phrag rgya gzhi la gtsor byed de/ /blang dor med la 'jug mi nus/ /a ti yo ga'i/
bde chen ni/ /blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems/ /blang dor med la yo gas bsgribs/ /rdzogs chen blang dang dor byang pa/ /yo ga dag tu gol bar bshad/ /ma hA rdo rje/
'chang 'dod pa/ /thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas/ /rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /brnyen sgrub rnam bzhi sgrub par byed/ /a ti yo ga bde chen ni/ /rtsol
sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems/ /rtsol sgrub 'das la ma hA sa bsgribs/ /rdzogs chen rtsol sgrub byed pa ni/ /ma hA yo gar gol bar bshad/ /a nu dbye
med sa 'dod pa/ /dbyings dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la/ /rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings lta ba/ /'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor lta/ /a ti yo
ga'i bde chen ni/ /rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems/ /rgyu 'bras 'das la a nus bsgribs/ /rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras gnyis lta na/ /a nu yo gar gol bar bshad/ /
lta spyod gnyis kyi gol sgrib ba bstan/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ /rdzogs pa chen po'i lta spyod ni/ /rgyu 'bras sgrub dang mi 'dra ste/ /lta spyod byang chub sems de ni/ /nam
mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ /nam mkha' la ni rtog dpyod 'das/ /gang zhig rtog dpyod byed pa des/ /byang chub nam mkha' bzhin du 'grub/ /rtog dpyod gnyis byung
gol sgrib bo/ /lta spyod nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /gang zhig gzung dang 'dzin byed pas/ /byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis byung gol sgrib bo/ /
lta spyod rnam pa gnyis byung nas/ /nam mkha' gnyis su med pa bzhin/ /byang chub la ni gnyis su med/ /gang zhig gnyis su byed pa des/ /byang chub nam mkha' de mi
'grub/ /lta spyod gnyis byung gol sgrib bo/ /byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/ /nam mkha' la ni blang dor med/ /gang zhig blang dor byed pa des/ /byang chub nam mkha'i de mi 'grub/ /
blang zhing dor ba gol sgrib po/ /byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/ /nam mkha' la ni rtsol sgrub med/ /gang zhig rtsol sgrub byed pa des/ /byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/ /rtsol
zhing sgrub pa gol sgrib po/ /byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyu 'bras med/ /gang zhig rgyu 'bras gnyis lta bas/ /byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/ /rgyu
'bras lta ba gol sgrib bo/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ chos kun nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /nam mkha' la ni rang bzhin med/ /nam mkha' la ni dpe yang med/ /nam mkha'
la ni tshad kyang med/ /chos rnams thams cad ma lus pa'i/ /don ni 'di ltar shes par bya/ /kye sems dpa' chen po 'di rtogs shig /theg pa re la lta ba re/ /lta ba'i yul ni
gzhan med de/ /chos nyid byang chub sems 'di la/ /gzhan du lta ba'i yul med pas/ /lta ba zhes lta nor bar bshad/ /theg pa re la dam tshig re/ /byang chub lam gyi skyel
ma byed/ /byang chub gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir/ /gzhan du bsrung du med pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig la yang bsrung du med/ /theg pa re la phrin las re/ /byang chub lam gyi stong grogs
byed/ /byang chub lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/ /phrin las btsal du med pa yin/ /las kyis lhun gyis grub 'gyur med/ /theg pa re la gnas sa re/ /byang
chub lam gyi gzhi rten byed/ /rdzogs chen byang chub sems sa la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /sku gsum ston pa bzhugs pa dang / /khams gsum
sems can ma lus dang / /snang srid snod bcud gnas pa'i phyir/ /sa la sbyangs shing bgrod du med/ /theg pa re la chos nyid re/ /rdzogs chen chos nyid byang chub sems/ /
sems las ma gtogs chos med pas/ /theg pa'i chos kun byang chub sems/ /rdzogs chen rang 'byung ye shes ni/ /yul la rtog par mi byed de/ /mi rtog mi bskyod ye
shes so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lta spyod kyi gol sgrib bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas byang
chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin thams cad la gol sa dang sgrib pa med pa rgyal ba'i snying po yin pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon
cig /nga ni kun gyi byang chub sems/ /des na kun gyi snying por bshad/ /sku gsum ston pa rnam gsum dang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang / /khams gsum
sems can thams cad dang / /snang srid snod bcud thams cad la/ /'byung ba'i snying po nga las med/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ mi rtog mnyam pa de nyid las/ /skye ba med
pa'i chos sku byung / /rang gi ngo bo de nyid las/ /'dod pa longs spyod rdzogs sku byung / /thugs rje byang chub chen po las/ /sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad byung / /dus
gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /sngar 'das pa yi sangs rgyas kyis/ /rang 'byung ye shes sems nyid de/ /mi rtog rtogs nas sngar sangs rgyas/ /da ltar mi rtog ngang la
bzhugs/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /rang 'byung ye shes sems nyid de/ /mi rtog pas ni 'gro don mdzad/ /slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /
byang chub rang 'byung ye shes de/ /mi rtog pa yi lung bstan nas/ /'gro ba'i don la 'byung bar nges/ /rig 'dzin dang ni sa pa rnams/ /rang 'byung byang chub sems de ni/ /
bltas pas mthong ba ma yin na/ /rang sems snying po de ru phrad/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /rang 'byung ye shes bkag med pas/ /dbang po yul la
rig gsal ba/ /ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems/ /de nyid snying po yang dag bshad/ /snang srid snod bcud thams cad kyang / /nga yis ma bskyed gcig kyang med/ /kun
rgyu nga las ma byung med/ /des na kun gyi snying por bshad/ /nga ni kun las rgyal ba ste/ /sku gsum las kyang nga rgyal la/ /sangs rgyas gsum
las nga rgyal lo/ /rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang / /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can dang / /snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/ /byed pa nga yin
kun las rgyal/ /kun byed byang chub sems nga yis/ /bstan pa kun gyi sngon rol du/ /byang chub sems kyi bstan pa bkod/ /byang chub sems kyi bstan pa 'di/ /kun
gyis dgod par mi nus te/ /de yang ji ltar dgod ce na/ /chos la bya ru med pa'i phyir/ /btsal ba med pa'i sgo nas 'jug /byang chub sems las med pa'i phyir/ /byang
chub sems kyi chos nyid la/ /sems kyis bsgom du med pa'i phyir/ /lta ba bsgom du med pa bkod/ /gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i chos nyid la/ /dam tshig bsrung du med
pa dgod/ /ye nas lhun gyis grub pas na/ /phrin las btsal du med pa bkod/ /byang chub sems la kun gnas pas/ /sa la sbyang du med pa bkod/ /byang chub sems
ni bgrod pa'i gnas/ /sems kyi sa la bgrod med pas/ /lam la bgrod du med par bstan/ /chos nyid byang chub sems yin pas/ /chos nyid gzhan du lta mi byed/ /
ye shes rang 'byung ye shes te/ /yul la rtog pa'i ye shes min/ /kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/ /lta spyod kun las rgyal ba dang / /byed pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir/ /rgyal
ba'i snying po zhes su bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rgyal ba'i snying po'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas byang
chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des byang chub kyi sems nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /bdag gi bstan pa 'di bkod
pas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang / /khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/ /rtsol dang sgrub pa ma byas par/ /
ye nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pas/ /'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi/ /rtsol sgrub byed pa'i brtan pa gsum/ /gol sa sgrib pas zhig par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /
de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa/ kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /khyod kyi bstan pa byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems 'di sangs rgyas na/ /khams gsum
sems can sangs rgyas sam/ /khams gsum sems can sangs rgyas na/ /khams gsum gnas su ci ste 'khor/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems kun
@#/ /byed rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/ kye/ sems dpa' chen po 'di nyon cig /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams
kun/ /chos nyid mngon du byung ba ste/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/ /'dod mi 'dod ni lnga lnga las/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal
skye zer nas/ /chos nyid yul lnga spong byed pa/ /rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/ /bskal pa gsum du mi spong bas/ /khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/ /de bzhin
nyid du gcig pa yi/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/ /'dod dang mi 'dod lnga snang la/ /'khor ba'i rgyu ni yin zer nas/ /chos nyid lnga po 'gegs par byed/ /rang 'byung
ye shes snang ba de/ /bskal pa du mar mi khegs pas/ /khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/ /
'dod dang mi 'dod lnga yul byung / /chags pa'i gnas ni yin zer nas/ /chos nyid lnga po sbyong bar byed/ /rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/ /bskal pa yun du mi spyod
pas/ /khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/ /chos nyid mngon du byung ba yi/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/ /'dod dang mi 'dod
lnga byung bas/ /byin brlabs gnas ni min zer nas/ /phyi nang dag par byin gyis rlob/ /chos nyid lnga po dag par byed/ /rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/ /mi tshe bdun du byin
mi rlob/ /khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yi/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga
snang las/ /'dod dang mi 'dod lnga 'byung ste/ /mtho ris ngan song rgyu zer nas/ /de bzhin nyid la blang dor byed/ /rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/ /rang gi rkyen gyis dor mi
btub/ /mi btub dor bar byed pas 'khor/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las/ /chos nyid yul ni lnga
snang ste/ /'dod dang mi 'dod yul lnga ste/ /sku gsung thugs su shes byas nas/ /sku gsung thugs su gdod sgrub byed/ /ye nas yin la sgrub byed pas/ /sgrub pa nyid
kyis 'khor ba yin/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po de bas na/ /byang chub sems spangs pha rol na/ /rang 'byung ye shes ye nas med/ /'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na/ /mya
ngan 'das zhes bya ba med/ /chos can spangs pa'i pha rol na/ /chos nyid bya ba ye nas med/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig /de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la/ /de bzhin nyid
@#/ /la bcos pas nor/ /de ni ma nor ba yi ming / /bzhin ni bcos su med pa'i don/ /nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid bstan/ /de bzhin nyid la 'chos ma
byed/ /de bzhin nyid la 'chos byed pa/ /byang chub sems la su 'chos pa/ /des ni 'khor ba'i snying po bsgrub/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
las/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang
bzhin nga yin pa 'di bstan to/ /kye/ sems dpa' dam pa rdo rje khyod/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /nga ni ston pa'i sgron ma byang chub sems/ /dus
gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin/ /khams gsum sems can kun gyi pha dang ma/ /snang srid snod bcud kun gyi rgyu yang yin/ /nga las ma byung ba ni gcig kyang
med/ /nga ni mi gnas kun tu khyab pa'i phyir/ /nga ni ye nas dus gsum sangs rgyas yin/ /nga ni mi rtog mnyam par gnas pa'i phyir/ /rtog med mnyam nyid chos sku ye
sangs rgyas/ /nga yi ngo bo kun tu longs spyod phyir/ /nga nyid longs spyod rdzogs skur ye sangs rgyas/ /nga nyid rang 'byung ye shes snang ba'i phyir/ /nga nyid thugs rje sprul skur
mngon sangs rgyas/ /des na dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por bshad/ /nga yi ye shes byang chub sems snang ba/ /rang 'byung ye shes lnga po rgyud drug sems/ /des na
khams gsum sems can pha dang ma/ /snang srid snod bcud kun gyi ngo bo yang / /nga yi ngo bor byung ba snang bas na/ /nga nyid ye nas snang ba sangs rgyas yin/ /nga la gnyis
med gcig tu 'dus pa chu/ /sdung par byed pa sems nyid chu yin no/ /nga ni thams cad mnyam pa drod snyom me/ /kun la mnyam par gnas pas me sangs rgyas/ /nga ni thogs
med yang zhing g.yo ba yin/ /thogs med g.yo bas rlung du mngon sangs rgyas/ /nga ni ma sgrib kun khyab gsal ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' zhes ni ming btags sangs rgyas yin/ /
nga las ma byas pa yi sangs rgyas ni/ /'byung chen srid pas bsdus pa'i chos la med/ /'byung lnga nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/ /gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin tshang / /snang
bas la sdud pa chu yin te/ /mnyam pa me la g.yo ba rlung du gsal/ /ma sgribs gsal bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga tshang ba ni/ /byang chub sems
kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan/ /chos la gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig /gcig gis kun byas kun byed rgyal pos byas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun
@#/ /byed rgyal po las/ ngo bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams
cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kho nar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kye/ chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems las chos
kyi sku/ /rdul tsam sus kyang bcos pa med/ /des na sangs rgyas sems las med/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems la longs spyod sku/ /
sems las byung ba'i gzugs rnams las/ /longs spyod rdzogs las sku gzhan med/ /sprul pa'i sku ni byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems kyi sprul pa las/ /'gro ba'i
don mdzad gzhan na med/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /byang chub sems las gzhan med de/ /snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang sems
ma bcos sngar mthong rtogs/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ma bcos pa yi rang sems des/ /ma bcos ji bzhin rtogs gyur nas/ /da ltar 'gro ba'i don
yang mdzad/ /slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang 'byung sems nyid 'di la ni/ /sngar bar 'chos par lung ma bstan/ /da ltar ting 'dzin sems mi 'chos/ /ma
bcos lam du zhugs nas byon/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la/ /byang chub sems su ma rtogs te/ /bcos shing bsgrubs pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ma rtogs bcos pas grub
par byed/ /bskal pa du ma'i grangs bgrangs kyang / /mi rtsol bde ba phrad mi 'gyur/ /kye/ sku gsum sems las ma bcos phyir/ /sku gsum ston pa'i mdo lung las/ /'chos
par byed pa'i don 'byung ba/ /de ni ston pa sku gsum yang / /nyid kyi ston pa rang bzhin ston pa min/ /de bzhin 'chos par byed pa yi/ /ston pas bden tshul ji bstan yang / /
des lung ma yin drang lung yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ bcos su med pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub
kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi ston pa nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston
pa ste/ /nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las ni/ /ston pa yang ni rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /bstan pa yang ni rnam gsum nga yis bstan/ /de 'dzin 'khor tshogs gsum yang
nga yis bstan/ /ston pa gsum yang gang dang gang zhe na/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa dang / /chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa dang / /don gyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pa'o/ /
@#/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ni/ /skye ba med las byin gyis brlabs phyung ste/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /chos kyi de
bzhin nyid du ston par byed/ /chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa ni/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /ston pa nyid kyi sku ru phyung nas ni/ /chos kyi ngo bor de las
med par ston/ /chos kyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pas ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi don ni sgra bsdus nas/ /ma rig mi shes khams gsum sems can la/ /don de sgra dang
tshig gis bsdebs nas ston/ /des na ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bshad/ /de 'dzin 'khor ni rnam pa gsum bstan te/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i
'khor/ /sgor zhugs yid ches sangs rgyas sa la gnas/ /rig 'dzin sa dang dang por bcu pa'i 'khor/ /ma thob nye reg bsgom pa'i sa la gnas/ /sems bskyed mos pa
spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni/ /rgyu dges 'bras bu dug 'joms sa la gnas/ /de ni ston pa gsum gyi 'khor du bstan/ /kye/ ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/ /ston
pa gsum dang 'khor tshogs de ltar na/ /bstan pa rnam gsum ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ /zhes zhus pas/ kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /chos kyi sku yi bstan pa de
bzhin nyid bstan te/ /de bzhin nyid la rnam pa dbye ru med/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/ /sems kyi ngo bo yin pas de bzhin nyid/ /de la gang su sgom zhing
'chos byed pa/ /de yis chos sku bstan pa rtogs pa med/ /snang ba med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la/ /ma nor de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te/ /de la gang su 'chos shing sgom byed
pa/ /de yis rang sems bcos med de mi rig /snang srid chos med byang chub sems/ /sems kyi de bzhin nyid 'byung de bzhin nyid/ /de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs so sor
mthong / /de bzhin nyid ni dbyings nas tshol byed pa/ /dug gsum rgyal bas btsal yang mi rnyed do/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa
longs spyod de/ /longs spyod lnga ni chos nyid longs spyod gcig /gzugs la sogs pa'i longs spyod lnga la ni/ /gcig la'ang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga spyod/ /rtsa lnga longs spyod de
ni sku lnga'i tshul/ /tshul ni chos nyid don gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad/ /sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/ /longs sku nga yi gzugs la spyad du med/ /rig 'dzin sa bcu
rnams la nga yis bstan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /sprul sku bstan pa thugs rjes don 'tsham ste/ /khams gsum sems can bsam pa
@#/ /tha dad la/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam gsum gyis/ /bsam pa tha dad sku gsung thugs rjes bzlog /dbang po yul la zhen pa de bzlog
nas/ /dben pa'i yul ni gang 'thad de bstan nas/ /des ni nga yi thugs rje 'dren lung byed/ /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston yin phyir/ /
sangs rgyas la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan/ /sems can la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan/ /rang bzhin bstan pas ston par zhal gyis bzhes/ /nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar
rig par gyis/ /ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams ni/ /nga yi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan med do/ /ston pa rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med min/ /bstan pa nga yi
rang bzhin ma bcos yin/ /de 'dzin 'khor ni nga yi ngo bos 'dzin/ /ces gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u
ste zhe gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid la bya ba med pa'i don 'di gsungs so/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ bya ba med
pa'i don 'di ni/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin te/ /nga la bya ba med pa ni/ /nga ni ye nas byas zin pas/ /bya ba med pa'i chos nyid yin/ /chos nyid nga yi rang bzhin las/ /rang
bzhin de la bya ru med/ /rang bzhin rang bzhin bya ba de/ /bcos su med pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /bcos med byang chub de la ni/ /sems dpa' rdo rje khyod ma 'chos/ /sems dpa'
rdo rje de 'chos na/ /kun byed nga la bcos pa yin/ /ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /kun byed nga yi rang bzhin yin/ /kye/ sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig /nga yi rang
bzhin 'gyur med la/ /bsgoms na 'chos shing bsgyur ba yin/ /nga ni ye nas lhun grub la/ /bsgrubs na nga la bcos pa yin/ /nga la bgrod pas phyin pa med/ /nga la btsal
bas grub pa med/ /nga la sbyangs pas byang ba med/ /nga la ma lta yul med kyis/ /nga la ma bsgrod lam med kyis/ /nga la ma sbyongs sgrib med kyis/ /mi gnas dmigs pa'i
yul dang bral/ /spros med bsam pa'i yul las 'das/ /'dzin pas brtags pa'i chos rnams ni/ /nga yi ngo bo bstan pa yin/ /de la spong 'gegs su byed pa/ /bskal pa
gsum gyi bar du ni/ /kun byed nga dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /spang bar bya ba'i chos de ni/ /rang gi ngo bo yin par bshad/ /kye sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal
po ste/ /kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa ni/ /byang chub sems las gzhan du byas pa med/ /byang chub sems ni ye nas ma nor yin/ /ye nas yin pas ye nas nor ba
@#/ /med/ /nor ba med pa'i bden rdzun sgros mi 'dogs/ /rgyu bden 'bras bu rtsol sgrub kun las 'das/ /byas zin rtsol sgrub 'das pa ma rig nas/ /
rtsol sgrub bya byed bsgoms nas grub lta na/ /byang chub bgegs su de las che ba med/ /mi gnas mi rtog cir yang dgongs med pas/ /mi rtog mnyam pa'i yul la rang
bzhin gnas/ /ye nas byas zin rtsol ba'i sems mi 'byung / /bde chen de la gang su gnas pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi snying por de 'gyur ro/ /de yis bdag gzhan
kun gyi don mi byed/ /gcig 'dus thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po des/ /ma bltas dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyang gsal/ /ma sgribs sems can kun gyi
sems kyang snang / /kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /kun byed nga yis sems can don byas zin/ /nga yi don byas gzhan gyis bya mi dgos/ /gzhan la ltos
