gsol/ /gang du dang po 'od dpag med pa ni/ /khams gsum nas byung gsung rab snang mtha' yas/ /chags pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/ /rnam dag
dri med blos ni aM du sbrul/ /gsung snyan yi ge phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil/ /sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/ /sna tshogs ston pa'i gzugs sku bstan
du gsol/ /gang du dang po gdon mi zab ni/ /khams gsum nas byung sna tshogs cir yang mdzad/ /bya ba rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/ /rnam dag nan tan
blos ni haM du sprul/ /mdzad pa gar kyi phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil/ /sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/ /thams cad mdzad pa'i gzugs sku bstan du
gsol/ zhes bskul ba gnyis pa des yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas chos nyid sgyu ma las ye shes sgyu ma'i sku snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar me long gi dbyings su
bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin du ye shes rang snang bar gnas pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gsum pa 'dis mngon du rdzogs pa
longs spyod rdzogs par bskul ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa khyod/ /'jig rten mngon rdzogs rgyas mdzod la/ /snying po byang chub ji bzhin pa/ /sems can
don du snang bar mdzod/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag med du/ /ji snyed bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /mtha' dag don du rnam snang mdzad//
khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa la/ gzhan gyis phan pa'i sman ma mchis/ /yang dag bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas/ 'khor ba'i gcod rnying sbyang mdzad pa/ /sdug bsngal zug
rngu'i nad sel ba'i/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bor gshegs/ /nad ngo cog gi dgrar gyur pa/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi rgya mtsho yis/ /log pa'i nad dgras gzir ba yi/ /nang pa'i
tshogs kun spang bar mdzod/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu nyid/ /snying po byang chub la dgongs la/ /'od zer snang ba rgyas bkye ste/ /mun pa bsal ba'i dgongs pa mdzod/ /kye
ma skyes bu don grub pa/ /bya ba byas shing byed pa byas/ /khur bor bdag don rjes thob pa/ gang 'dir 'dul ba'i dus la bab/ /gtsang ma'i gnas mchog 'og min gyi/ /
chos kyis mtho ba'i gzhal yas su/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur gshegs te/ /snying po bskul ba'i bye ba mdzod/ ces rnam par bskul bas/ ji lta ji ltar sprin mthongs
@#/ /nas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba dang / /mi g.yo ba yi dbyings nyid las/ /gzugs sku nyi ma shar ba ste/ /chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i gzhal
yas su rnam par snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ gang gi cho 'phrul bskul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //
de nas chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs longs spyod pa de rdo rje go 'byed yongs su bsdu ba'i mtshan ma mdzad pas mtha' thug pa med pa'i zhing khams stug po bkod pa nas dpag tu
med pa'i rgyal ba kun nas yongs su 'dus par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas snying rje yongs su rol pa'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/ kye kye/
sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po 'byung ba'i tshogs snang ngo / /kun tu rab tu 'dir 'byung ba/ /srid pa log pa'i gdug pa can/ /'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs/ /sdug
bsngal chen po'i yi dwags rnams/ /las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung / /drag po log pa'i dka' thub kyis/ /srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin/ /dregs pa ru
tra'i gdug dbal gyis/ /'gro rnams mthar rlog 'joms byed 'di/ /gdul ba'i zhing mchog rmad du byung / /snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus nas/ /las ngan
las kyi rgyun bcad de/ /bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs/ zhes bgros so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis gcig par bgros pa/ /kye ma'o 'das pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar/ /da ltar dus 'di nyid du byung / /lung log mngon pa'i ri bor bsregs/ /rang rgyud bsregs pa'i bslad pa can/ /bdud kyis
byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /glang chen myos pa drag po che/ /shin tu mi bzad dug chen gyis/ /'o dod 'bod par gsad brlag pas/ /ro gling dur khrod mthar zhen pa/ /ji lta'i
thabs kyis phan par 'gyur/ zhes bgros so/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bgros ba/ nag po'i gdug pa skyon pa 'di/ /ji ltar
de dgar bzhag 'gyur na/ /mi bzang dug mtsho chu rlabs kyis/ /nag po'i khams su rgyas 'gyur bas/ /dam pa rnams kyi rgyun gcod cing / /nyi ma sgron ma 'jig par 'gyur/ /
de tshe las kyi mun pa yis/ /thams cad mun nag smag tu 'khyams/ zhes bgros so/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bgros
pa/ /gang 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /las kyi 'khor los 'phangs pa yi/ /blo gros log pa'i ru tra de/ /snying po dbyings nas byung ba ni/ /skyes bu dam pa'i sbyor ba
@#/ /yis/ /bdud kyis bdud btul gnyer bkod ltar/ /nga ltar 'di tshe byung ba ni/ /dug 'gyur brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di/ /rdo rje khros pa'i tho chen
gyis/ /brlag cing gzhom pa'i dus la bab/ ces bgros so/ /sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/ /khong nas
'khyil ba'i dug chen po/ /thar med mi bzad nad kyis zin/ /rtag chad khams su shi ba'i ro/ /lam log lam stor dmus long 'di/ /ye shes khros pa'i cho 'phrul
las/ /'bar 'phro 'khrug pa'i gzer chen gyis/ /smag chen mun nag gzhom pa'i phyir/ /ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus te/ /ye shes
rdo rje khros pa yi/ /cho 'phrul sprin phung gtibs pa'i sa/ /mthun 'jug byis pa'i cha byad kyis/ /rnam par rol pa'i mngon spyod kyis/ /dug chen rgya mtsho ma bskams
na/ /'dir ni snying rje rkyen 'tsham mam/ /chos nyid snying rje chen po yi/ /gang 'dir dam tshig dam pa'i phyir/ /dngos po bzhi yi bstan pa mdzod/ ces bgros so/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ 'dus pa chen pos rnam par bgros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de ltar 'dus
pa chen po'i bka' bgros yongs su cha da nas las rnam bzhi gang gi gdul ba'i skabs la bab par dgongs pa yis gang de rnam par brtag pa'i phyir thub dka' gzhon nu
rdo rje snying por gnas gyur pa'i 'od zer las sprul pa thub pa'i dbang por byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sprul pa de la bsgo ba/ thub pa'i dbang po dus 'di
lags/ /ji bzhin bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /dngos po bzhi yi me dpung bzlog/ byang chub snying po bskul bar mdzod/ ces yongs su bskul nas thub pa'i
dbang po nges dur khrod kyi bdag po de'i phru mar snang bar mdzad nas thams cad zhi ba'i smra bar smras pa las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po des tha'i kha brdabs nas 'di skad
du smras so/ /bu chung /khyod kyis bdag thul ba ma yin te sngon nga gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon drag po zhes bya bar gyur pa na kho na nyid lta bu mang po byung nas nga'i bstan pa
la zhugs shig /nga'i bka' nyon cig zer ba las kyang ma mnyan nang khyod kyi dbang du bdag ga la jen/ go zu se mo dor gzod la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar mnos
shig ces bsgo nas bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa la zhugs nas phyir log go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad kyis yang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang / sde'i sprul pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su bsgo ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi
chos sku pad+ma'i gdung / /chos rje 'od dpag med pa rdo rje chos/ /spyan ras gzigs sprul hrIHlas rngam chen ston/ /ngag gi dbang phyug rta gdong zhal gyis gnon//
zhes yongs su bskul pas sprul pa rdo rje rta gdong chen pos dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i gnas su snang bar mdzad nas ha ha hi hi hri hu lu hu lu hu lu zhes lhang lhang
tsher tsher rta skad drag po'i dbyangs phyung ba las/ srin po'i phru ma yongs su spa zhum zhing bag 'khums pa tsam du gyur/ yang dur khrod kyi bdag po kho na ngo bo des
rang gi nga rgyal gtum skad du ru tra ma tra ma tra zhes bsgrags nas rnam par brjid phyung ste 'gyings pa las zil gyis mnon te slar kho na ngo bo des slar bsgo ba/
mgrin bu sngon/ yang khyod lta bus bdag mnon pas khyod kyis bdag jen pa ma yin te nyid kyi gnas gang yin par bde bar mnos shig ces tha'i kha brdab pa
byas te/ yang bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa skyes nas phyir log snyam pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
nam mkha' lta bu la gtsang sme me mda' bas ma log par slar han pa las kho na ngo bo des thim par dzams nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi dbang phyug des mthun 'jug
tu kho na dga' lhar thim du han no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des dbu kho na'i gtsug tu phyung zhabs kho na'i mthil du byung nas rdo rje hUM zhes rgyas par lus kun tu rgyas
kho na des ma bzod pa'i nga ro 'od kyi sgra mthar bton ba ni a tsa ma'o/ /ci mdzad myur bar mdzod ces bton no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kho na de'i sgrib pa sbyang ba
mdzad nas bde ba kho nar kho na'i gtsug tu phyung ste nam mkha' la rta'i dbyangs phyung bas srin po'i tshogs pur mer thor shug tu gyur te zil gyis non cing bag 'khums
nas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/ /ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ ces zhus pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/ ngas ni khyod ma
btul gyi/ khyod kyi gnyen po rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang gis dbang bskur ba shin tu gtum rngam 'khrug pa ma rungs shing mi bzad
pa bdud kyi bdud chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba zhig 'byung gis de la skyabs su dos shig ces gsungs te chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du mi dmigs par gshegs so/ /
@#/ /de nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po rnam par bgros nas phrin las bzhi yi sgo gang gis
gdul ba'i skabs la bab pa brtags na/ gang zhi rgyas kyis 'dul ba mi 'dra nas dbang drag gis 'dul bar bka' bgros dam par nges par bcad pa'i mdo yongs su
gsung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol spyod pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu 'grog pas zhi ba la/ /khros pas phan
bar mi 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ma bcos de nyid las/ /zhi bar de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod/ /rnal 'byor tshul can zhi bas kyang / /srid pa'i myu gu 'gags
nus na/ /rnal 'byor yod med stong pa'i mthus/ /'gog pa bslad pa smos ci dgos/ /shin tu rdo skams rlan pa la/ /gang du 'gog rnams bslang ba'i phyir/ /'gog
med stong pa'i chos nyid las/ /sna tshogs mi 'gog ji bzhin mdzod/ ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshogs
kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ /shin tu stong pa rgyun chad la/ /dngos pos phan par mi 'gyur te/ /rgyun gyi byang chub stong nyid las/ /med 'gyur de bzhin
gshegs kun mdzod/ stong nyid tshul can stong pas kyang / /ci yang med par gnas 'gyur na/ /med pa las byung rnal 'byor mthus/ /mthar zad mu zlog smos ci dgos/ /shin tu
rgyun chad bzlog pa dang / /gang du med las skyes pa'i phyir/ /rgyun dang bcas pa'i stong nyid la/ /tshe yon rgyun gyi 'chad par mdzod/ ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsung pa/ /shin tu ther zug rtag pa la/ /med pas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /snying po
byang chub de nyid las/ /bdag nyid chen por thams cad mdzod/ /mi 'gyur tshul can rtag pas kyang / /dngos po brtan g.yor byed nus na/ /bdag nyid chen por lhun grub mthus//
ther zug zlog pa smos ci dgos/ /bdag tu zhen pa zlog pa dang / /dngos 'dzin rka mgo bsgyur ba'i phyir/ /bdag med rtag pa chos nyid las/ /byed med rang bzhin nyid du mdzod/ /ces
nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gdung dang / /sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi
'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum dgra skrag nus na/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa
@#/ /yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba dang / /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /'bar ba chen po gar dgu
las/ /dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod/ /ces nges pa dam par bcing ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying po de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i
mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu log par zhen pa la/ /bden pas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs las/ /thams cad mthun 'jug nyid du mdzod/ /mdzad
spyod tshul can spyod pas kyang / /thams cad bka' zlog byed nus na/ /thugs rje mthun 'jug mdzad spyod kyis/ /lam log drang srong smos ci dgos/ /dngos pos dngos po dgrol
ba dang / /dug gis dug nad bsal ba'i phyir/ /thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i/ /mdzad pa gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod/ /ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu 'jungs shing bskams pa la/ /btab pas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /med la
mi zad kun 'byung las/ /thams cad mi zad nor bur mdzod/ /dka' thub tshul can 'gags pas kyang / /tshe gcig 'tsho bar byed nus na/ /med la 'dod dgur 'byung ba yis//
khams gsum gdung ba smos ci dgos/ /'jungs pa tshim par bya ba dang / /yongs su gdung ba bsal ba'i phyir/ /theg chen gsang ba'i longs spyod las/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgyar
mdzod/ /ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang / sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ /shin tu le lo g.yeng pa la/ /bskul bas
brtson bar mi 'gyur te/ /bya btsal med pa'i chos nyid las/ /thams cad bya ba med par mdzod/ /mi g.yo'i tshul can gnas pas kyang / /dam pa'i las lam gcod byed na/ /bya bral
mi g.yo bde chen pos/ /'jig rten g.yeng ba smos ci dgos/ /mi khom lam rgyud bcad pa dang / /le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra gzhom phyir/ /btang snyoms rnal 'byor chen po las/ /bya
med gnas par phyag rgyar mdzod/ /ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i gdung dang / /sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ /
shin tu gti mug rmongs pa la/ /bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur te/ /khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa las/ /thams cad gti mug chen por mdzod/ /gti mug tshul can rmongs pas kyang / /thams
cad mun par byed nus na/ /mi 'byed blang dor med pa yis/ /khams gsum rmongs pa smos ci dgos/ /mun pa'i skye mched gzhon pa dang / /rmongs pa nam mkhar bya ba'i phyir/ /gti mug
@#/ /rnam dag ye shes las/ /ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phyag rgyar mdzod/ ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i gdung dang / sde'i
tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu chags shing zhen pa la/ /gnyen pos phan par mi 'gyur te/ /chags rab chen po'i ye shes las/ /thams cad
chags pa chen por mdzod/ /chags pa'i tshul can spyad pas kyang / /khams gsum khrag tu byed nus na/ /'dod chags rnam dag chags spyad pas/ /khams gsum zhen
chags smos ci dgos/ /'dod chags khrag mtsho bskam ba dang / /chags pas chags pa gcad pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags rnam dag ye shes las/ /'dod chags gar gyi
phyag rgyar mdzod/ /ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/ shin tu dngos por zhen pa la/ /bkag
pas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /thams cad mthun 'jug spyod par mdzod/ /mthun 'jug tshul can mthun pas kyang / /khams gsum log
par byed nus na/ /thugs rje gar gyi mdzad spyod kyis/ /'jig rten blo log smos ci dgos/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed/ /'jig rten 'jig rten mtha' yas kun/ /
'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /drangs te yang dag gsang bar spyor/ /khro la byams dang khro tshul mdzod/ /zhi la zhi ba slong sbyong nyid/ /drag shul can la drag po nyid/ /g.yem la
g.yem dang gnyen por mdzod/ /chags la chags dang rnam spong nyid/ /g.yeng la sems sdud g.yeng ba nyid/ /rmongs la khyab par mnyam pa nyid/ /ri la ting 'dzin ri bo nyid/ /phrag
dog can la phrag dog tshul/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed/ /kun gzhi mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /khyad par 'dod pa'i lus can gyi/ /kun
gzhi kun gyi dbyings na dpa'/ /rdo rje snying po rab tu gnas/ /sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi dbyings/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid/ /ye nas yin par nges pa na/ /mtha' thug
med pa'i sems can rnams/ /ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa bzhin/ /ma bkag ma bcos ji bzhin par/ /nges pa nyid du gyur pa yi/ /thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i/ /mdzad
spyod gar thabs sprin phung gis/ /ji ltar spyad kyang de nyid las/ /ma g.yos mi gos dbyings na dpa'/ /nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo las/ /mtha' yas dpag tu med pa yi/ /sgo nas thams cad ma
bkag par/ /ci dga' nyid du bde drangs te/ /dam pa rnams kyi nges par mdzod/ /'dir ni nan tan drag shul gyis/ /mi zad 'bar ba'i ye shes las/ /dur khrod bdag po rab 'jigs pa'i//
@#/ /che mchog 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar mdzod/ ces nges pa dam par bcad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ bka' bgros dam pa
bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //lang ka'i bdag po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa zhig gis shes bzhin du gang yongs su
sad pa'i phyir yang 'khor der 'khod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i go cha blo gros thabs ldan zhes bya ba zhig la yongs su dris pa/ kye/ sems dpa' chen po/
yi dwags chen po 'di rgyu ni gang las byung / rkyen ni ci las byung / 'bras bu ni cir smin/ rigs ni gar gtogs/ las skal gyi spyod pa ni ci spyod/ ma btul na ci gnod/ btul
na ci zhig dgos/ de skad dris pa las/ bskul ba'i go cha chen po des smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ yi dwags chen po 'di gang legs pa'i rgyu rkyen las ni
ma byung / nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi rgyu rkyen las byung ste rgyu ni mun pa'i ri bo las byung ngo / /rkyen ni bka' bsgo log pa'i dka' thub drag po las byung ngo / /'bras bu ni sdug
bsngal gyi ri bor smin no/ /rigs ni dmangs rigs 'khor ba gdol ba 'byung po yi dwags su gtogs so/ /las skal gyi spyod pa ni 'khor ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'jol nyog tu
spyod do/ /'di ma btul na lus can gyi byang chub snying po ring du nub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/ /btul na ni kun gyi snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du nye bar 'char bar 'gyur ro zhes smras
pa dang / kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /e ma 'o sems dpa' chen po/ 'o na dus 'di ni las la bab pa'o/ /las 'di las kyi mchog go /gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba'i yang gsang
ba dam pa'o/ /thul/ kun tu rab tu thul/ dus la bab pa'i skabs chen 'dir/ /las la bab pa'i sems can 'di/ /stongs la bab pa'i thugs rje yis/ /'du shes bsgyur ba thugs
rje'i mchog /stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas/ /'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/ /zhes nye bar bskul lo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dan bag gnas gyur
pa skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin du snang ba nyid la yongs su bsgo ba mdzad pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi gsad mdzod pa/ /thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin/ /drag po brtul zhugs chen po
can/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /sngon gyi go cha chen po'i mthus/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gdul dka' drag po 'dul mdzad pa/ /bdud kyi
bdud de bdud rnams 'jom/ /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i sku/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' byad can/ /gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bo yis/ /dur khrod bdag po rab tu
@#/ /chom/ zhes yongs su bskul bas/ skyes bu rdo rje 'dzin pa de/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /'byung po'i rgyal pos dbang du byas/ /shin tu
gtum rngam 'khrug pa des/ /lha mi 'jig rten brlag ma khad/ /bzhin dang mdangs kyang mi gsal bar/ /kun tu mog mog por gyur nas/ /dus ma yin pa'i mun pa yang / /mun nag smag
tu gyur pas 'thibs/ /tsha dang grang dang nad dam rims/ /mi ngas sna tshogs kun tu rgyas/ /rlung dmar 'brug dang ser ba dang / /rnag khrag rdo dang mtshon cha'i char/ /dus ma yin par
kun tu 'byung / /skye dman 'tsho ba'ang log par gyur/ /gdug pa sna tshogs sems can gyi/ /shin tu nyam thag gdungs 'gyur ba'i/ /mgon med pa yi 'jig rten te/ /mkhyen
te thugs rjes gdung ba ni/ /rab tu rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /rdo rje chos kyi rta gdong la/ /rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad du/ /ngag gi dbang phyug rdo rje'i gdong / /lang ka'i yul
gyi grong rdal gyi/ /dbus kyi ri bo ma la ya/ /rko rka thang mar rgya mtsho'i dngo / /drag shul yod pa'i rtse la dngos/ /rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul/ /dur khrod bdag po tshogs
dang bcas/ /mi ngams skyabs lings chen po la/ /khams gsum rdo rje bya sprin thong / /cis kyang mi bskyod mi 'khrugs pa'i/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' de bzhin nyid/ /rdo rje snying po srid gsum mgon/ /stong pa chen po'i nam mkha' la/ /'bar ba chen po gar dgur mdzod/ /thugs rjes la gshegs nas kyang / /mthun 'jug byis
ba'i spyod pa mdzod/ /med la kun 'byung stong nyid las/ /ji bzhin pa yi rgyal ba dang / /stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na/ /rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal ba rnams/ /bdag ni
bka' yi las mkhan te/ /bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba/ /de dag ma lus bdag gis btul/ /ma grol ba yang bdag gis dgrol//
gang ma bsgral ba bdag gis bsgral/ /dbugs ma byung ba dbugs phyung ste/ /yang dag nyid la dgod par bgyi/ /dgongs pa gsang ba kun 'dus la/ /rmad 'byung gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /mtha' thug med pa'i sems can rnams/ /snying po bskul ba'i byin rlabs mdzod/ /ces rdo rje 'dzin pa des drag tu bskul ba las chos kyi dbyings
kyi pho brang nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes chen po'i me dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i thugs rje'i sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas par
'thibs nas 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu'i mngon spyod du mdzad nas rdo rje rta'i tshogs la bkas bsgo ba/ song kun tu rab tu song / rta yi rdo rje stabs dgu yis/ /'jig rten blo dgu'i
@#/ /'dod pa ston/ /'jig rten nag po gtum po'i tshogs/ /dur khrod skyabs lings spyod pa la/ /rdo rje rtog pa'i bya sgron gyis/ /'khor ba ma bsgral bar
du 'di/ /dam bcas go cha gyon pa yi/ /snying rje chen po'i rtog 'jug gi/ /'khor ba'i so mtha' chod par gyis/ /zhes drag tu bsgo bas/ rdo rje chos rab dga' 'khor
lo/ /gzigs dbang rdo rje spyan rab ste/ /rdo rje pad mo rab dga' ba/ /snang mdzad ngag gi dbang phyug tshogs/ /byang chub chen po cang shes gtso/ /thabs chen dgu yi rdzu 'phrul
gyis/ /rdo rje rta gdong sprul pa'i tshogs/ /nam mkha'i khams kun yongs bkang nas/ /ma la ya yi rtse la lhags/ /'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni/ /thugs rje'i dbang gi spyan
ras gzigs/ /stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang / /dgongs pa gsang ba gcig tu 'dus/ /khams gsum yo sgrol snying por dgongs/ /dus gsum gtan sprugs byin brlabs mdzod/
'khor ba chos nyid spyan ras gzigs/ /sdug bsngal byang chub lam du mdzad/ /las nyid rang byung ye shes 'grel/ /rnam smin sun phyung rdo rje nyid/ /ye nas ji bzhin ma bcos
pa'i/ /rang byung dkyil 'khor chen por dgongs/ /gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa yang / /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las/ /sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin/ /gzhon nu bye ba sa yar
mdzad/ /thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas par/ /ma la ya yi rtse la lhags/ /mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha byad du/ /gang 'dir byis pa'i spyod pa
yis/ /bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de/ /'jig rten khams su byis par bstan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ las bzhi rdo rje sgos kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu drug
pa'o// //de nas mthun 'jug skyes bu des/ /mthun pa'i spyan gyis gang gzigs na/ /las kyi yi dwags drag po de/ /dngos po bzhis ni dbang byas pa/ /rnam par smin pa'i dngos po ni
bam ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsar/ /khrag dang bshang gci sha chen dang / /rkang dang klad pa klad rgyas dang / /rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i/ /'dam gyis phru ma yongs su bskor/ /'bu dang
shan tu 'bu chen po/ /sbrang ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang / /sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs/ /kang ka khwa skeg 'ug pa'i tshogs/ /lce spyang stag seng la sogs pa'i/ /gdug pa can gyi 'khor
gyis bskor/ /lha yi sde dpon ka ru ni/ /bu mo chung ma ma sring dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi/ /ma sring chung ma bu mo rnams/ /phrogs nas dbang du byas pa yi/ /slas dang byi mo
bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni rgyas la sogs/ /ma mo phra men gnod sbyin mo/ /srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma/ /bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla rkun ma/ /blon mo dmag dpon sde dpon
@#/ /ma/ /rud dpon pho nya mngag par bcas/ /rang rang rten dang lag char bcas/ /ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' sdod 'khor/ /rbod gtong rngam pa'i tshul
du 'khod/ /srin po'i bu mo dri za brgyad/ /stag seng wa sbyang bzhad tshogs dang / /dur bya bya rog 'ug pa'i tshogs/ /bstod cing rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod/ /srin po'i nye gnas
chen mo brgyad/ /kau ri cau ri pra mo ha/ /bet+ta li dang puk+ka si/ /gasma ri dang sma sha ni/ /tsaN+Da li la sogs pa yi/ /gtum zhing rngam pa'i ma tshogs ma/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i
gzugs su 'khod/ /dur khrod sa yi sgo srung bzhi/ /brtson mo gdong mo gar log mo/ /de bzhin 'jug me chen mo bzhi/ /gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung / /dur khrod bdag
mo gru 'degs ma/ /brkam pa shin tu brkam ma dang / /ra ro mo dang khrag 'thung ma/ /chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod/ /bam ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus/ /gnam
lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis/ /brtan par btab pa'i nad bdag mo/ /nye gnas kro d+hi shwa ri ma/ /thod skyogs khrag gis bkang pa dang / /'bru mar rdzas lnga chang sbyar ba/ /rtag par
rang gi longs spyod 'dzin/ /chags pas myos shing brkam pas na/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam par grags/ /ru tra'i phru ma grong rdal de/ /'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu yis/ /bcom
ldan dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sde dpon btul ba'i 'khor 'dus pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mthu chen rnams/ /phal cher las la gram skabs su/ /dpa' chen rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i/ /de
nyid yang dag dngos min pa'i/ /gzhon nu snam nas bton pa'i sras/ /rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs/ /mthing gnag khro gnyer ral pa can/ /'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mdzad/ /dur
khrod bdag po ji bzhin du/ /dbu dang phyag zhabs der mjid de/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /pa shung pa lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur/ /thams cad stong nyid bdud rtsir sbyangs/ /nye gnas
la sogs 'khor mo rnams/ /spyod la ma chags ye shes dang / /byas la mi sogs 'phrin las kyis/ /mthun 'jug khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis/ /dbang bsdus dang sbyangs sprul pa ni/ /
sems dpa' ye shes sprul pa'i tshogs/ /kau tsau la sogs ma tshogs dang / /seng stag la sogs yul du snar/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam pa des/ /chags pa'i dbang gis gang
mthong ba/ /spyir ni rang gi khyo bdag lta/ /lhag pa'i gzi chen 'bar bar mthong / /snyam pa'i dbang gi the tshom skyes/ /e ma'o bdag gi bdag po bas/ /shin tu 'od 'bar gzi
byin che/ /'di ji lta bar sprul pa zhig /snyam du yid gnyis rtog pa las/ /thabs mchog rdo rje gzhon nu des/ /srin skad thang gsum phyung ba las/ /the tshom rtog pa chad par 'gyur/ /
@#/ /chags pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku la nges par 'khril ba ni/ /tsan+dan sbrul gyi sdong po la/ /tshad pas bdas pa'i sbrul 'khril pas/ /mi rtog
tshad ma'i gdung sel ltar/ /gang la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /gang gi gdung ba rnam par sel/ /de nas sme ba brtsegs pa des/ /thams cad ci dga' 'byung ba yi/ /yid
bzhin nor bu'i snying po de/ /nye ba'i rig pa 'di brjod pas/ /bya ba thams cad byed pa'i mchog /oM b+hur kuM/ i tsi/ ki phi/ uts+tshusma kro ta hUM phaT/ yang dag dngos min cho 'phrul
'dis/ /snang mdzad chen po'i cho 'phrul bsdus/ /gang du dang por sprul pa yi/ /oM gyi 'od zer mngon phab nas/ /dbang mo brkam pa'i lhums su bzhag /gsang sngags mngon
pa'i mthu can 'dis/ /srin po'i cha lugs ci 'dra bar/ /yi ge de dang der bsgyur te/ /gang de mngon sum lhums su bzhag /rdo rje lcags kyu 'od zer las/ /rak+Sha shrI he ru ka/
ru tra ma tra ha ha ha ma/ /bskyed rdzogs 'joms byed yi ge yi/ /mthu yis byin brlabs brtan par byas/ /dngos min rig pa'i skyes bu de/ /rdo rje yab kyi sku la bsdus/ /drag
shul stobs ldan skyes bu des/ /sgyu ma rdo rje cho 'phrul gyis/ /sangs rgyas gdul dka' rnams btul nas/ /bdud dang 'jig rten log pa'i cha/ /byis pa'i spyod pa de bor
nas/ /thugs ni snying po byang chub la/ /dgongs pa nges par 'grel te bzhugs/ /sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sngar byung rgyal tshab skyes bu yis/ /lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi/ /
gsang mdzod chen po dam pa'i lung / /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i bdag po mdzad/ /de nas yi dwags drag po de/ /rang gi gnas su 'un pa las/ /rang gi gnas dang longs spyod
dang / /'khor rnams mi snang mi 'dra ba/ /sngon ma mthong ba phal cher snang / /kho na shin tu ma rangs te/ /e ma'o bdag gi phru ma 'di/ /ji ltar 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog /de
tshe nye gnas dbang mo yis/ /rang gi khyo bdag lon 'un te/ /e ma'o sgeg po dpa' bo khyod/ /gang 'dir ngan du rtog pa'i tshig /'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam ci/ /dpa'

bo khyod kyi dgongs pa gang / deng hun han phan nyo pa ti/ /kho na 'am tsa sma ra tsa/ /dpa' bo sgeg po zhe'am nyid/ /kun lan+t+ra tsa pu thra tha/ /gang du de ci ji ltar 'khrul/ /de skad tshig tu hon pa las/ /mdangs
la chags pas 'dun pa dang / /kho ni'i rigs nyid nges 'dzin pa'i/ /snyam nas dga' ba'i thabs su bzung / /de nas dbang mo bskam pa las/ /pu tra myu gu 'thon 'byung ba'i/ /thabs gsum grag
ba'i sgra phyung pas/ /dpal gyi rngam skad drag po yis/ /drag po drag mo la sogs brgyal/ /de nas slar log mthong snang ba/ /'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la/ /sngo gnag rngam pa'i ral pa can/ /
@#/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa/ /rdo rje gshog pas bar snang khebs/ /ba spu lcags kyu bsregs 'dra ba'i/ /sdom dang sdig dang smigs dang sbrul/ /
'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa gzhi khebs/ /thod skyogs bsti ra rgyu zhags dang / /nyi zla khyung dang 'ug pa khra/ /rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang / /za ma tog dang rdul yab rnga/ /ri
rab spyi skor stong gsum 'phen/ /klu dbang 'bum gyis brgyan cing bklubs/ /dus mtha'i bskal pa me ltar 'bar/ /khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba yi/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras
gzigs/ /zhabs brgyad 'bar bas lha brgyad gnon/ /rdo rje srin po khro bor gyur/ /lha dang bdud las rnam par grags/ /de nas yi dwags drag po de/ /kho na'i sems rtog rtas nas
kyang / /nga rgyal drag po'i gtum skad kyis/ /'khor gyi dbang phyug rnam par bskul/ /ru tra ma tra ma ra tra/ /'du 'du dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs/ /kun tu rab tu dam la 'du/ /gram gram dbang
phyug chen po'i tshogs/ /kun tu rab tu las la gram/ /thud thud dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs/ /kun tu rab tu 'di la thud/ /dbang phyug nga yi phru ma la/ /gang 'dir gdug pa chen po 'di//
khyed kyis brlag pa'i dus la bab/ /gang 'dir bya mi bya rtog na/ /khyed ni shin tu rlag ma khad/ /mdza' bo gang la bya mi bya ba yi/ /yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i mdza'
bo sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer/ /rgol ba gang la bya mi bya ba yi/ /yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la dpa' zhes su zhig
zer/ /dam tshig gang srung mi srung ba'i/ /yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i dam tshig sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la dam pa su zhig 'dogs/ /thams cad bya ma bya ba yi/ /yongs su
rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i spyod pa sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la byed ces su zhig zer/ /gang la gang 'dir gang gi las rnams dus la bab ces dbang phyug chen po rnams la
bskul bas/ bdud kyi gzi byin ma bzod de bdud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu bye ba dung phyur gyi dmag tshogs dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams shin tu dngangs 'khrugs rngam nas rod rod por gyur
te/ mya ngan gyi dug lo 'tshubs pa bzhin bdud kyi phru mar 'dus te bdud kyi ru mtshon 'phyar/ mtshon cha'i sprin gtibs/ bdud kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba bkram ste bswo dang / cha'i sgra bsgrags
nas spags pa las/ rdo rje rta'i tshogs kyis rdo rje stam ba na'i stobs kyis rdzu 'phrul myur ba'i 'dur shugs drag pos khro bo theg chen kun kyang 'dur thag gcod pa'i rta'i 'dur glu 'dis rnam
par bskul ba/ hrIH/ sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang / dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang / /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i/ /sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yi/ /
@#/ /gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar bas dbang phyug gnon/ /hri/ myos byed stong pas lhag par 'dod pa'i gzugs ston la/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin
rje stong bas lhag par 'jigs gzugs ston/ /zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong bas lhag par rab tu ston/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod/ /
hri/ rnam par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis gnon pas gnon/ /ho ho ha ha he he hi hi dgyes pa'i bzhad mos khong / /dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu
shig /rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon dbang phyug gnon/ /hri/ rtsal chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs/ /hri/ rab kyi rtsal gyi
stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu chen gnon/ /ru tra ma tra'i snying las dpal mos drongs shig rab drongs shig /rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon tshangs pa non/ /
tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig sma ra tha/ /hri/ rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs gyis ngo mthon dga' dbang non/ /sbyor chen zhun gyis bdag la dga' drongs shig /hri/
rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon ru tra non/ /sbyor chen kro d+hi shwa ri dbang mo drongs shig rabs drongs shig /snying rje gang la bya mi bya ba yi/ /yongs su rtog pa
de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i snying rje sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la su zhig snying rje zer/ /gdul bya gdul bar bya mi bya ba yi/ /yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i
gdul bya sgyu ma yin pas na/ /de la gdul bar su zhig zer/ /hri/ ha ha ho ho sprul rab tu sprul/ /kun tu rab sprul snang bar mdzod/ /gtum thung rngam 'khrug 'bar
bar mdzod/ /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs khro bor log par lta ba yi/ /khro bo snang ba'i 'gro rnams rnam mang po/ /khro bo rgyud kyi ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas
par/ /rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu ma rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /khro la ma g.yos ye shes bzhi mchog kun tu bzhengs shig bsnams/ /rnam pa mang po sna
tshogs 'dod par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyis ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog
sgyu mar rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /spyod lam chags ye shes bde mchog kun tu myong mdzad bzhengs shing rol/ /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs rmongs par snang ba'i
'gro ba rnams/ /rnam pa mang po gti mug rgyud kyis ma mos lus par 'dul mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu mas rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /mnyam
@#/ /la ma rmongs ye shes ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bzhengs shig dgongs zhes khro mo ma rangs mi bsnyengs drag po dgyes pa'i sgra grag stong
'dir ba byung bas bdud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i bdud bye ba dung phyur rnams bag bzhi bskums te zil gyis non/ ru mtshon la sogs pa mtshon cha'i sprin phung ni stong pa nyid
du sangs par gyur/ mi snyan pa'i ngag rnams ni mngon du gyur te theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi sgra ni di ri ri sgrogs par gyur to/ /dur khrod kyi bdag po ru dra nag po lta zhig
rang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bor te rje btsan dam pa de la skyabs su dong / blo gros kun gyi yul dang bral/ yi khos bsam pa chad cing thabs brlag nas kun nas 'khrugs
te rnam par 'khrugs te rnam par 'khams nas rang gi ru dra lnga yi sa bon mngon du phyung bas/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes brjod/ /mgo gsum lag drug rkang bzhi pa/ /khros pa'i
tshul du gyur pa las/ /rje btsun rdo rje srin po des/ /kho na nyid du der mdzad de/ /byin brlabs yi ge mi phyed pa'i/ /dbang du 'khor ba'i sa bon lnga/ /byas nas ngag
gi sprul pa phrogs/ /kho na ngag gi dbang po nyams/ /de nas dur khrod bdag po des/ /ra la ra la b+h+yo brjod pas/ /mgo dgu bco brgyad lag tu gyur/ /gang der rje btsan
dam pa des/ /ngag gi sprul pa nges par bcad/ /yang der dur khrod bdag po des/ /hu lu hu lu b+h+yo brjod pas/ /mgo brgyad bcu drug lag tu gyur/ /dpal chen rje btsan srin po des/
kho na ci 'dra der mdzad de/ /der yang dag gi brjod pa bcad/ /gang de dur khrod bdag po des/ /ha la ha la b+h+yo brjod pas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig mgo bo la/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
lag tu gyur/ /yang na rdo rje srin po des/ /de ci kho nar der mdzad nas/ /gang 'dir smra ba'i dbang po bcad/ /yang der kho nar de nyid kyis/ /ra li ra li b+h+yo brjod pas/ /lus
ni tshad med chen po la/ /nad kyi bskal ba tshub mar gtong / /gdug pa'i mtshon cha lus las 'gyod/ /rje btsan rdo rje srin po des/ /kho na de 'drar nyid mdzad de/ /ngag phrogs
dag gi sprul pa chad/ /dper na skyes bu gang la zhig /lce bcad khrag gis bor ba bzhin/ /shin tu myos te 'gyel bar gyur/ /kun gyi mnga' bdag chen po des/ /sa ma ya hUM
gsung bsgrags pas/ /sngon byung dus na 'brel ba yis/ /srog gi dbang pos ma bzod de/ /gang der mdun gyis phyogs pa dang / /rtse gsum kha T+wAM 'bar ba yis/ /ru tra'i ri
bo bcom dbang gi /phyag rgyas rol te phyal du sbyangs/ /nye gnas dbang gis mtshams sbyar ba'i/ /rang gi dam pa la sogs pa'i/ /mtha' thug med pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /
@#/ /dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems/ /stug po bkod pa'i mthong ba'i mthus/ /thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/ /zhen pa'i mun nag sangs
gyur te/ /skye ba dus mtha' med rnyed du/ /lus blangs las ni ci spyad dran/ /snam du bton te zhabs drung 'khod/ /rab dga' btud nas gnod tshul du/ /gang der shin tu
ngus nas smras/ /e ma e ma'o e ma yang / /dpa' bo lha rje thugs rje chung / /shin tu bde ba'i gnas gcig nas/ /snam du bton pa thugs rje chung / /da yang ci mdzad myur
du mdzod/ /myur du bsgral na yun bde'o/ /'bangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul/ /'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig /deng nas slan chad bka' bzhin du/ /bka' yi
lung bzhin rjes su sgrub/ /gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis sam/ /dam pa'i lung las 'gal gyur na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / /rul myags skams
nas tshig par 'gyur/ /ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams/ /'bangs su 'bul lo tshis ma chung / /dbus su mchi skal mi ldan gyi/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog /
phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyi/ /lhag ma zhal chab bron la stsol/ /nye gnas gdung ba'i ma sring rnams/ /de nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyi/ /khyed ni ci bgyi bka' yi
las mkhan te/ /bka' yi las byung rtag par myur du sgrubs/ /bdag kyang de sngon lam log las spyad pas/ /dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud/ /da ni thugs rje
las 'phro gnyis phrad pas/ /bde ba can gyi zhing du myur 'gro yis/ /rjes su bstan pa'i bka' la nyams sa re/ /ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin/ /dam tshig can la
dung dung gdung bar bgyis/ /gang du sring byams ming la gdung ba bzhin/ /yal gam can la lhang lhang brtse bar gyis/ /mdza' mo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin/ /rnal
'byor can la kril kril rtser bar gyis/ /ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin/ /dam pa rnams la nges par nye bar gyis/ /zhes 'khor nye gnas rnams la
gdams ngag bor nas dpa' bo chen po la skyabs su dong ste bka' che ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te mna' dor ro/ /ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes
rang gi srog la tshad bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gnang ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes byin gyis brlabs te bsregs sbyangs btul nas dgongs
khral chung bar bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ bdud yongs su btul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas de'i
@#/ /tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams 'di ltar rtog ste/ e ma'o drag po chen po 'di/ /'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dregs pa/ 'di
ltar gti mug pa/ 'di ltar chags pa/ 'di ltar nga rgyal ba/ 'di ltar gtum pa 'di dpa' bo chen po 'dis rnam par non/ nges par yang dag par non/ kun tu rab tu non
to snyam du rtog go /de'i tshe de'i dus na de dag gi sems kyi rtog pas rtog pa drag po ru tra de'i sems kyis yongs su shes nas smras pa/ kye/ nye gnas dam pa rnams/ gang de ltar ma
rtog cig /sngon kho bo'i las kyi 'phro dang 'brel ba nye gnas dam pa kun gyis bshes gnyen de dang phrad pas las shes so/ /skye ba shes so/ /las mthong ngo / /skye ba
mthong ngo / /las mngon du gyur to/ /skye ba mngon du gyur nas rang gi las la rang thag khos par gyur/ gang skad cig mar bde ba chen po'i g.yung drung gi pho brang mthong
bas gang 'di ltar bud med dag sbrum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen par gyur pa na 'di snyam du sdug bsngal 'di ni sngon du skyes pa bsten cing mang du spyad pa'i las 'ba'
zhig kho na'o snyam du yid la byed pa bzhin kho bo yang las 'ba' zhig la kho thag chad nas ji ltar ri gzar rtse nas rbab 'dril ba gang 'dril ba gang gis mi zlogs pa
bzhin gdung ba chen po'i shugs kyis 'thon pos shin tu gdung ba yin te nye gnas byed kyang rang gi las yid la gyis shig dang / gdung ba'i shugs rbab ltar 'dril bar 'gyur
ro zhes smras nas rmag chad par dus nas shin tu smres te yongs su gdung ba'i don bton pa/ 'di lta ste/ thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems/ /dri med dung mdog mchog
tu gzugs bzang ba/ /rnam dag 'od gsal nyi zla 'bum bdal zhing / /dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sa mkhan ston par grags/ /khams
gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/ /lam log lam stor srid pa'i
'khor lor 'khyams/ /sngon tshe las log srid pa spyad pas nongs/ /sdig pa'i las rnams ci spyad rab gnod 'gyod/ /dar cing dregs pa'i las dbang de btsan nas/ /'khor
ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying gyur te/ /zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mes ni rang rgyud bsregs/ /gti mug mun pa 'thibs pos shes rab ldongs/ /'dod chags rgya mtsho'i 'dam du
rnam shes bying / /nga rgyal drag po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan/ /phrag dog rlung dmar tshub mas 'khor bar g.yengs/ /bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/ /'dod
@#/ /pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su ltung / /sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad char du 'bab/ /'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' zhing / /sdig
pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas/ /rnam shes dbang po myu gu gdungs 'gyur te/ /phung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na/ /byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod
lags sam/ /bdag ni blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che/ /las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams ru trar skyes/ /skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad/ /yi chad 'gyod
kyang las dbang bcos su med/ /las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra/ /las dbang chu klung 'phral du ga la zlogs/ /rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las
byung / /las kyi rlung dmar drag po des bdas pas/ /bdag ni deng sngon bskal pa grangs med du/ /'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 'khyams pa la/ /nye gnas khyed
kyi thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/ /las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa gtan sbyangs nas/ /ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung da ltar 'khod/ /nyi ltar 'od 'bar zla ltar mdangs
gsal ba'i/ /thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bas mi ngoms pa'i/ /thog ma med nas ma rig ling thog gi /ldongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na/ /'gro ba'i mgon
khyod ded snga gang na bzhugs/ /las dbang drag po shin tu mi bzad pas/ /shin tu skra gcing kyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas/ /dung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing / /
nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ro gdon lags na/ /byams mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir ma dgongs na/ /nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus dang bral ba'i che/ /gnyen bshes grogs dang
bral nas gshin rjes khrid/ /de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te/ /las kyi dbang gis bdag 'dra gcig pu khrid/ /dus der bdag la mchog skyabs ma mchis kyis/ /gang
gi phyi shol dus lam bzhes par/ /da lta nyid du bstun te mngon spyod mdzod/ /las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra la/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas//
khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las ma thar te/ /bskal pa grangs med skye ba de snyed du/ /gdos bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig 'gyur te/ /sha rus bsags na
'jig rten gtos dang mnyam/ /rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam/ /las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang / /khams gsum bgrangs shing skye shing
kha brgyud kyang / /byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos/ /skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la/ /skye ba gcig gcig kho na tsam gyi las/ /bla med byang chub don du
@#/ /rab spyad na/ /de tsam byas pa'i las la don yod pas/ /don gyi yong ye mya ngan 'das zin na/ /las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas/ /
sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams/ /sdug bsngal bzod dka' srid pa'i btson rar chud/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po 'di lta bu/ /nyes byas thams cad
rang gi las las byung / /thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyud bcad de/ /nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol/ /ma rig log pa las kyi dbang btsan pas/ /mi shes
mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na/ /ye shes sgron ma'i zer gyis mi stongs sam/ /nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na/ /thugs rje chen po'i phrin las mi mdzad dam//
phyin ci log gi g.yang sar ltung lags na/ /thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam/ /dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na/ /thabs mkhas
thugs rje'i sman gyis mi gso 'am/ /las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal me 'bar na/ /thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun mi 'bebs sam/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du
bying 'gyur na/ /thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyang sbyang nas/ /nam zhig rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe/ /
'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma mchis/ /bdag nyid las 'phro btsan pas bzhag na lta/ /thugs rje zhes na su la ci zhig bgyi/ /dpa' bo khyod la thugs rje stobs
mnga' zhing / /sngon byung 'brel pa las kyi 'phro btsan na/ /yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par/ /snying nas da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha/ /zhes rang gi nga rgyal
gyi ri bo bcag nas lus seng ger mngon par sprul nas zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ /tha ma dman pa'i gdung
ba bton pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje srin po des las kyi srin po de log par lta ba sun phyung bas las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcad pa'i phyir
spyo ba'i brgyad chen pos rnam par spyos pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can log pa'i stobs ldan 'di/ /thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/ /srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams par
ngas/ /nyes byas rtsa ba rang nyid las/ /thams cad 'byung bar nyes par nges/ /bskal ba grangs med de snyed du/ /skye ba mang po lus blangs nas/ /gzugs phung grangs med
zhig 'gyur zhing / /sha rus stong gsum 'jig rten tsam/ /rnag khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil 'gyur yang / /don med par ni chud zos pa/ /sus kyang ma byas rang gi las/ /de tsam
@#/ /cha gcig don spyad na/ /de tsam don gyi sangs rgyas zin/ /lus rnams yongs su gtong ba yi/ /ma chags stobs ldan chen po rnams/ /bkres pas
nyen pa'i 'gro ba la/ /sha rus khrag tsam btang bas kyang / /zag med rnam thar bde thob na/ /zab mo'i don lta smos ci dgos/ /rang lus gtong bar ma phod cing / /chags
pa'i mtha' la mngon zhen pas/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i kha brgyud cing / /zug rdu'i nad kyis gzir ba yin/ /srid pa'i btson rar chud pa 'di/ /mkha' la mdud
bas nyes par nges/ /mun pa'i klong du 'khyams pa 'di/ /khyad par rmongs pas nyes par nges/ /thar med 'dam du bying ba 'di/ /'dod sred 'dun pas nyes par
nges/ /blo ngan tsha bas gdungs pa 'di/ /tsha ba'i las kyis nyes par nges/ /sdug bsngal ri bos non pa 'di/ /nga rgyal brtsegs pas nyes par nges/ /'khor ba'i rlung
sgor lhung ba 'di/ /las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges/ /rang gis mnar ba'i ru tra khyod/ /ye nas rgyal ba'i sras yin na/ /srid pa'i 'khor lor ci ste 'khor/ /des na
rang gi las yin te/ /sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu la/ /gzugs snang glo bur sprin gyis bsgribs/ /gzugs snang rtog pa rnam sbyang phyir/ /shes rab bskal ba'i
rlung gis gtor/ /dang po bka' bsgo log pas nyes/ /de nas mngon pa'i ri bo brtsegs/ /de nas yid bzhin nor bu bsregs/ /tha mar dngos po bzhi spyad pas/ /
rnal 'byor theg pa chen po'i don/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /ji bzhin ma spyad phra men gyis/ /ngan 'gro'i las
lam rgyun btags pas/ /srid pa log pa'i 'bras bur smin/ /e ma'o las ngan snying re rje/ /nga ni bka' yi las mkhan te/ /bka' yi las kyi nges byung bas/ /
ngan 'gro gnas su 'khyams pa 'di/ /'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don pa'i phyir/ /las ngan las rgyun gcad par bya/ /dngos por smin pa'i sdig pa 'di/ /rdo rje
nam mkha'i mtshon gyis bsad/ /shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na/ /yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa/ /'byung po gtum po gdol ba can/ /khyod ni de
bzhin nyid la sgrib/ /yang dag nges pa'i blo gros kyis/ /khungs bcad rtsad bcad bdag las byung / /bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa yi/ /phyin ci log stobs brtson
'grus kyis/ /gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed/ /de nyid bdag rtog yin pas na/ /bdag med nam mkha'i stobs kyis gzhom/ /dbang sgyur gnon pa'i thabs
@#/ /chen dang / /gcod pa mngon pa'i mthu can dang / /gzir ba'i byin gyis brlabs can gyis/ /dus gsum bgegs kyi bdag po non/
a na ya/ mahA shUn+ya tA/ a ko ta ya nAM/ sarba bA paM ma tang kha ru tra nan/ /sarba pA paM kha T+rAM ka ru dra naM/ thams cad stong nyid ma skyes pas/ /bsad pas bsad pa
med pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma sbyong ba'i cho 'phrul 'di/ /snying rje chen po'i dam tshig go /nges par bsad pa'i dam tshig 'di/ /don ston bsad pa ma yin te/ /rnam shes
gzugs bral rdo rjer bya/ /de nyid slar phab dam tshig mchog /rnam shes hU gis bsdus nas ni/ /kho na de nyid gzugs la dbab/ /sngon du gnas pa'i tshul bzhin
du/ /ma nyams bde ba chen por sbyangs/ /ro langs rdo rje dam tshig 'di/ /rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ste/ /rdo rje mtshon gyis gang bsad pa/ /srog ni log rtog rdo
rjer shi /nams kyang ldang ba'i dus med pas/ /slar skye ba dag ga la yod/ /rnam shes gzugs dang ma bral na/ /'khor ba'i gnas las rnam thar 'phags/ /'chi
med rdo rje byang chub sems/ /stong nyid ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu/ /dug chen 'thungs pa kun gyi gsos/ /shi ba kun slong sman pa'i mchog /lang ka'i bdag po de skad ces
bka' stsal pas ru tra nag po rgyud yongs su byang ste lhag pa'i don ngos par mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ /rgyud yongs su sbyangs pa'i
le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas de nyid du nges par phyogs pa'i phyir zhabs kyi 'khor lo spyi bos btegs pa'i 'dun pas 'dun nas/ 'di skad du/ thams
cad du brgyud pa rnam par grags pa sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo/ /oM/ chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na/ /bdag kyang
rang bzhin rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /thugs dam dbyig mchog bdag nyid ni/ /sems can 'byams klas ma lus kun/ /mchog nyid sgrub par
sbyor bas na/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas/ /sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig /ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog /gzi brjid phung po bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rin chen
kun 'dus pa'i/ /rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog nyid/ /rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa/ /khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyi/ /dbang phyug
rgyal por bdag skur cig /bdag ni rdo rje mngon du dbang bskur bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis deng nyid bdag dbang bskur/ /bcom ldan thams cad mchog ni bdag lags
@#/ /te/ /mchog nyid sgrub phyir rdo rje blang bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rgyal por khyod bzhugs pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid
kyis/ /grub pa phun sum dbang bskur cig /chos kun rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje la yang mtshan nyid med/ /rdo rje lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas/ /don kun rdo rje nyid du gsal//
'di ni sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs nyid/ /ye shes sems dpa'i dam tshig bsnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dka' thub dam/ /rtag tu bdag gis bcang bar bgyi/ /hUM/ rdo
rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dam pa srung / /ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyon/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la brten par dgongs/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug bdag nyid gso
bar gsol/ /rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes pa skyed/ /'dod pa kun zhen bdag la chags par mdzod/ /dang po sangs rgyas mnyam nyid thugs rje can/ /las rnams
kun la bdag sems dge bar sgyur/ /dus gsum bde gshegs bdag gnas thams cad du/ /rdo rje can dang dam tshig sems dpar bsgrubs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
dgyes pa dgyes pa kye/ /rdo rjes bdag yong bstan du ma gtang zhig /kye/ rdo rje chos dbyings kun gyi gtso/ /mi gnas chags pa chen po ste/ /ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas
mchog /bde ba mchog gi dam pa lags/ /khyod ni dam tshig kun gyi gtso/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad ma/ /sems can don bsgrubs phrin las la/ /thugs rje mnyam sbyor
grub par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun 'byung phyir/ /rin chen rdo rje bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ /las kyi rdo rje byed gyur cig /sa ma ya ho/ zhes dam tshig nye bar
blangs so/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes dam kun du bcas so/ /de nas yang dag dngos min pa'i/ /rdo rje sme ba brtsegs pa'i sras/ /bdud 'dul rdo rje srin po des/ /rdo rje shugs kyi dam pa

byin/ /hUM hUM hUM bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la raM zhes gdul sbyong drag po'i dkyil 'khor du sbyangs so/ /ta keM ta keM phaT/ ha la ha la raM/ tIk+Sh+Na tIk+Sh+Na khaM/ kro d+ha
kro d+ha yaM zhes dngos po thams cad stong par sbyangs so/ /oM/ zhes rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug go /muM/ zhes ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor du
bzhugs so/ /hUM/ zhes rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas so/ /i dan te/ na ra gan te/ ba ri hr-i da ye/ nA ma bsti naM/ sa ma ya rak+Sha si/ si ti bi na badzra/ a
mr-i to ta kaM /zhes dam tshig dam pa byin no/ /oM AHhUM zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dam pa byin no/ /oM badzra a mri ta/ e h+ye hi sarba ma na hUM hrI tha zhes dbang dam
@#/ /pa byin no/ /de nas yang las kyi srin po des rang gi ris kyi lha la gsol ba btab pa/ sngon tshe gong nas 'brel pa yi/ /bdag gi nye gnas gang
lags pa/ /las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis/ /da lta nyid du 'bab par shog /ces bskul bas/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings nas nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor hUM gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas kho na nyid kyi snying gar thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyur to/ /haM/ zhes mthong ba yongs su dag ste thams
cad ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo / /rdo rje zhes ming btags nas rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhag go /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo
chen po las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas las kyi srin po de'i nye gnas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams
rang rang gi las dag pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang / byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyi rgyud sbyangs pas las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang / skye ba snga
phyi mtha' yas pa dus gcig tu gshegs par 'gyur te/ the tshom chad pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smras te/
gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol/ /bdag cag ru tra'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams/ /lus dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di/ /bka' yi gtan tshigs zhib mos
ma bkrol zhing / /shes rab zab mo dmigs bus ma phye bas/ /rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing / /nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de/ /gar thabs glog gi zhags
pas ma zin pas/ /rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te/ /de nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo ma 'tshal/ /gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung pas nongs/ /shin tu 'gyod
pas gnong ba'i tshul bzung bas/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /dngos po sbyang phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes lus 'di bzhes
su gsol/ /zhes rang gi lus zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo/ /de nas 'grin nag po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams kyis ngus nas smras te gsol ba/ gzi brjid rgyal po
mnga' bdag dgongs su gsol/ /srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/ /bcing ba lnga yis kun tu bcings gyur pa/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar byed med de/ /
bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcings/ /sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes gnas la sogs/ /bdag 'dzin grong khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir/ /'khor ba'i btson
@#/ /chas rnam shes bcings pa la/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas/ /kun tu bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /mi shigs
dgrol bar dka' yi sdug bsngal las/ /thugs rje'i mdud dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol/ /zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul lo/ /de nas srin po'i rgyal po sha trang
gseng bu la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa/ dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgongs su gsol/ /mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams/ /
me chen 'bar bas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba/ /sus kyang ma bsregs sreg par mi byed de/ /mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid las byung / /zhe sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud
bsregs pa la/ /bdag 'dzin khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas/ /kun tu sreg cing gdung ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /mi zlogs zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /thugs
rje bsil ba'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol/ /ji ltar kha ba len rdo la lcags 'du ltar/ /deng nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangs su mchi/ /zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis
bkang ba bstabs so/ /de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/ kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongs su gsol/ /mun nag smag tu
'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/ /lam nor lam stor kun tu 'thoms 'gyur te/ /sus kyang ma bkag 'gog par byed med de/ /bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas
bsgribs/ /rnam shes gti mug mun pas 'thibs pa la/ /bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma gsal bas/ /kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad/ /smag
chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la/ /mkhyen rab gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol/ /zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo / /de nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i
tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol pa/ thabs mkhas thugs rje sman pa dgongs su gsol/ /grong khyer gsum du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/ /'khor
ba'i gcong rnying nad kyis zin gyur pa/ /sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin par byed med de/ /bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma rig nad kyis bzung / /zug rngu bzod dkas rnam
shes gzir pa la/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i gcod rnying ma sbyangs pas/ /kun nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chad/ /thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /
thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang du gsol/ /zhes lus 'bangs su phul lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin tu dus nas smres te gsol ba/ /thabs
@#/ /mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongs su gsol/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/ /sdug bsngal rba klong 'jings
su bying gyur pa/ /sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med de/ /rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan/ /las kyi chu bos 'khor bar g.yengs pa la/ /dngos
por 'dzin pa'i rka mgo ma bsgyur bas/ /las dbang drag po chu bo rgyun mi 'chad/ /mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /thabs mkhas thugs rje'i
gru yis bsgral du gsol/ /zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo / /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/ rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i rgyal po
dgongs su gsol/ /dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/ /kun nas myos pa myos shing nyams gyur pa/ /sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de/ /
phyin ci log tu lta ba'i dug gis myos/ /dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba la/ /khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa ma bcad pas/ /dug nad 'bar ba'i sdug
bsngal rgyun mi 'chad/ /mi bzad bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la/ /rang 'byung dag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol/ /zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo / /de
nas yang rdo rje srin po des bka' stsal pa/ yin no legs so rigs kyi bu/ /ru tra dag gis khyod re 'khor/ /ru tra dag gis khyod re 'tshog /bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re
'khor/ /bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'tshog /zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'khor/ /zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'tshog /gti mug dag gis khyod re 'khor/ /gti mug dag
gis khyod re 'tshog /'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'khor/ /'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'tshog /chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 'khor/ /chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 'tshog /
log par lta bas khyod re 'khor/ /log par lta bas khyod re 'tshog /ji ltar khyod ni thams cad du/ /ye nas rgyal ba'i sras yin na/ /grong khyer gsum du ci ste 'khor//
rang rang rnam rtog las kho na'o/ /las kyi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs dang / /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dang / /khong nas 'bar ba'i me chen dang / /kun nas 'thibs pa'i
mun nag dang / /dngos po rtog pa'i gcong rnying dang / /rnam par g.yeng ba'i chu bo dang / /khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa rnams/ /rang byung rdo rjes ma byas na/ /gzhan la reg
gsol gdung smres pa/ /chu 'dod smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/ /gang 'dir nyid bder ma sbyar na/ /gzhan gyis bde bar ga la 'gyur/ /ye nas bde bar gnas bzhin du/ /da
@#/ /gdod gang du bde tshol ba/ /btsal bas rnyed bar yong mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyu/ /'o ma dag las mar byung ba/ /de nyid
ye nas mar med pa/ /thabs mchog dpag med rgyal bas kyang / /bsrubs ba ma gtogs de mi rnyed/ /de bzhin rang gi de nyid las/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed na/ /
khyed ci gzhan las bde 'dod dam/ /mi shes blo chung snying re rje/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'dus pa phal po che'i tshogs
kyis gsol pa/ kye skyes bu chen po/ bdag cag rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid blta bar 'tshal na de ji ltar yongs su blta bar bgyi zhes gsol pa las/ skyes bu chen
po des bka' stsal pa/ kye/ 'dus pa'i tshogs/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid mthong bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor chen po gsum gyi sgo 'ba' zhig tu
'jug par bya'o/ /de'ang rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig gi sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor chen po gsum dang / rang
rang gi de kho na nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad do/ /de'ang rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ 'dus pa chen
po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po bdag cag dkyil 'khor gsum du gzhug tu gsol/ skyes bu chen po yang dag par gzhug tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa
las/ skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i byis pa khyed/ /'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang / /'das dang ma 'das so mtshams kyi/ /'gyur
dbang ma nges sa la bzhag /ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad gsol to/ /dpa' bo chen po dgongs su gsol/ /bdag cag skal ldan 'dus
pa'i tshogs/ /sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na/ /rgyal ba'i sras su gzung du gsol/ /zhes gsol pa las/ skyes bu chen pos bka' stsal pa/ skal ldan 'dus
pa'i tshogs chen khyed/ /bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs/ /grub pa lung gi gsang sgo 'dir/ /su dag 'ongs pa slar mi ldog /ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'dus
pa'i tshogs de dag byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i sems 'di ltar skyes so/ /bdag cag mtha' yas sems can rnams/ /don gyi sangs rgyas yin mod kyang / /rtog
pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa las/ /mun pas bsgribs pas de ma shes/ /byang chub sems
@#/ /kyi lam 'di nas/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par bgyi/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bde chen
lhun grub gzhal yas 'dir/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi nas/ /tshad med thugs rje'i sgo phye nas/ /byams pa'i zhal bzang bstan du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /de
nas skyes bu chen po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs/ /'khor ba'i lam sgo kun bcad de/ /byang chub lam la gzud pa'i
phyir/ /rdo rje gsang sgo dbye bar bya/ /zhes gsungs te zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs las 'od zer phyung bas don la nges par 'jug pa'i sgo phye bar gyur to/ /de nas 'dus
pa'i tshogs rnams mgu zhing rangs pa'i sgo nas rnal 'byor du rnam par 'dun nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /pho brang rmad 'byung gzhal yas nas/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho
kun bzhugs la/ /rnal 'byor nges par lhag par mos/ /rdo rje gdung la skyabs su mchi/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/ /ma rig log rtog dbang gis na/ /sdig pa bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad so sor bshags/ /zhes
gsol to/ /yang 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rig 'dzin rdo rje rgyal ba yis/ /'khor bar ji ltar bsgral ba ltar/ /bdag cag rab tu bsgral ba'i
phyir/ /rdo rje nyi ma stsal du gsol/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas skyes bu chen pos bka' stsal pa/ khyed ni dga' ba ci la dga'/ /khyed ni dad pa ci la dad/ /khyed ni mos pa ji
la mos/ /khyed ni 'dod pa ji lta ba/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bdag cag skal ldan bde chen po/ /rab dgyes sems la bdag
cag dga'/ /mchog nyid don la bdag cag dang / /e ma'o bde mchog dga' tshal 'dir/ /sangs rgyas mdzad dka' spyad nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar mos//
zhes gsol to/ /yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ rgyal mchog skyes bu khyed ci 'dra/ /de 'dra kho nar spyad par bgyi/ /spyod pa bsam rgyas rmad byung ba/ /'gro la
phan pa'i don du spyad/ /'khor ba'i mtha' rings 'jig rten pa/ /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs phyung ste//
mya ngan 'das pa'i zhing khams su/ /snying po byang chub nyid du sbyar/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis dam tshig bskul bar gsol ba/ mi phyed gsang
@#/ /ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gnyis med don gyi dbyings las byung / /dbyings ni mi 'jig rdo rje ste/ /'du 'bral med par gcig pas na/ /gsang ba gsum
gyi dbyings nyid du/ /gnyis su med par nan tan mdzod/ /ces gsol to/ /de nas skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor khyed/ /rdo rje can du gcig
nges na/ /gsang ba gsum du mnyam pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig sbyin/ /mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni/ /gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas phyung / /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi
dam tshig ni/ /grub na 'jig pa'i dus med do/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /yang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ 'du 'bral med par chos kyi spun/ /rigs mi mthun yang
dam tshig gcig /gda' bar dka' bas bsdus pas na/ /dam tshig can du nan tan mdzod/ /ces gsol to/ /de nas yang skyes bu chen po des yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /gsang ba gsum gyi dam pa rnams/ /khyed kyis rab tu bslus gyur na/ /de kun khros nas khrag chen po/ /nyams pa'i snying nas drangs te 'thung / /zhes dam tshig dam
pa byin no/ /de nas yang skyes bu dam ba des bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs sangs rgyas blo ldan khyod/ /bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rgyud sbyong gsang ba gsum du
bzhugs/ /rang gi me long nyid la ltos/ /gnas gsum nyid du bkod pa yis/ /gsang chen gsang bar rab gsang ba/ /mthong bas de bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan min rang byung
de kho na/ /blo chung rnams la ma smra zhig /gal te smras par gyur na ni/ /tha tshigs drag pos nyams 'gyur nas/ /me chen 'bar ba'i gnas su sreg /ces dam tshig dam pa bsgrags
so/ /lang ka'i bdag po/ 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag 'di ltar gsang ba gsum gyi dam par bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na la la ni 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa sha
stag tu gyur to/ /la la ni rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /la la ni dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa sha stag tu gyur to//
la la ni lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /la la ni rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /de ltar na de'i tshe de'i dus
nyid na 'dus pa'i tshogs phal mo che de dag ni rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te la la ni rdo rje myu gu zhes bya bar grags par gyur to/ /de bzhin du la la ni chos
kyi myu gu zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni rin chen myu gu zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni zla ba'i rtsal zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni nyi ma'i mdangs zhes bya bar grags
@#/ /so/ /la la ni seng ge'i rtsal zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni nam mkha'i rdo rje zhes bya bar grags so/ /de dag las ma rungs pa kha cig
ni la la ni rdo rje spyang ki zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la ni rdo rje phyogs 'dul zhes bya bar grags so/ /la la
ni rdo rje dur khrod zhes bya bar grags so/ /ru tra nag po de kho na nyid ni rdo rje ro langs dur khrod kyi bdag po zhes bya bar grags te bskal pa chen po bzang po'i yun du
gnas nas rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po dge bsnyen legs ldan nag po zhes bya bar gyur nas gang dag chos srungs pa rnams kyi srung ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bskal pa
de'i phyi ma la 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thal bas khebs pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /lang ka'i bdag po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos/
so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /'ur/ rab tu 'ur/
kun tu rab tu 'ur ro/ /chem/ rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem mo/ /mtha' mthon dbus dma'o/ /dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o/ /shar mtho na nub dma'/ nub
mtho na shar dma'/ byang mtho na lho dma'/ lho mtho na byang dma' bar gyur to/ /'jig rten pa kun kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te mngon par bstod do/ /lha dang bcas pa'i
'jig rten pa kha cig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /kha cig ni ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /kha cig ni chos kyi mig
rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/ /kha cig ni lung bstan thob pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus
na ru tra thar pa nag po la sogs pa mi'i thod pa can ma rungs pa rnams skyes bu chen po rdo rje ma rungs pa de la lus kyi bags pa bzhi sa la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs
su byas nas thal mo sbyar spyi bos btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /a ho su kha k+ShaM bar+ya de ba shi sha /e ma'o skyes bu chen po/ g.yo ba phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /
tshos nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs lags sam/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /gzugs gnas su dag gam/ snying rje'i gzugs lags sam/ /sgra phun sum
@#/ /tshogs pa byung ngo / /sgra gnas su dag gam/ shes rab kyi sgra lags sam/ dri phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /dri gnas su dag gam/ byang
chub sems kyi dri lags sam/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /ro gnas su dag gam/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ro lags sam/ reg phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /reg
gnas su dag gam/ dam tshig gi reg lags sam/ tshor ba phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo / /tshor ba gnas su dag gam/ tshor ba btang snyoms lags sam/ bdag
cag ni sngon bas mthu rtsal skyes pa snyam bgyid do/ /rdzu 'phrul skyes pa snyam bgyid do/ /dbang thob pa snyam mo/ /reg pa shar ba snyam mo/ /de lta bu'i 'byung gnas
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba dam pa 'di ni 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya che ba/ mchog dam pa/ gya nom pa/ phul du gyur pa/ 'di mthong bar mdzad pa'i skyes bu chen po khyod bdag
cag rnams kyi pha lags so/ /bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so/ /skyes bu chen po nyid lta ma lags kyi/ dam pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag gang zhig kyang bdag
cag rnams kyi pha lags so/ /bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so/ /srid pa 'gre bzlog kyang bka' 'gre mi bzlog /kye ma'o skyes bu chen po/ khyed lta ci smos khyod kyi
dam pa 'di la gnas pa'i gang zag kyang 'di ltar lha'i dbang po gtsug gi nor bu bzhin spyi bos bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de'i khyo mo dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / nor dang / g.yog
dang / yang g.yog dang / 'khor dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / phru ma dang / yul 'khor dang / yul khams kyi skye bo gang chos yongs su srung ba rnams
kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /chos srung ba de dag la 'tshe ba'i mi dang / mi ma lags pa gang lags pa de dag kyang yongs su gzhom zhing brlag
par bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad cing bcings par bgyi'o/ /de dag gi gang bsam pa dang / ci bcol ba ril yang bran gyi bya bas yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de dag
gis kyang chos srung zhing chos bzhin du gnas nas bdag cag rnams kyi ci'ang yid bzhin du grub pa/ lha chen po rnams kyis gsang sngags 'jig rten mngon rtags kyi 'byung
gnas rdo rje mthu bo ches mngon pa'i mthu can du brjod pa dang / dam rdzas dang / dge mtshan dang / rtags rten rnams kyang bdag cag dang 'brel ba'i ched du bcang bar bgyi
ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bdag cag dam pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /kye ma'o skyes bu chen po/ 'di lta ste/ bdag cag rnams kyi gsang sngags/
@#/ /mngon pa'i mthu can 'di ni bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa ste de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ oM b+hur khu kha mahA pra NA ya/ b+hu rtsi
b+hurki/ byi ga ge /bi ma na se/ e ho shi mo/ uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ skyes bu chen po de ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag lags so/ /oM b+hu du gurma/ a pra Na/

b+hurtsi tsi kyi phyi/ ma na s+ye/ kha sho mo ga kro d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ skyes bu chen po/ de ni nye ba'i snying por rig par bya'o/ /oM b+hu du ku ru i tsi ki phyi uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT /
skyes bu chen po/ 'di ni sgrub par rig par bya'o/ /oM b+hurku ti phaT/ skyes bu chen po/ 'di ni sgrub pa chen por rig par bya'o/ /skyes bu chen po/ 'di dag kyang re re zhing 'bum
'bum rdzogs nas gdod cig gang bya ba'i las la 'jug na the tshom ma mchis par 'grub pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams
kyang mngon pa'i mthu can du bsngags pa brjod pa lags so/ /rdo rje mthu bo ches kyang 'jig rten gyi mngon rtags 'dis mdzad pa lags so/ /bdag cag rnams kyis
kyang cho 'phrul gyi mngon 'dis bgyid pa lags te skyes bu chen po/ gsang sngags 'di gang gis ched du gnyer bar mngon rtags ma mchis na bde ba yongs ma mchis
pa lags so/ /bka' tshad ma rnams kyang nges par ma mchis pa lags so/ /bdag cag rnams kyang rang rang gi ngag bden pa'i dam pa las nyams pa'i slad du dmyags
ma mchis par mgo 'gags shing khrag tu skyug pa lags so/ /skyes bu chen po/ de bas na gsang sngags 'di la ni the ma tshom ma mchis te gang zhig gang la phan pa bsgrub cing
ngo mtshar bskyed pa dang / blun po dag sangs rgyas kyi bka' la yid ches par bgyi pa'i thabs dam pa rnams kyis bshad pa lags te/ de dag gis yan lag bzhi pa 'di
rtag tu bsten na legs so zhes gsol pa las/ skyes bu dam pa des bka' stsal pa/ a hoH/ rigs so/ /stad do/ /yin no/ /nges so/ /bden no/ /legs so/ /
ma rungs pa khyed ma dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ bu dang / bu mo dang bcas/ g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang bcas pa khyed rnams brtse ba dang ma bral na mar bya'o/ /
gdung ba dang ma bral na sring mor bya'o/ /brtson pa dang ma bral na bran du bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral na bur bya'o/ /'du 'bral med na slob mar bya'o/ /bskul
ba la mgyogs na pho nyar bya'o/ /bka' bzhin byed na bka' la gdags so zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i gral du bzhag ste/ chos dang / gang chos srung ba rnams kyi srung
@#/ /mar dbang byin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus ba'i mdo chen po las/ thar pa nag po gol ba lam gol bar lung bstan pa'i le'u ste
sum cu gcig pa'o// //theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las/ gdul bya'i skabs la bab pa'i tshe na ru tra yongs su btul ba'i gtam rgyud brjod
pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa drug pa'o// // bam po lnga par zug pa/ de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bdun pa byin gyis brlabs las snang ba na'ang byung zhes
'byung ba 'di skad ces dri ba yongs su dris pa/ kye/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du
brjod pa'i skabs su byin gyis brlabs las snang ba na'ang byung zhes brjod pa de ji lta bu zhig tu snang zhing grags pa lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/ gang
gdul bya'i skabs la bab par gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu de dag yongs su snang ba de kho na nyid la bya'o/ /smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang gdul
bya skabs la bab par gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gang du ji ltar snang bar 'gyur/ de skad ces dris pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos 'di skad
ces smras so/ /kye/ lang ka'i bdag po/ gdul bya yongs su rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni thams cad yongs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dris pa/ de ji ltar yongs su
snang bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid las mi gzhan la/ de las ni rnam shes dang / ye shes
dang / sku dang / sprul pa dang / yi ge dang / tshig dang / chos dang / sku gdung dang / ring bsrel la sogs pa chos thams cad du snang ngo / /lang ka'i bdag po/ de kho na
nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs 'ba' zhig las snang bar 'gyur te/ lang ka'i bdag po/ ji lta ji ltar nam mkha'i dbyings na nyi zla skar tshogs las ma g.yos pa'i gzugs
brnyan chu dang ba tha dad par snang ba bzhin chos rnams kyi chos nyid gsang ba'i dbyings rnam par dag pa las chos thams cad snang ba yin la chos ni sku gsung thugs yon
tan phrin las lnga kho nar zad de/ de ni gang theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags mtshon par byed pa'i sgor snang ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
@#/ /gsang ba'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags de kho na nyid yin par phyin ci ma log par nges pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ni ngo
bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya bar grags shing grags par gyur to/ /lang ka'i bdag po/ gang sems kyi chos nyid las ni rnam par shes pa bzhir snang la rnam par shes pa bzhi ni rtsa
ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / kun tu snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa bzhi
las ye shes chen po lngar snang ste sems kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid las chos nyid kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su snang ngo / /rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa las me long lta bu'i
ye shes su snang ngo / /dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su snang ngo / /kun tu snang gi rnam par shes pa las so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su
snang ngo / /'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa las bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su snang ngo / /lang ka'i bdag po/ de'ang min pa zhig yin par bsgrubs pa'am/ mi 'dra ba
zhig 'dra bar bcos pa ni ma yin gyi/ ma bcos/ ma bslad/ ma byas pa/ ma brtsams par ye nas rang bzhin gyis de ltar snang ba nyid du zad do/ /de nas lang ka'i
bdag pos dris pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang gi ye shes 'di ltar lnga kho nar zad dam/ 'on te gzhan tha dad par yang sdang / smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/ ye shes
ni gang gi dbang gis lngar yang snang la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / skad cig bcu drug dang / rig pa dang / rnam pa gsum dang / de kho na nyid gsum dang / rnal 'byor
bzhi dang / rang 'byung ba gcig go /lang ka'i bdag po/ de la ye shes lnga so sor ma 'dres pa las ni rigs lngar snang la yongs su rdzogs pa las ni sku bzhir snang ngo //
'di lta ste/ rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa me long lta bu'i ye shes las ni rdo rje'i gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas sha stag tu snang ngo / /sems kyi chos nyid kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
de kho na nyid las ni glang po'i gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas sha dag tu snang ngo / /de nyid la ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes snang la/ ye shes de gnyis 'dus pa las ni chos kyi
skur snang ngo / /dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni nor bu'i gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas sha stag tu snang ngo / /kun tu snang ba'i rnam par shes
pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las pad mo'i gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas sha stag tu snang ngo / /ye shes de gnyis 'dus pa las ni rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur snang ngo / /
@#/ /'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las gzhon nu'i gdung dang / sde'i sangs rgyas sha dag tu snang ba de nyid las ni gsang ba'i
sku dang / sprul pa'i sku tha dad par snang ngo / /sprul pa'i sku tha dad pa las ni yi ge tha dad pa dang / tshig tha dad pa dang / chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa dang / sku gdung dang / ring
bsrel tha dad par snang ste de dag ni theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo mtshon par snang ba yin no/ /lang ka'i bdag po/ de bas gsang sngags ni chos thams cad la
thams cad du rang bzhin gyis snang ba yin la/ skyes bu dam pa rnams ni gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snang bar ston par mngon pa yin no/ /lang ka'i bdag
po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang sngags kyis ma khyab pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / gsang sngags su ma gyur pa'i chos ni gang yang med do gsang sngags kyi nges pa phyin
ci ma log par rnyed pa'i skyes bu dam pa la la dag gsang sngags mthong bar 'dod pa'i me long du ni thams cad 'gyur te ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas nas srog chags
ldem bu dang / nam mkha' nas phra rdul yan chad kyis lhan ne/ lhang nges/ lhag ger gsal bar byed pa'o/ /the tshom gcod par byed pa'o/ /mdzod dam par gyur
pa'o/ /glegs bam chen por gyur pa'o/ /rgya chen por bshad pa'o/ /yongs su go bar sgrogs pa'o/ /lang ka'i bdag po/ de bas na gsang sngags ni rang bzhin gyis sna
bar zad la/ skyes bu dam pa/ rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlabs kyis ston par zad do/ /lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ci ga thams cad snang ba de
gsang sngags sam/ 'on te thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi snang ba de gsang sngags sam/ ci/ gnyi ga ma yin pa zhig gsang sngags yin/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos
smras pa/ kye/ lang ka'i bdag po/ thams cad snang ba de'ang gsang sngags ma yin/ gal te gsang sngags yin na ni gsang sngags zhes brjod pa nyid 'gal la/ gang
sems can gyi 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'ang khyad par med par 'gyur ro/ /de las gzhan yang gsang sngags yod pa ma yin/ gal te de las gzhan pa
'ba' zhig gsang sngags yin na ni thams cad chos nyid du ma 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi snang ba de'ang gsang sngags yin na ni gzhan du mu chad
pa dag yang dag par rdzogs pa nyid du gyur to/ /gang gnyi ga ma yin pa de 'ang gsang sngags ma yin/ gal te gnyi ga ma yin pa zhig gsang sngags yin na ni gsang
@#/ /sngags zhes bya ba zhig btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas gzhan na med do/ /lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'o na /
ci/ gsang sngags zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/ gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang / mi snang ba gnyis
su med pa/ gnyis kyi ngo bo nyid las grol ba/ dbu mar mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de kho na nyid do/ /lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ 'o
na/ gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de rab tu dpag par dkar zhing blta bar dka' na de gang gis blta bar bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/
gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de ni gang gi blo shin tu zhib pa/ chos zhib pa/ shin tu zab pa/ ches zab pas blta bar bya'o/ /smras pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ blo zhib
pa/ shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa ni gang lags/ shin tu zab pa/ ches zab pa ni gang lags/ smras pa/ lang ka'i bdag po/ blo shin tu zhib pa/ ches zhib pa
ni 'di lta ste/ gang la la dag sa'i khams 'di la dpag tshad gcig la rdul phra rab mi 'khrugs khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu dang /
bye ba drug cu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang khri nyis stong yod la de dag la'ang me dang / chu dang / rlung gi rdul phra rab tu phye nas stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po gcig la rdul phra rab tu yod pa'i rtsis kyis gcod pa dang / gzhan yang / phyi'i sa chen po 'di la dbyibs tha dad
pa mtha' yas pa dag brtags te/ 'di dag ni 'byung ba 'khyugs pa dang / 'khyul ba dang / 'phris pa dang / 'khyogs pa dang / 'khril ba dang / 'khyil ba dang / ljar
ba dang / gshar ba dang / zha ba dang / ldems pa dang / 'bus pa dang / 'khris pa dang / 'chus pa la sogs pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis so sor rtog pa dang / gzhan
yang / ming dang / brda' dang / mtshan ma dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug cing so so'i mtshan nyid mtha' yas par rjes su rtog mtha' ma nges pa
dang / dpyod mtha' cher 'gro ba dag gi rgyus thams cad mkhyen pa dag gi rgyur 'gro zhes zer ba dag yod de/ lang ka'i bdag po/ de dag la ni shin tu zhib pa/ ches
zhib pa/ zhes mi bya yi/ de dag ni rtsing pa/ ches rtsing ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blun po gang dag bye ma la gser phye btsag par 'dod na lhang 'tsher la gser
