sor mjal/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das grags pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas sems can la sogs pa/ /thams cad ma
lus lus pa med/ /rang rig ma rig rtog pa nyid/ /kun kyang rang byung ye shes nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /
yi ge phyag rgya ye shes kyang / /tshig las 'byung ba'i gzhi yin te/ /de nyid dag pas thams cad dag /gsung la gsung nyid mi gnas pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /
yang bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs mi bzad pa nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyang rang bzhin du/ /lnga phung nyon mongs rnam par dag /rnam rtog rdul bral
skye 'gag med/ /thams cad ngo bo nyid du bcom/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sman gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dpag med 'jig
rten rdul rnyed na/ /'gro ba rdul phran bsam yas la/ /khyad par de bzhin nyid snang bas/ /til 'bru mar gyis khyab ltar gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das gser
gyi 'od 'phro ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rdul phran gcig tsam gang zag la/ /dgongs te mdun du gsung brjod pa/ /dpag med mtha' yas rdul snyed tsam/ /de snyed kun
du thos par grol/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ gsung gcig mi bzad mtha' yas gsung / /mtha'
dang dbus med kun tu khyab/ /khyab dang khyab med rdo rje gsung / /sna tshogs dngos med de bzhin nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi gsung ngo bo nyid
dag pas 'di skad du/ gang yang ma bcos de nyid la/ /phyogs dang snga phyi dus med de/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /de nyid rang rig rang nyid do/ /zhes gsungs
so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de nyid de snyed rang bzhin de/ /de snyed de nyid yin pa la/ /byis pa rnams kyis gnyis su bzung //
de la gnyis su dbyer byar med/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin
@#/ /du/ /mi mthun pa dang gnyen po gnyis/ /ye nas dbyer med gcig pas na/ /gnod pas 'jigs pa ga la yod/ /ces gsungs so/ /
yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /dag pa dag la dag pa nyid/ /rtog pa dag la
rtog par snang / /cis 'dul der snang ci yang med/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das dga' mchog dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /rang bzhin rang
gis ma bcas pa/ /ngang gis 'od gsal de bzhin nyid/ /kun gyi snying po de nyid pas/ /cis kyang ma bsgribs nam mkha' che/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan
'das gzi brjid dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa nyid sa mchog te/ /de rig ye shes bla ma yis/ /ye nas de bzhin nyid la gnas/ /da gdod bgrod
du ga la yod/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ stong pa nyid kyi snying po la/ /
sna tshogs snang ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ba/ /ji bzhin pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das
ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i ngo bo nyid dag pa gsang bas 'di skad du/ zad med ye shes dngos grub ni/ /de bzhin nyid du dngos grub pas/ /zad pa med cing 'phel ba med/ /da
gdod sgrub tu ga la yod/ /ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kun gyi ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ chos kun rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /mya ngan
'das zhes de la bya/ /stong nyid rang bzhin rnam dag la/ /de nyid mi gnas byang chub sems/ /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba nyid dag
pas 'di skad du/ rnam rtog chu bo'i rka mgo ste/ /stong nyid zhing du ma bsgyur na/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho g.yeng 'gyur ba/ /de mi shes la de ltar snang / /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//
yang bcom ldan 'das me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i ma yin pas/ /kun bzang shes rab
pha rol phyin/ /sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas/ /zhes gsang ba'i chig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad snang ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ stug po
bkod pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /sems can rnam pa thams cad dag /dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ /de nyid las byung dngos med sku/ /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /
@#/ /yang bcom ldan 'das yid dang / ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ rang 'byung ye shes rtsa ba ni/ /byang chub sems nyid yin pas na/ /de yi rtsa ba
snying rje ste/ /pha rol phyin par thabs kyis so/ /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge 'bum gzugs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /ji snyed ji
bzhin nyid kyi don/ /yi ge ming tshogs sgra mtshon pa/ /ming tshogs sgra la ma brten par/ /nyam drod blo yis rig pa med/ /ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /yang bcom ldan
'das thub pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ chos kun chos kyi rang bzhin ni/ /de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan pas/ /de nyid byang chub lam nyid des/ /lam de
ltug po bkod pa'i gnas/ /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /kye grogs po dag /gzhan yang / de dag la sogs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma bye ba sa ya rnyed ngo
bo nyid dag pa dang / chos kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas gsang ba'i tshig /'di skad du/ la la ni 'di ltar/ rtog med rang rig
skad cig ma/ /sems can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings/ /rig dang ma rig gnyis kho na/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis su snang / zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /
la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid smra brjod med pa las/ /de mtshon phyir na tha dad brjod/ /gang brjod pa nyid de bzhin nyid/ /de nyid spros med rdo rje don/ /zhes gsang ba dam par
bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid cir yang mi snang na/ /glo bur rnam rtog tha dad pa'i/ /rnam rtog de nyid snang bar zad/ /snang ba nyid na snang ba med/ /ces gsang ba dam
par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang byar med na/ /gang gis bcos te su yis byas/ /byas pa po zhig ga la yod/ /ces gsang
ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni/ /de bzhin de nyid yin pas na/ /de khyab gang gis chos rnams kun/ /rang bzhin dag pas
bsgribs pa med/ /ces gsung ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid mtshan nyid med pa las/ /mtshan nyid sna tshogs bar snang bas/ /kun 'byung dbyings kyi
rang bzhin pas/ /med la zad mi shes par mdzod/ /ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs theg pa'i lta ba dang / /sdom pa srung ba'i bya ba kun//
spyad par bya ba ma yin yang / /kun kyang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs/ /zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de la phyogs dang dus med par/ /gang gis
@#/ /phyogs dang dus brtags pa'i/ /de nyid de la rnam par snang / /sangs rgyas kyis ni de mi mkhyen/ /zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /
la la ni 'di skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab kun shes nas/ /bsam du med par de bzhag na/ /dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin//
zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab mi shes par/ /bsam med ngang du gang 'jog pa/ /byis pa de ni blun pa ste/ /mun
pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes kun nas brtse ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ bsam med bsam gyis mi khyab chos/ /lhag par mthong nas zhi
gnas pa/ /rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa/ /de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas/ /zhes bshes gnyen dam pa nyid du gdams so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs
so so kun rig kyang / /kun grol rnam dag lam med na/ /dam pa nyid las shin tu gol/ /nam yang nges pa rnyed pa min/ /zhes bka' dam par gdams so/ /la la
ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs rim gyis 'jug pa dang / /bsam spyod blo yi nang du 'gyur/ /bsam med yongs su rdzogs pa'i don/ /rim gyis pa yi dug chen yin/ /zhes
khyad par dam par gdams so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ sna tshogs so sor ma rig par/ /de bzhin nyid du nges mi rnyed/ /de nyid nges pa ma rnyed na/ /sna tshogs smra ba rung ma yin//
zhes nan tan dam par gdams so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du/ /bsam yas bsam snang de bzhin no/ /gcig tu nges pa med pa'i gsung //
ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar yin/ /zhes dpag dka' ba dam par gsungs so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bshad pas/ /'di don gang rig thos pa'i mchog/
thams cad 'di las 'byung bas na/ /'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog /ces shes rab mchog dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ gsang ba'i nang na
gsang chen 'di/ /nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong bar/ /gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la 'gyur/ /de nyid dam pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags
so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ chos rnams kun gyis snying po 'di/ /gser dang mkha' bzhin mi 'gyur bas/ /mi nub stor bral med pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi dam pa don po
mchog /ces dam pa chen por bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ thog ma med nas bsags pa yi/ /rnam rtog sprin phung dpag med pa/ /stong nyid gcig car
@#/ /rig pa yis/ /de bzhin nyid du rnam par sgrol/ /zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ji snyed bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i/ /chos kun stong par rig nges na/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan yin/ /zhes rnal 'byor dam par gdams so/ /la la
ni 'di skad du/ 'khor ba ji srid yod par du/ /bstan pa'i snying po nyi ma shar/ /rang bzhin chos nyid 'khor lo 'di/ /mi nub rgyun mi 'chad par bskor/ /zhes gsang ba
dam pa'i theg par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ mi 'gyur mi 'jigs rdo rje don/ /sna tshogs kun 'byung rin po che/ /ma chags rnam dag pad+mo nyid/ /thams cad
lhun grub mdzad pa che/ /ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/ /ces yang nges pa dam pa bstan no/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ stong nyid gzugs med chos kyi sku/ /smon med yid
las 'das pa'i gsung / /mtshan med rtog las 'das pa'i thugs/ /rtog med re skong yon tan mdzod/ /thabs kyis gar thabs phrin las mdzad/ /ces cho 'phrul sna
tshogs 'byung bar bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ mi rtog chos kyi me long gsal/ /gnyis su med pas thams cad mnyam/ /sna tshogs mtshan nyid ma 'dres
mkhyen/ /nan tan chen po khyab grub mdzad/ /ye nyid kun gyi rang bzhin mkhyen/ /zhes ye shes rgyun du 'char bar bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ snang stong go 'byed kun
khyab mkha'/ /theg dbyings la ni kun gnas pa/ /zhi gnas rnam dag chu chen po/ /lhag mthong ye shes 'od 'bar me/ /shes bya thogs med 'thor ba'i rlung / /zhes thams cad
'byung bar bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs/ /khyab gsal rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sgra/ /dang bas sim byed chos kyi dri/ /don
bcu nyams su myong ba'i ro/ /bde mchog don la reg pa nyid/ /ces yon tan dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ci yang mi sems gti mug la/ /dngos po kun
bcom zhe sdang nyid/ /ye 'byam nga rgyal bdag nyid che/ /bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/ /gang du ma 'gyur gzhan phrag dog ces blang dor med par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di
skad du/ kun gyi rang bzhin gcig shes pas/ /de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus/ /kun la dbang sgyur thos pas na/ /ye dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o/ /zhes dbang dam par bsngags
so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ thams cad kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo/ /kun la khyab gnas brtag dka' ba/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul yin/ /rdo rje kun bkod rnal 'byor lung / /
@#/ /zhes bka' dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid der ni kun gcig pas/ /bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med/ /stong nyid rnam dag nam
mkha' la/ /gtsang smer dbye ba rdul yang med/ /ces bdud rtsi dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ byang chub snying po dam pa la/ /rnam rtog rdul gyis ga la 'go/ /de nyid
chen por 'ub chud pas/ /cis kyang mi bskyod nyam ming / zhes re dogs med par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di/ /seng ge'i khog pa rang zhig
ltar/ /stong nyid rang nyid ma zhig na/ /gzhan gyis 'jig par ga la 'gyur/ zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ bde chen rnam dag rtog byed pas/ /legs
nyes gnyi ga rnam par rtog /bde chen nges pa'i rlung zhugs na/ /gang 'dir rnam par rtog pa med/ /ces yongs su rtog pa las 'das par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de
nyid phyin ci ma log par/ /bsrung bya mi rtog mi gnas pa/ /le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra bsrung ste/ /de bzhin de las 'da' mi bya/ zhes dam tshigs dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni
'di skad du/ dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten du/ /sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /ji snyed pa yi chos bstan pa/ /mtha' yas don no gcig tu 'dus/ zhes par bsngags
so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid de las ma nyams na/ /dran bsam sgyu ma med pa yi/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid/ /bslab pa rnams gsum yongs su rdzogs/ /zhes bslab pa
dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ de nyid las mtha' zhi gnas dang / /lhag pa'i don mthong 'dres pa yi/ /sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa na/ /'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi
lang / /zhes bkri drang brgyud pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ tshig la dbang bas tshig bsgyur na/ /tshig mtha' yas bas bsdus na 'dus/ /tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur
na/ /brjod pas de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsung mi zad pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ smra brjod tshig la gang dag pas/ /gang gis dgongs pa dpog mi nus/ /chig
tshogs rgya mtsho thos pa min/ /tshig gcig thos pa thos pa'i mchog /ces thos pa rgya mtsho'i dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ khyab dang mi gnas rnam mi rtog /ma bral mi
g.yo ma chags pa/ /de nyid las ni gzhan med de/ /pha rol phyin pa de kho na/ /zhes mthar son pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ 'don brjod 'dri klog don byed pa/ /
dmus long dmu rgod rgyug pa 'dra/ /dbyings kyis dbyings la bris pa'i don/ /gang rig 'don brjod 'di klog mchog /ces spyod pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/
@#/ /mtshan mar byas dang snang ba'i tshogs /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /mkha' dang 'ja' ltar rnam rig pa/ /bsngo ba bla med byang chub nyid/ ces
bsngo ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ chos gang sems kyi de nyid la/ /gnyis dang mtha' ru gang lta ba/ /ma rig 'khrul pas phyi ci log /theg chen gsang sngags
lam las log /ces gdams ngag dam par gsungs so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa/ /blo chung rmongs pas khrid pa'i thabs/ /ma bcos de bzhin nyid
'di la/ /rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyis med/ /ces nges par dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la/ /yid bzhin cir yang 'byung ba
yi/ /cho 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams/ /ji ltar 'dul ba mthong thos snang / zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ zab mo sangs rgyas
spyod yul ba/ /gsang ba'i dbyings na gnas pa yi/ /thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid/ /mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs/ /zhes thams cad lhun gyis grub par
bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /de mthong ngo bo nyid mi dmigs/ /dran med bya dang byed med pa/ /gnas gsum mnyam nyid rjes su dran//
zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ gnas gsum dmigs pa'i 'du shes med/ /ming med tshig gi lam dang bral/ /bla med 'dus ma byas pa yi//
mchod pa yang dag mchog tu bshad/ /ces mchod pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ bskal pa bye ba dpag med du/ /log cing zhen pa'i mun pa gsum/ /de nyid
tshul bzhin skad cig ma/ /kun gsal gcig gis yongs su sangs/ /zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ /mun pas 'thibs pa de dag gis/ /mi g.yo mi
rtog de nyid blta/ /de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs/ /'gyod sangs kun gyi mchog tu bshad/ /ces tshangs pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ mi mthun gnyen po mi
dmigs pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la/ /gnas pa gang yin de dag gis/ /gnyen po bstan du ci yang med/ /ces la gcad pa dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/
thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa/ /ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du/ /rang rig bla na med pa yi/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngags so//
la la ni 'di skad du/ ci yang mi sems mi g.yo zhing / /mi rtog rnam par mi g.yeng ba/ /kun la khyab par gdal ba'i dbyings/ /kun shong bya med theg chen mchog /ces theg pa
@#/ /chen po'i gsang ba dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ theg chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /dbu ma'i mi dmigs mtha' las 'das/ /gang 'dir
dbu mar 'dod pa dag /mtha' las 'das par ga la 'gyur/ /zhes dbus mthar mi dmigs par bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang / /mi mthong
sems can sems mi mthong / /sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba/ /de yi don dam yang dag mthong / /zhes mthong ba yongs su bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ ye nas
ma bcos ji bzhin pa/ /mi skye mi 'gag rnam kun mkhyen/ /sus kyang ma byas rang byung ba/ /rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur yin/ /zhes ma bslad par dam par bsngags so/ /la la ni
'di skad du/ de nyid de dang gang ldan pa/ /dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin/ /de la ma gtogs gang zhig na/ /sangs rgyas bya ba ga la yod/ /ces ye nas sangs rgyas par
bsngags so/ /la la ni 'di skad du/ brtan g.yo dkyil 'khor phyag rgya rdzogs/ /rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin bsngags/ /med rgyu rtags chags mtshon pa'i tshig /bsgrub
'grub bstas snang 'bras bu 'o/ /zhes gsang sngags dam pa'i tshig go /grogs po dag /de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid las/
'di skad du/ thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa/ /tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las/ /'di la bya ba ci yang med/ /rang bzhin de nyid ye sangs rgyas/ /a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad las 'das te bde ba chen po lhun dang bar gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dper na kun tu rgyu ba'i mi/ /'dod pa'i yul du gang 'gro ba/ /yul
gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang / /bgrod yul lam gnas gcig las med/ /de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /rnam grangs chos sgo ji snyed kyang / /bkrid pas drang ba'i tshig yin te/ /bsam
pa'i yul ni gcig pa 'o/ /don rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yi/ /bslab par bya ba dam pa ste/ /nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir/ /kun 'dus dam pa'i bslab par gces/ /dam pa
'dir 'dus kun shes na/ /de yi ye shes mtha' yas te/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid pas/ /mdo don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs/ /grogs po dag /de dag ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bshad pa ste/ thams cad kyi mdo de kho na nyid du 'dus par shes
par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa dam pa rnams gcig tu nges pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid la dman pa dam pa rnams yid rangs
@#/ /te mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho/ skyes chen gsang ba'i bdag /rtsal chen smra ba seng ge'i sgra/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs/ /sangs rgyas kun
sngon ye nas byung / /khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes/ /che mchog rje btsan dam pa'i sku/ /bde gshegs kun gyi bshes gnyen mchog /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /kun
gyi 'byung gnas me long gsal/ /phyogs kun gsal 'grel nges pa'i mdo/ /theg chen rmad grags ngo mtshar che/ /gsang chen byung tshul ngo mtshar che/ /a ho zhes nges pa dam
par mngon par bstod/ de nas cang mi dmigs par gyur te gang du nges par bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa dag lha dang / mi'i 'jig rten du rgya cher grags shing yongs su grags
par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu lnga pa'o// //theg pa
chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gis dgongs pa rnam par bgros pa na/ yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung
tshul bstan pa'i bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma'o// //sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mod/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ chos thams cad kyi me long /
bka' thams cad kyi 'grel ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes drag shul can gyi ri ma la ya'i rtsar
lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yongs su bgros pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi dang / ring lugs chen po dA na rak+Shi ta dang / zhus
chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba che btsan skyes kyis bru sha'i yi ge las bru sha'i yul gyi khrom du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /bka' 'di la dbu zhabs su byung tshul bcu gnyis pa/ le'u bdun cu
rtsa lnga pa/ bam po bcu dang / sho lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya mahA gup+ta ko Sha ak+Sha ya ni d+hi dI pa mahA pra ta sA d+ha natan+d+ra
dz+nyA nA sh+car+ya d+hu ti tsakra nA ma mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi zad pa gter gyi sgron ma/ brtul zhugs chen
po bsgrub pa'i rgyud/ ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po chen po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang / dus bzhis
@#/ /bsdus pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen po/ /gsang ba mchog gi
dgyes pa na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po/ chos ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chen po/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i bdag
nyid de 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang / dbus brjod du med pa na/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i
gzhal yas khang na/ gcig dang / du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur yongs su mchad pa/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal
ba/ spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis pho brang gi snying po zlum por gyur pa/ dbyings dang / ye shes rgyu dang / 'bras bur ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhin rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegs su shar ba/ phyi dang / nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang de na nyi ma dang / zla
ba rangs pa dang / phyed kyis 'od gsal bar snang ba dang / che ba'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang / mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyang ba dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / bla re dang /
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ta la'i ljon shing dang / re ba skong ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i
rgyal mtshan dang / 'jig rten pa'i lha dang / lha'i bu mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo dang / glu dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par rgyu rin po che sna tshogs
las grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang / shes rab rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla dang / ma chags ma gos pa'i pad+ma dang / mi zad pa'i rin po che 'bar ba'i gdan khri dang /
gzims cha dang / snam rten du ldan par gnas so/ /gzhan yang / khrag 'thung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas su'ang 'gyur te/ du ra khrod kyi rgyan gyi khyad par
gyi bye brag zhing gi gdan dang / sbrul nag gi chun 'phyang dang / thod pa rnam gsum gyi mtshan ma dang / rlung nag gi phung po spungs shing rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mi zad par 'khrug pa dang /
me ri ser nag tu 'khyil cing 'bar ba/ keng rus kyi ri rab las rak+ta'i khrag zhag gi chu 'bab pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na dregs pa khyo shug dang /
@#/ /sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun tu bzang po'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs grub pa/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gyur pan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor tshogs brjod pa las 'das pa'i yang brjod pa las 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
rab snyed 'khod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / khrag 'thung rol pa'i chogs dang / dad pas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa/ 'di
lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang / btsun mo dam pa
dbyings phyug ma dang / btsun mo dam pa sangs rgyas spyan dang / btsun mo dam pa mA ma kI dang / btsun mo dam pa gos dkar mo dang / btsun mo dam pa sgrol ma dang / gzhan
yang / rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'khor bcun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa'i rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen po rin chen
rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen po chos rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen po las rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor chen mo rdo rje sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo rin chen sems ma dang / rnal 'byor
chen mo chos kyi sems ma dang / rnal 'byor chen mo las sems ma dang / gzhan yang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa byang chub chen
po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub chen po 'jam dpal
gzhon nu dang / byang chub chen po sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub chen po byams pa mai tri dang / byang chub chen po kun tu bzang mo dang / byang chub chen mo sgeg mo dang / byang chub
chen mo phreng ba dang / byang chub chen mo dbyangs dang / byang chub chen mo gar dang / byang chub chen mo pog me ma dang / byang chub chen mo me tog ma dang / byang chub chen mo mar me ma dang /
byang chub chen mo dri dang / gzhan yang / 'joms pa chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dang mnyam pa 'joms pa chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / 'joms pa chen po
stobs po che dang / 'joms pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'joms pa chen po rta'i rgyal po dang / 'joms pa chen po bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dang / 'joms mchen mo lcags kyu ma
@#/ /dang / 'joms ma chen mo zhags pa ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo lcags sgrog ma dang / 'joms ma chen mo 'bebs ma dang / gzhan yang / thub pa'i sras
kyi 'khor rdul phra rab snyed dang mnyam pa/ thub pa chen po lha'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po mi'i dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dud 'gre'i
dbang po dang / thub pa chen po yi dwags kyi dbang po dang / thub pa chen po dmyal ba'i dbang po dang / de dag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sras kyi tshogs grangs med pa
dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang / khrag 'thung rol pa dpal he ru ka btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ 'di lta ste/ khrag 'thung chen po dpal bud d+ha he ru ka zhes
bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal badzra he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal rat+na he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / khrag 'thung chen po dpal pad+ma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /

khrag 'thung chen po dpal karma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo bud d+ha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo badzra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo rat+na kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pad+ma
kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo karma kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang / gsang ba chen po 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa gsang ba chen po rak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang

ba chen po yak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen po sa ma ya he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo rak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang

ba chen mo yak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo bi shwa kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba chen mo sa ma ya kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang / phra men ma nyi shu'i chogs kyi 'khor dkar
mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rkun mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / spos mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang / thal byed ma'i
tshogs zhes bya ba dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / ma tshogs zhes bya ba dang / seng gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / stag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / wa gdong gi
tshogs zhes bya ba dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / bzhad gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / kang ka'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / dur bya'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba
dang / bya rog gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / rta gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / phag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / seng gdong
gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / spre gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra men ma'i tshogs shin tu mang ba dang / gzhan yang / rdo rje srin po khro bo'i chogs rdo rje srin po khro bo rnam
@#/ /par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang / gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang / mi g.yo mgon po zhes bya ba dang / rta mgrin zhes bya ba
dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes bya ba dang / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / hUM kA ra zhes bya ba dang / stobs po che zhes bya
ba dang / gzhan yang / rdo rje srin mo'i khro mo'i 'khor rdo rje srin mo snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / sder mo zhes bya ba dang / dur khrod ma zhes bya ba dang / gtun khung ma zhes bya ba dang /
gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang / gsod ma zhes bya ba dang / bskyod ma zhes bya ba dang / rlung 'byin ma zhes bya ba la sogs
pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor rig 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang / gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / ston pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis
rang dbang med par 'khor du 'dus pa'i dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa kun bran dang / yang bran/ g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang bcas pa rdzu
'phrul gyi shugs kyi 'khor 'dus pa rnams ni bdag dang / gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyud ni thams cad zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / dgug pa dang / bcing
ba dang / gtang ba dang / dgrol ba dang / drang ba dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / dpral ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'jib pa dang / nyams pa dang / gsad pa dang / gnon
pa dang / spar ba dang / pham pa dang / rgyal ba la sogs pa byed cing thabs gcig tu rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod do/ /de nas yang dpal 'bar yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo'ang bcom ldan
'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i sku la 'khril te bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po dang / btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'ang gnyis su med
par mdun gyis bltas te bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas so/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam
par gzigs so/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas phyi snod kyi khams nam mkha' dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri dang / tshal la sogs pa
thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/ /de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ yang nang bcud kyi khams sems dang / sems las byung ba'i g.yo ba dang / 'gul
@#/ /ba dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol song dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / lha'i rigs so so'i khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / mu stegs kyi khams dang / bdud chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi 'am ci dang / ru tra dang / ru tra can la sogs pa'i khams la rnam par gzigs so/ /de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ yang nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang / rig 'dzin pa'i bsti gnas dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis rnam
par gzigs nas smra bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te cang mi mdzad/ rnam par mi mdzad/ mdzad pa mi 'gog/
mdzad pa rnam par yang mi 'gog mi mdzad pa'ang mi gnas/ cang mi gsung / mi sgrogs/ rnam par mi gsung / mi sgrogs/ gsung ba'ang mi 'gog gsung ba rnam par yang
mi 'gog /mi gsung / mi 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snod kyi khams thams cad dang / sa'i khyad par thams cad la'ang mi gzigs/ mi
dgengs/ gzigs shing dgongs pa la'ang mi 'gog /rnam par yang mi 'gog /mi 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor de dag dang / snod kyi khams de dag dang / bcud kyi khams de dag dang / sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid tsam du dmigs su med do/ /dper na/ nam mkha'
ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su'ang song la/ ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de'ang chos thams cad la'ang khyab la/ smra bsam
las kyang 'das so/ /de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa'i kro d+hi'i rgyal mos stong nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo/ /oM/
snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku/ /smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems/ /stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis/ /snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol/ /zhes
bskul bas bskul bar thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun du klong bdal bar khyab ste snying rje chen po des 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par mdzad do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab bar mdzad nas/ yang snod kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas yang bcud kyi khams kun la
@#/ /khyab par mdzad do/ /bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khyad par kun la khyab par mdzad do/ /dper na/ nyi ma bar snang la shar ba'i 'od
kun la snyoms pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab gdal to/ /de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang
ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge
'dzin de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas yum kun tu bzang mo rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo/ /ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu khyab/ /mkha' ltar go 'byed cho
'phrul 'byung gnas las/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku/ /'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol/ /a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom
ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung
ste/ dper na/ zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni/ dper na/ nyi 'od kyi 'od
zer dus gcig shar ba lta bu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo la gzigs te 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do/ /de nas yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mos kyang spyan
zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan stong du brkyang phyag btsal te g.yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo/ /e ma'o/ yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon
rdzogs lha/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de/ /'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+ma'i gnas su phob ho/ /e ma'o/ dkar la
'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang / /chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du/ /gnyis med 'phros pa'i byin brlabs bsam yas las/ /ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku
bsam yas 'thon/ /ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye/ /dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed/ /zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slong / /zhes rnam par bskul
bas gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / skum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan
@#/ /mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang / dung gi phur bas g.yon pa slong ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'deg pa dang / rnam
par 'dor pa'i rol pa'i gar gyis nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par mdzad do/ /rnam par rol pa nges 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do/ /
des sems dang / sems las byung ba kun la khyab par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil pas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod
kyi khams dang / bcud kyi khams dang / bsam gtan dang / 'gog pa dang / sa'i khyad par thams cad dang / byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / stegs pa dang /
sbyor ba dang / 'khyud pa dang / sdom pa dang / bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / gsol ba dang / myang ba dang / bcad pa dang / bde ba dang / sprod pa dang / 'jog pa la sogs pa
bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so/ /de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang
chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su'ang snang ngo / /yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag
mchan du'ang gyur/ thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang / sems dpa' dang / sems
ma dang / thub pa dang / 'joms pa dang / 'joms ma rnams kyis skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas
nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de/ de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo//
yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to/ /he ru ka re re la'ang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa lhun gyis grub par
mdzad do/ /he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi glog gsal bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi glu dang / gar dang / chos kyi char dang / mchod pa dang /
chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man snrel zhi thams cad du ling long phyad do/ /de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang / bdud dang / srin po
dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur to rang rang gi dbang phrogs nas sangs
@#/ /rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so/ /de'i tshe na byang chub kyi 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang / 'gog
pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de'ang dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems thob ste 'gro
pa'i don byed par gyur to/ /gzhan yang / sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la
rab tu dad do/ /des na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag te gsol ba btab pa/ e ma'o e ma ya mtshan che/ /gnyis
med rol pa ya mtshan che/ /'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che/ /byang chub char sprin ya mtshan che/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /
khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che/ /dgon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che/ /'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che/ /bdag cag
'khor tshogs 'das pa rnams/ /dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzod/ /bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin dang / /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod/ ces gsol ba btab pas
bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te/ byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po des bskul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mo kun
tu bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab nas lce pad+mo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang
phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol/ /'dus pa'i 'khor
tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol/ /gsang mdzad ye shes klog gi 'khor lo 'di/ /chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab pas gsang ba
mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun tu bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las
kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu bzhag ste/ las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun tu bzang por btags te las kyi dbang thob
@#/ /par gyur to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce steng du bzhag ste smra ba'i seng ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskur he chos
smra ba'i dbang thob bo/ /de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po de btsun mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs pa can du gyur to/ /de nas smra ba'i seng ge kun
tu bzang po des 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du bskor te
cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te zhing khams mtha' dag kyang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/
yan man dang / snral zhi'i zhing khams mtha' dag kyang ling long phyad par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan mas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gnas ldar
rig par byas so/ /hUM badzra sa ma ya/ gu h+ya sa ma ya/ kro d+ha sa ma ya/ rdo rje 'du bar 'dus pa yi/ /'dus pa chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams/ /gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin
du/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnos/ /bskal bzang dam tshig chen po ste/ /de las 'das na brlag par 'gyur/ zhes bsgo bas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
rnams rang rang gi sems rangs par byas te dam tshig thob nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod rnam par 'khod do/ /de nas byed pa po kun tu bzang po las kyi bka' ba des
bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gtsug gi 'dud phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba mchod pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod de
gsol ba btab po/ /'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod/ /sangs rgyas yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras/ /ya mtshan chen po ston par spyod/ /bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de/ /smra brjod
yul las rab 'das kyang / /dag gi lam nas rab brjod cing / /dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis/ /gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod/ /a la la ho zhes gsol ba
btab bo/ /de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs
so/ /de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang po de la lugs su btud de brkyang phyag btsal nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs
byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang po/ khyod la bdag cag zhu bar sbobs na gsang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ smra ba'i seng+ge kun
@#/ /tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs/ khyod ci dang / ci 'dod pa bdag la zhus shig /bdag gis gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o//
'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po dang / kun tu bzang po/ khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje
btsan/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lha phud/ chos thams cad kyi mdzod lags na/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bdag cag 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor 'dir/ gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis ston par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/ smra ba'i seng+ge/ legs par bstan du
gsol zhes zhus pa dang / smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa/ oM AHhUM a la la ho/ /rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung / /mi gsung ba nyid rgya cher bshad/ /bshad du
med pa'i don de ni/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de/ /de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang / /rnam par brjod par mi mdzad de/ /bka' mi stsal par dgongs pa 'o/
'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig /de bas na gsang ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bsam las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba legs
pa ma yin te/ tshig tu smos pa'i dus nyid gol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bshad de/ da ltar ston pa nyid kyang don de nyid dgongs nas ma
gsungs so/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/ de bas na ma skyes pa'i snying po byang chub sems tshig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan
ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor pa rnams tshig gi phyir 'brang ba'i phyir don rtogs pa'i bkri ba'i phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi tshig gi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no/ /'dus pa'i 'khor
tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge/ de ltar na bdag cag dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi don du rdo rje tshig gi lam du
brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de/ smra ba'i seng+ge las kyi bka' pa/ khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs shig /smra ba'i seng+ge/ dbang bas na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
mchog gi bdag po la zhus shig dang / de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das
gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la lan stong du bskor pa byas te rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas 'di skad gsol ba btab bo/ /e ma ho ston
@#/ /pa'i ngo mtshar khyod/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de/ /tshig tu brjod pa ma legs na'ang //
mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa/ /don la rtsing la tshig la zhib/ /tshig gis bsams pa rangs bya'i phyir/ /snying po byang chub don 'di la/ /dpes mtshon tshig gi
lde mig gis/ /gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng+ges gsol ba btab pa'ang
mkhyen/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis sems kyi rtog pa'ang mkhyen nas tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugs su chud nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo
gsum phyung ste ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu bsgrags so/ /oM AHhUM swAhA/ bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya sa ma ya/
'di ni gsung ma thag tu yang / /sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ /rab tu sngangs te brgyal bar 'gyur/ /'khor tshogs gzhan ma smos ci dgos/ /de nas gsang ba
mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig /gang tshig gis brjod du rung ba thams cad ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o/ /ji srid
brjod du rung ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /gang tshig dang / yi ge las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/ /gang tshig dang / yi ges
brjod du rung ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o/ /sngags kyi lta ba dang / spyod pa'ang de nyid yin te/ /gang don dam pa'i bden pa dang / chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi lta ba
yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nyid rgyu'i tshul du gnas pa las 'bras bu'i chul du kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / gzugs kyi skur snang ste ji ltar spyad pa dang / spyad du rung ba thams
cad ni spyod par rnal 'byor can gyis blta'o/ /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos/ a la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi
bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de ltar lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags/ lta ba dang / spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang
lags/ spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge legs so/ /de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba
ni legs so/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/ gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
@#/ /kyi don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de bden pa gnyis su'ang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /lta ba dang /
spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni/ rnal 'byor pas thob pa dang / sa la bsnyen pa rnams te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnal 'byor blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chung ba rnams la ni bden pa rnams
pa gnyis kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chud pa dang / kun rdzob tu mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du'ang med pa ma yin te/ mtshan ma
med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i
sa goms pa che chung gis 'grub ba yin no/ /sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas te/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ log pa'i kun rdzob 'ba' zhig la rtog gi /yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/ de bas na log
pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang / lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad shes par bya'o/ /
yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so/ /smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa bo rdo rje kun tu
bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i rang bzhin gang lags/ dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /ngas yid tshim par bya'o/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/
gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang /
gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang / gsang sngags kyi
bzlas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang / gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo/ /smra ba'i
seng+ge/ de dag gi dper brjod pa'ang rnam pa bcu ste/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / brag cha dang /
@#/ /chu zla dang / chu'i chu bur dang / mig 'khrul dang / mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo / /smra ba'i seng+ge/ de'ang ji lta zhe na/
sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / sman dang / sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las/ dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu pa'i
bdag nyid can de snang ba med do/ /de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang / yig 'bru dang / rdzas kyi sbyor pa las grub pa'i rtags dag
snang yang de la rang bzhin med do/ /smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu la chur mthong yang de
la chu'i rang bzhin med do/ /de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang / tha snyad btags pa'ang ming nyid dmigs
su ga la yod/ rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do/ /de
bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'ang ji ltar spyad na'ang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo/ /gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu 'am/ me
long ngam/ 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do/ /de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang / ting nge
'dzin dang / yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo/ /dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na gnas pa der grong khyer yang
de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la/ de yang ther zug ma yin
no/ /brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag ca ngos la sgra ji skad skyen pa skang brag ca la'ang de bzhin du 'byung ngo / /'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang
sngags bzlas pa'i sgra'ang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o/ /chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do/ /de bzhin du
phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la'ang gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa med do/ /chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang
'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa'ang gcig tu ma chad do/ /mig 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas
@#/ /na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do/ /de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba'ang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam
mang yongs su grub par yongs su mi blta'o/ /mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang
ste/ de la dbyibs med do/ /de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos por ma grub pa'o/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/ de ltar na gsang sngags
kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/ de ltar bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag par kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par
bya'o/ /'phags pa rgyud gyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa
bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du
bskor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun tu rab tu mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te
'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/ /e ma'o bde bar gshegs pa kun tu bzang / /e ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don/ /e ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag /e ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i
glog /e ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po/ /e ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog /e ma'o rnam dag dpal khyod la/ /e ma'o bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/ /byang chub sems 'di
ji ltar skyed/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar lags/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ci/ /bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi ji ltar lags/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam grangs ci/ /sngags
kyi sdom pa ji ltar bsrung / /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad/ /dregs pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar gdul/ /rnam bzhi'i las ni ji ltar bgyi/ /brang pa'i nan tur ji ltar bgyi//
rnal 'byor rnams la brtse ba dang / /bdag cag rnams la sman slad du/ /bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol/ /a la la ho zhes gsol pa las/ /bcom ldan
'das gsang pa mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /smra ba'i seng+ge/ gsang sngags mdo'i don rnams phyi rabs
kyi rnal 'byor ba la lan gdags pa dang / dad pa can gyi 'gro ba rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir nga la zhu ba legs so/ /smra ba'i seng+ge legs so/ /phyogs bcu dus
@#/ /bzhi'i sangs rgyas sngar 'das pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / slad kyis byon pa rnams
kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi don thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ rgyud kyi 'brel ba/ don gyi bkod pa/ rtags kyi rol
pa/ ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor los rnam par bsgyings pa gzhung chen po 'di ngas bshad par bya yi/ skal ba dang ldan pa rnams gsang sngags kyi don zab mo
ni thos par dka' na thos nas de'i don la gnas par dka' ste phal gyi thun mong du ma gyur pa'o/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal bo ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i
mdo zhes bya ba las/ sngags kyi mdo bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de snying po
byang chub la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu
rnams/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems su 'dus shing byang chub kyi sems snang bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni lus dang / ngag
dang / sems su 'dus la/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems nyid chos thams cad kyi rnam par snang ngo / /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang /
ngag dang / sems bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems
kyi mtshan nyid ni sems kyang lus dang / ngag gi rnam pa lta bu/ ngag kyang lus dang / sems kyi rnam pa lta bu/ lus kyang tshig tu brjod pa dang / sems kyi rnam pa lta bur
rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rtogs shig /'on kyang byang chub du sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des stong pa nyid kyi ting
nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang /
gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de
nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan
@#/ /gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung ba'i thugs/ /chos kun skye ba med pa las/ /skye ba 'di ni rab grags pa/ /skye dang mi skye gnyis med pa/ /byang
chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang me long lta bu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems
'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/ /chos kun 'gag pa med pa las/ /'gag ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags//
'gag dang mi 'gag med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/ /chos kun gnas
pa med pa las/ /gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa 'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang
chos thams cad so so kun du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan
gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/ /chos kun dmigs pa med pa las/ /dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste/ /byang chub
tshul 'di bstan pa 'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba la nan tan du grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi
sems 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/ /chos kun spro bsdu med pa las/ /spros dang bsdus par rab tu grags/
spros bsdus yod dang med pa ste/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa 'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos a la la ho zhes sgra phyung ste
byang chub sems la bstod pa/ e ma'o bde chen kun tu bzang / /e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems/ /e ma'o dag pa dri ma med/ /e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che/ /e
ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos/ /e ma'o so sor rang rig sems/ /e ma'o byang chub lhun gyis grub/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod de bcom
ldan 'das nyid khyad par du gyur pa'ang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi sems thugs su chud pa'o/ /bdag cag rig 'dzin gyi tshogs su gyur pa rnams kyang
@#/ /byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal/ 'jug par 'tshal/ ldang bar 'tshal/ gnas par 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi sems g.yos par
bgyi/ reg par bgyi/ nye bar bgyi/ nyams su myong bar bgyi bar 'tshal na bdag cag de 'dra ba'i bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ bde bar
gshegs pa/ dgongs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab par thags su chud nas snying rje byang chub 'byung ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad pas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis thams
cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no/ /de nas yang 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos/ /sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang / /ngo
bo nyid ni brjod du med/ /snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o/ /e ma'o srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la/ /bdag tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs
kyis/ yun rings dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung / /log rtog nor ba'i dbang gis kun brtags kyang / /rang
bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsam med/ /e ma'o yun rings dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas yin mod kyang / /rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i
'khor lor 'khyams/ /log rtog nyid la dngos med byang chub sems/ /'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che/ /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal/ /phung po lnga
nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku/ /srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub snying por gnas/ /phyi nang snod bcud yab yum ngang du gsal/ /zhes gsungs pas chos thams
cad byang chub sems su gnas so/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid sku dang / gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung bar bzhed nas
btsun mo dang gnyis su med par 'du mdzad do/ /mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te dkyil
'khor thams cad kyi mdo 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig /gsang sngags byin brlabs bsam yas la/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas brjod
@#/ /mi lang / /mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te/ /rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang / /ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /bkri drang
rdul tshon dkyil 'khor te/ /gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes ched du gleng ngo / /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong lags so/ /de'ang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/ /e ma'o gsang mchog
bde ba che/ /ye nas lhun grub dag pa'i bdag /dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung nas gtso/ /rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i/ /rang bzhin
dag pa dri ma med/ /rang bzhin lhun grub zab mo'i don/ /bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi
bdag po des gsol ba btab pa'i don thugs su chud nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rdo rje rgyas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
zhugs nas yang rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor spros pa dang bral ba 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med pa rtogs
'gyur pa'i/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang / /de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang
bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni spyir bsdus pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med/ /phung
po lnga don sangs rgyas lnga/ /'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum/ /khams dang skye mched mang po kun/ /sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /des na srid gsum
dkyil 'khor che/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la phung po lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yang / srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
gzugs rnams kun/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na/ /dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas/ /rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin/ /srid gsum sems can thams
cad kyi/ /bde sdug tshor ba'i phung po kun/ /mnyam nyid dbyings la snang bas na/ /nga rgyal chen po'i rang bzhin pas/ /myong ba rin chen 'byung ba yin/ /srid gsum sems
can thams cad kyi/ /yul dang shes pa phra rags kyi/ /byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun/ /ma 'dres dbyings la snang bas na/ /shes rab rlabs kyi 'dod chags pas/ /snang
@#/ /ba mtha' yas rang bzhin no/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /dge dang mi dge gnyis ka min/ /sems las byung dang ma byung ba'i/ /'du
byed phung po thams cad kun/ /spro bsdu dbyings las byung bas na/ /rnam par grol ba'i phrag dog pas/ /don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /srid gsum sems can thams
cad kyi/ /rnam smin rang sems rnam rig pa'i/ /shes brgyad rnam shes phung po kun/ /rig pa'i dbyings la shar bas na/ /zhe sdang chen po'i ye shes pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chen po lnga dbyings phyug lnga rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /gsal stong mi sgrib go
'byed pa'i/ /snang stong nam mkha'i khams rnams kun/ /stong nyid dbyings la shar bas na/ /thams cad gnas pa'i klong yin pas/ /bde gshegs dbyings phyug rang
bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /sra brtan bskyed bskrun rten rnams kun/ /sa yi khams su grags pa rnams/ /mi 'gyur dbyings la shar bas na/ /thams cad
skyed pa'i rten yin pas/ /rdo rje dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /gyes sdud gsher pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /chu yi khams su grags pa
ste/ /kun sdud dbyings su shar bas na/ /yon tan tshogs chen kun sdud pas/ /rin chen dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /gsal dro'i ngo bo
thams cad kun/ /me yi khams su grags pa rnams/ /snang gsal dbyings la shar bas na/ /gsal dro sreg pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /pad+ma'i dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/ /snod
bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /yang g.yo 'degs bskyod thams cad kun/ /rlung gi khams su grags pa ste/ /bskyod chen dbyings la shar bas na/ /thogs med shugs bskyod
rang bzhin pas/ /las kyi dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rnam par shes pa bzhi byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum
sems can thams cad kyi/ /kha dog dbyibs la spyod pa kun/ /mig gi rnam shes zhes su grags/ /mthong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/ /sa yi snying po'i rang bzhin yin/ /
srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /sgra rnams kun la spyod pa kun/ /rna ba'i rnam shes zhes su grags/ /thos pa'i ye shes yin pas na/ /lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin
yin/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /dri rnams kun la spyod ba kun/ /sna yi rnam shes zhes su grags/ /tshor ba'i ye shes yin pas na/ /nam mkha'i snying
@#/ /po'i rang bzhin yin/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /ro rnams kun la spyod pa kun/ /lce yi rnam shes zhes su grags/ /myong ba'i
ye shes yin pa'i phyir/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la yul bzhi byang chub chen mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ /snod bcud 'gro
ba thams cad kyi/ /kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma kun/ /gzugs kyi skye mched nyid du grags/ /mthong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas/ /gzugs mdzes l+la s+yai'i rang bzhin
yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /zin dang ma zin gnyi ga las/ /byung ba'i sgra yi khams su grags/ /thos par bya ba'i yul yin pas/ /nIr t+ya ma yi rang bzhin
yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar dang gyur/ /zhim dang nga dang de bzhin gzhan/ /dri yi khams dang skye mched de/ /bsnam par bya ba'i
yul yin pas/ /mA lai nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /kha mngar la sogs ro rnams kun/ /ro yi skye mched nyid du grags/ /myod bar bya
ba'i yul yin pas/ /gIrti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum
sems can thams cad kyi/ /mthong byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de/ /mig gi khams zhes bya bar grags/ /mthong pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ /byams pa mai tri rang bzhin yin/ /srid
gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /thos par byed pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rna ba'i khams zhes bya par grags/ /thos pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ /sgrib pa kun sel rang bzhin yin/ /srid
gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /snom byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de/ /sna yi khams zhes bya bar grags/ /tshor bar bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/ /srid
gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /myong byed dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ /lce yi khams zhes bya bar grags/ /myong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ /kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /de la dus bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /rgyu 'bras kun tu rnam par spyad/ /sngon 'das dus su rnam
par grags/ /sngon 'das dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin/ /spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin no/ /snod bcud 'gro pa thams cad kyi/ /rgyu spyad 'bras bu ma spyad kun/ /da ltar dbyar gyi rang
bzhin yin/ /me tog nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /rgyu 'bras yongs kyis ma spyad pa/ /ma 'ongs dus su rnam par grags/ /'ong ma rag ston rang
@#/ /bzhin ni/ /A lo ke yi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /rgyu 'bras nges par ma tshogs pa/ /'byung bar ma nges dus zhes
grags/ /ma 'ongs dgun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /gan d+he'i rang bzhin yin par nges/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni lus kyi dbang po dang / /rnam par shes pa dang / yang
de'i yul dang / de las byung ba'i byang chub sems khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /reg byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de/ /lus kyi
khams zhes bya bar grags/ /reg par byed pa med pas na/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i rang bzhin no/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /reg bya kun la spyod pa kun/ /lus
kyi rnam shes zhes su grags/ /reg pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin yin/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur
reg bya rnams/ /reg bya'i skye mched nyid du grags/ /reg par bya ba'i yul yin pas/ /rta mchog dpal gyi rang bzhin no/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /
tshogs drug 'gags pa'i de ma thag /go 'byed gsal ba'i bdag nyid de/ /yid kyi khams zhes bya bar grags/ /des spyod bya ba byed pa'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i
rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa bzhi lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /'jig dang skad cig mi
rtag pa/ /rtag par ma yin zhes su grags/ /sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir/ /lcags kyu ma yi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /kun rtog gzhan dbang med min
pa/ /chad par ma yin zhes su grags/ /rmi lam lta bur sems snang phyir/ /zhags pa ma yi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /gzung 'dzin dngos por ma grub
pa/ /mtshan mar ma yin zhes su grags/ /smig rgyu lta bur sems snang phyir/ /lcags sgrog ma yi rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /skyes bu byed pa ma grub pa/ /
bdag tu ma yin zhes su grags/ /sgra brnyan lta bu'i sems snang phyir/ /dril bu ma yi rang bzhin yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni yid dang / chos gtso gzungs gnyis
kyi rang bzhin du bstan te/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /chos rnams kun la nges spyod pa'i/ /yid kyi rnam shes zhes su grags/ /rtog pa'i ye shes yin
pa'i phyir/ /kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin/ /snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kun/ /chos kyi skyed byed yin par grags/ /rnam par
@#/ /shes pa'i yul yin pas/ /kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin/ /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /
nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /ji snyed rnam grangs yod pa'i chos/ /kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /rnam grangs yin par rgyal
bas gsungs/ /zhes ched du brjod pa gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /
kun rdzob mtshan ma'i gnas chen kyang / /'og min bla med gnas mchog gam/ /lcang lo can nam bde ba can/ /pad+ma can la sogs pa yi/ /rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil
'khor de/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor ngo la snang / /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ /mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la/ /'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhun gyis grub/ /de steng rin chen sna
bzhi las/ /lhun gyis grub pa tshad dpag med/ /de la brten pa'i sa gzhi ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs gcal du bkram/ /mnan nem bteg 'phar mdzes pa'i gzhi/ /de la pho
brang gzhal med khang / /gru bzhi lham par mdzes par snang / /rin chen sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub/ /glo 'bur bzhi yang mkhar thabs tshul/ /bum pa'i rtse mo chos kyi
tog /rma bya'i mdongs dang ldan pa'o/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten
ldan/ /gru chad par 'khyams mdzes par ldan/ /rin chen 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs/ /sems can pad+ma nyi zla dang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan mchog ldan/ /rin chen khri rkang
rnam rten ldan/ /pho brang de yi gdan mchog kyang / /nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/ /dar dang ba ra mu tig phreng / /dril bu dang ni rnga
yab sogs/ /rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs brgyan/ /'jig rten lha tshogs mdzes pa dang / /de la sogs te rgyan rnams kyang / /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /
gzhal yas de yi sgo bzhi na/ /glang seng rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ /rta babs rnams kyi tsong tsong dang / /gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag /dkon mchog gsum gyi
mtshan yang sgrogs/ /sgo drung de dag re re na/ /ta la'i skye shing tsong tsong 'khril/ /dri dang gzugs dang 'od du ldan/ /ta la'i skyed shing de dag la/ /khu byug la
sogs bkra shis pa'i/ /bya rnams snyan pa skad kyang 'byin/ /sgo drung de dag re re na/ /khrus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs pa/ /blo mchog yan lag ldan pa'i chu/ /grangs
@#/ /med de dag re re na/ /lha dang lha mo bsam mi khyab/ /phyi rol kho ra khor yug na/ /rtse sa 'chags brjod mi lang / /de la sogs pa bsam
yas mchog /ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub/ /lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis/ /rgyu las grub par rgyal bas gsungs/ /pho brang de na gnas pa yi/ /ye
shes lha tshogs mang po rnams/ /gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste/ /dbus kyi pho brang snying po la/ /rnam par snang mdzad snying po che/ /'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od
'dra/ /rang rtags lag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /dpa' bo de yi spyan snga na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang / /dung dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra/ /rang rtags lag na
rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /bai DUR+Ya yi kha dog 'dra/ /rang rtags rin chen zur brgyad 'dzin/ /rgyab sna snang ba mtha' yas gtso/ /pad+ma rA ga'i
mdog 'dra zhing / /rang rtags pad+ma dmar po 'dzin/ /g.yon du don yod grub pa ste/ /in+d+ra nI la ljang gu'i mdog /rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin/ /kun kyang zhi
ba'i cha lugs te/ /thor tshugs rigs lnga dbu la brgyan/ /rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs/ /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /phyag gdub snyan chas kun la
mdzes/ /mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs/ /de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/ /kun tu bzang dang lo tsa na/ /mA ma gos dkar sgrol ma rnams/ /g.yas pas thabs kyis gtso
la 'khyud/ /g.yon pas rang rtags dril bu 'dzin/ /sku mdog cha lugs yab dang 'dra/ /'khor lo rtsibs la lhun gyis grub/ /spyan snga'i glo bur mdzes pa la/ /lag na rdo rje
sngo skya'i mdog /rang rtags rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas na sa yi snying po ste/ /ljang sngon rin chen myu gu 'dzin/ /rgyab tu nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /mthing ga rang rtags
ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon du mdzes pa'i glo 'bur la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar skya ste/ /rang rtags pad+ma dkar po 'dzin/ /thor tshugs ye shes sems pas brgyan/ /
sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan/ /de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/ /gar dang sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs/ /g.yas pas thabs
kyi gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa gang dang me long phreng / /pi wang 'dzin cing cha lugs gzhan/ /gtso bo nyid kyang mthun pa yin/ /mdzes pa'i gru chen rnams la ni/ /
byams pa mai tri dkar ba ste/ /mdzes pa'i glu shing gun+d+he bsnams/ /shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la'o/ /sgrib pa rnam sel mthing ga ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste/ /
@#/ /lho nub mtshams su mdzes par gnas/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar skya'i mdog /rang rtags ut+pa mthing ga 'dzin/ /nub byang mtshams su mdzes
par gnas/ /kun tu bzang po ljang ser mdog /rang rtags rin chen snye ma 'dzin/ /byang shar mtshams kyi grwa la gnas/ /de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/ /spos dang me tog bdug pa
dri/ /g.yas pa thabs kyi gtsol 'khyud/ /g.yon par rang rtags 'dzin pa'o/ /cha lugs thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /sgo khyud rnams la 'joms pa ni/ /gshin rje gshed po
mthing nag 'bar/ /nir mgo gdengs pa lag mtshan thogs/ /shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas/ /rnam par rgyal ba ser nag 'bar/ /rdo rjes gnod pa lho sgor ro/ /rta
mgrin dmar nag 'bar ba ste/ /thod sbrul thogs pa nub sgor gnas/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang nag 'bar/ /rgya gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor/ /stang stabs tshul du
rab tu gnas/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i klong du 'khyil/ /hUM dang phaT kyi sgra chen sgrogs/ /
de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/ /gshed mo dang ni rgyal ma dang / /rta mgrin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams/ /lag mtshan lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /sgrog dang dril bu thogs shing
rngam/ /cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra/ /sgo khyud dag tu lhun gyis grub/ /mdzes pa'i bar 'khyams de nyid la/ /sprul sku thub pa chen mo drug /cis 'dul thabs kyi skur ston pas/ /cho
lugs ma nges 'dul bar ston/ /mdzes pa'i bar 'khyams de nyid las/ /mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol la/ /byed pa po dang bya ba mo/ /nam mkha' yi ni mdog 'dra la/ /ting nge 'dzin
du ldan par gnas/ /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /brjod med rjod du med pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs kyis gang bar gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /lha yi tshogs
chen de dag gi /thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas/ /tshon gang 'od dang bcas pa 'o/ /ljang la rang rtags yi ge rnams/ /rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal/ /de lta'i sku
mchog re re la/ /tshul dgu dag dang ldan pa ste/ /mnyen dang lcug dang 'khril bag dang / /ldem bag chags dang gzhon tshul can/ /gsal dang 'chos dang lhun stug dang / /gzi
brjid 'bar bar rab tu gnas/ /de ltar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas/ /phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas/ /spyan drangs mchod pa dbul ba'i 'os/ /zhes gsungs pas
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub bo/ /de nas smra ba'i seng+ge la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gi bsam pa rangs par gyur te/
@#/ /a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /a ho dmigs dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo chos kun lhun grub dpag
mi lang / /rang rig yon tan dpag med bsam yas mang po de kun brjod mi lang / /gsang sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bsam yas bsam khyab ji snyed dpag mi lang / /sprul
pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gro ba chos ston zhing khams khyab/ /ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo
zhes bya ba las/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam par
'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/ chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin
gyis dbang bsgyur du rung ba tsam du rtogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar dbang sgyur ba'o/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste/
gsang sngags ya mtshan chen po 'di/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang / /mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de/ /bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang / /bskyed dang lhag
pa'i ting 'dzin no/ /thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid bsgoms te/ /dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang rnam gsum ste/ /dang por de bzhin nyid kyi
dang / /de bzhin nyid la gnas bca'i phyir/ /stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /gnyis pa kun snang nam mkha' dang / /snying rje yum gyis khyab pa'i phyir/ /mtshams sbyor chen po'i
ting 'dzin bsgom/ /gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam/ /rab tu brtan pa'i yig 'bru a/ /de las phra mo a 'phros 'dus/ /spros shing bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med/ /de las bdag nyid
chen por bsgom/ /ma lus thams cad rdzogs par gsal/ /rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur bas/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /de bzhin dbyings las shar bas na/ /
bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad mor ldan/ /de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /skyed pa yang ni 'di lta ste/ /lha tshogs bdag gi sras su bskyed/ /de
nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na/ /thog mar yab yum mkha' rnam gnyis/ /rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis brlabs/ /gnyis med dgyes par
'khril pa las/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a/ /'phro 'du dbyings su thim pa las/ /dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur/ /e yaM baM su bruM/ e nyid 'dus pas nam mkhar gsal/ /
@#/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /baM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bskyed/ /su las gser gyi bris mar bskyed/ /bruM las ri rab
gzhal med khang / /dbyibs dang kha dog tshad dpag med/ /'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra ba'o/ /de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa
ni/ /brtan 'byung nam mkha'i yi ge a/ /'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste/ /gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du la/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar/ /ka kha ga
g+ha nga / /tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor
bzhi bcu gnyis/ /spro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las/ /thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar/ /de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba/ /Tha las sogs pa'i
yig 'bru lnga/ /phung po lnga yi sa bon yin/ /tha las sogs pa 'byung ba lnga/ /bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par grags/ /ka la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /rnam
shes lnga yi sa bon yin/ /tsa las sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /mig gi khams la sogs pa lnga/ /pa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga/ /gzugs sogs skye
mched rnam lnga'i yin/ /ya las sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/ /dus bzhi'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /sha las sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/ /phyin ci ma log dus
bzhir bshad/ /i la sogs pa'i yig 'bru drug /rdul snyed thub pa drug tu bshad/ /oM ni yid kyi khams yin te/ /k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam shes khams/ /oM ni chos kyi
